original: mātṛkā 1
analyzed: mātṛkā

original: [vyavahāraḥ]
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ

original: NM1.1a/ dharma.ekatānāḥ puruṣā yadāsan satyavādinaḥ /
analyzed: dharma ekatānāḥ puruṣāḥ yadā āsan satya vādinaḥ

original: NM1.1c/ tadā na vyavahāro 'abhūn na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ // 1
analyzed: tadā na vyavahāraḥ abhūt na dveṣaḥ na api matsaraḥ

original: NM1.2a/ naṣṭe dharme manuṣyeṣu vyavahāraḥ pravartate /
analyzed: naṣṭe dharme manuṣyeṣu vyavahāraḥ pravartate

original: NM1.2c/ draṣṭā ca vyavahārāṇāṃ rājā daṇḍadharaḥ kṛtaḥ // 2
analyzed: draṣṭā ca vyavahārāṇām rājā daṇḍa dharaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: NM1.3a/ likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś cātra dvau vidhī saṃprakīrtitau /
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ ca atra dvau vidhī saṃprakīrtitau

original: NM1.3c/ saṃdigdhārthaviśuddhyarthaṃ dvayor vivadamānayoḥ // 3
analyzed: saṃdigdha artha viśuddhi artham dvayoḥ vivadamānayoḥ

original: NM1.4a/ sottaro 'anuttaraś caiva sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa uttaraḥ anuttaraḥ ca eva sa vijñeyaḥ dvi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: NM1.4c/ sottaro 'abhyadhiko yatra vilekhāpūrvakaḥ paṇaḥ // 4
analyzed: sa uttaraḥ abhyadhikaḥ yatra vilekhā pūrvakaḥ paṇaḥ

original: NM1.5a/ vivāde sottarapaṇe dvayor yas tatra hīyate /
analyzed: vivāde sa uttara paṇe dvayoḥ yaḥ tatra hīyate

original: NM1.5c/ sa paṇaṃ svakṛtaṃ dāpyo vinayaṃ ca parājaye // 5
analyzed: sa paṇam sva kṛtam dāpyaḥ vinayam ca parājaye

original: NM1.6a/ sāras tu vyavahārāṇāṃ pratijñā samudāhṛtā /
analyzed: sāraḥ tu vyavahārāṇām pratijñā samudāhṛtā

original: NM1.6c/ taddhānau hīyate vādī taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet // 6
analyzed: tad hānau hīyate vādī taran tām uttaraḥ bhavet

original: NM1.7a/ kulāni śreṇayaś caiva gaṇāś cādhikṛto nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: kulāni śreṇayaḥ ca eva gaṇāḥ ca adhikṛtaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: NM1.7c/ pratiṣṭhā vyavahārāṇāṃ gurvebhyas tūttarottaram // 7
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā vyavahārāṇām guru ebhyaḥ tu uttarottaram

original: NM1.8a/ sa catuṣpāc catuḥsthānaś catuḥsādhana eva ca /
analyzed: sa catuṣpād catur sthānaḥ catur sādhanaḥ eva ca

original: NM1.8c/ caturhitaś caturvyāpī catuṣkārī ca kīrtyate // 8
analyzed: catur hitaḥ catur vyāpī catuṣkārī ca kīrtyate

original: NM1.9a/ aṣṭāṅgo 'aṣṭādaśapadaḥ śataśākhas tathā-eva ca /
analyzed: aṣṭa aṅgaḥ aṣṭādaśa padaḥ śata śākhaḥ tathā eva ca

original: NM1.9c/ triyonir dvyabhiyogaś ca dvidvāro dvigatis tathā // 9
analyzed: tri yoniḥ dvi abhiyogaḥ ca dvi dvāraḥ dvi gatiḥ tathā

original: NM1.10a/ dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca caritraṃ rājaśāsanam /
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca vyavahāraḥ ca caritram rāja śāsanam

original: NM1.10c/ catuṣpād vyavahāro 'ayam uttaraḥ pūrvabādhakaḥ // 10
analyzed: catuṣpād vyavahāraḥ ayam uttaraḥ pūrva bādhakaḥ

original: NM1.11a/ tatra satye sthito dharmo vyavahāras tu sākṣiṣu /
analyzed: tatra satye sthitaḥ dharmaḥ vyavahāraḥ tu sākṣiṣu

original: NM1.11c/ caritraṃ pustakaraṇe rājājñāyāṃ tu śāsanam // 11
analyzed: caritram pusta karaṇe rāja ājñāyām tu śāsanam

original: NM1.12a/ sāmādyupāyasādhyatvāc catuḥsādhana ucyate /
analyzed: sāma ādi upāya sādhya tvāt catur sādhanaḥ ucyate

original: NM1.12c/ caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca rakṣaṇāt sa caturhitaḥ // 12
analyzed: caturṇām āśramāṇām ca rakṣaṇāt sa catur hitaḥ

original: NM1.13a/ kartṛṛn atho sākṣiṇaś ca sabhyān rājānam eva ca /
analyzed: kartṛṛn atho sākṣiṇaḥ ca sabhyān rājānam eva ca

original: NM1.13c/ vyāpnoti pādaśo yasmāc caturvyāpī tataḥ smṛtaḥ // 13
analyzed: vyāpnoti pādaśas yasmāt catur vyāpī tatas smṛtaḥ

original: NM1.14a/ dharmasyārthasya yaśaso lokapaktes tathā-eva ca /
analyzed: dharmasya arthasya yaśasaḥ loka pakteḥ tathā eva ca

original: NM1.14c/ caturṇāṃ karaṇād eṣāṃ catuṣkārī prakīrtitaḥ // 14
analyzed: caturṇām karaṇāt eṣām catuṣkārī prakīrtitaḥ

original: NM1.15a/ rājā sapuruṣaḥ sabhyāḥ śāstraṃ gaṇakalekhakau /
analyzed: rājā sa puruṣaḥ sabhyāḥ śāstram gaṇaka lekhakau

original: NM1.15c/ hiraṇyam agnir udakam aṣṭāṅgaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ // 15
analyzed: hiraṇyam agniḥ udakam aṣṭa aṅgaḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: NM1.16a/ ṛṇādānaṃ hy upanidhiḥ saṃbhūya-utthānam eva ca /
analyzed: ṛṇa ādānam hi upanidhiḥ saṃbhūyautthānam eva ca

original: NM1.16c/ dattasya punar ādānam aśuśrūṣābhyupetya ca // 16
analyzed: dattasya punar ādānam a śuśrūṣā abhyupetya ca

original: NM1.17a/ vetanasyānapākarma tathā-eva-asvāmivikrayaḥ /
analyzed: vetanasya anapākarma tathā eva asvāmi vikrayaḥ

original: NM1.17c/ vikrīya-asaṃpradānaṃ ca krītvānuśaya eva ca // 17
analyzed: vikrīya asaṃpradānam ca krītvā anuśayaḥ eva ca

original: NM1.18a/ samayasyānapākarma vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tathā /
analyzed: samayasya anapākarma vivādaḥ kṣetra jaḥ tathā

original: NM1.18c/ strīpuṃsayoś ca saṃbandho dāyabhāgo 'atha sāhasam // 18
analyzed: strīpuṃsayoḥ ca saṃbandhaḥ dāya bhāgaḥ atha sāhasam

original: NM1.19a/ vākpāruṣyaṃ tathā-eva-uktaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyam eva ca /
analyzed: vāc pāruṣyam daṇḍa pāruṣyam eva ca

original: NM1.19c/ dyūtaṃ prakīrṇakaṃ caiva-ity aṣṭādaśapadaḥ smṛtaḥ // 19
analyzed: dyūtam prakīrṇakam ca eva eti aṣṭādaśa padaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: NM1.20a/ eṣām eva prabhedo 'anyaḥ śatam aṣṭa.uttaraṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: eṣām eva prabhedaḥ anyaḥ śatam aṣṭa auttaram smṛtam

original: NM1.20c/ kriyābhedān manuṣyāṇāṃ śataśākho nigadyate // 20
analyzed: kriyā bhedāt manuṣyāṇām śata śākhaḥ nigadyate

original: NM1.21a/ kāmāt krodhāc ca lobhāc ca tribhyo yasmāt pravartate /
analyzed: kāmāt krodhāt ca lobhāt ca tribhyaḥ yasmāt pravartate

original: NM1.21c/ triyoniḥ kīrtyate tena trayam etad vivādakṛt // 21
analyzed: tri yoniḥ kīrtyate tena trayam etat vivāda kṛt

original: NM1.22a/ dvyabhiyogas tu vijñeyaḥ śaṅkātattvābhiyogataḥ /
analyzed: dvi abhiyogaḥ tu vijñeyaḥ śaṅkā tattva abhiyogataḥ

original: NM1.22c/ śaṅkāsatāṃ tu saṃsargāt tattvaṃ ha-ūḍhādidarśanāt // 22
analyzed: śaṅkā asatām tu saṃsargāt tattvam ha ūḍha ādi darśanāt

original: NM1.23a/ pakṣadvayābhisaṃbandhād dvidvāraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
NM1.23c/ pūrvavādas tayoḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣas taduttaram // 23
analyzed: pūrva vādaḥ tayoḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ tad uttaram

original: NM1.24a/ bhūtacchalānusāritvād dvigatiḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bhūta chala anusāri tvāt dvi gatiḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: NM1.24c/ bhūtaṃ tattvārthasaṃyuktaṃ pramādābhihitaṃ chalam // 24
analyzed: bhūtam tattva artha saṃyuktam pramāda abhihitam chalam

original: NM1.25a/ tatra śiṣṭaṃ chalaṃ rājā marṣayed dharmasādhanaḥ /
analyzed: tatra śiṣṭam chalam rājā marṣayet dharma sādhanaḥ

original: NM1.25c/ bhūtam eva prapadyeta dharmamūlā yataḥ śriyaḥ // 25
analyzed: bhūtam eva prapadyeta dharma mūlāḥ yatas śriyaḥ

original: NM1.26a/ dharmeṇa-uddharato rājño vyavahārān kṛtātmanaḥ /
analyzed: dharmeṇa auddharataḥ rājñaḥ vyavahārān kṛtātmanaḥ

original: NM1.26c/ saṃbhavanti guṇāḥ sapta sapta vahner ivārciṣaḥ // 26
analyzed: saṃbhavanti guṇāḥ sapta sapta vahneḥ iva arciṣaḥ

original: NM1.27a/ dharmaś cārthaś ca kīrtiś ca lokapaktir upagrahaḥ /
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca arthaḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca loka paktiḥ upagrahaḥ

original: NM1.27c/ prajābhyo bahumānaś ca svarge sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam // 27
analyzed: prajābhyaḥ bahu mānaḥ ca svarge sthānam ca śāśvatam

original: NM1.28a/ tasmād dharmāsanaṃ prāpya rājā vigatamatsaraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt dharma āsanam prāpya rājā vigata matsaraḥ

original: NM1.28c/ samaḥ syāt sarvabhūteṣu bibhrad vaivasvataṃ vratam // 28
analyzed: samaḥ syāt sarva bhūteṣu bibhrat vaivasvatam vratam

original: NM1.29a/ dharmaśāstraṃ puraskṛtya prāḍvivākamate sthitaḥ /
analyzed: dharmaśāstram puraskṛtya prāḍvivāka mate sthitaḥ

original: NM1.29c/ samāhitamatiḥ paśyed vyavahārān anukramāt // 29
analyzed: samāhita matiḥ paśyet vyavahārān anukramāt

original: NM1.30a/ āgamaḥ prathamaṃ kāryo vyavahārapadaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: āgamaḥ prathamam kāryaḥ vyavahāra padam tatas

original: NM1.30c/ vivitsā nirṇayaś caiva darśanaṃ syāc caturvidham // 30
analyzed: vivitsā nirṇayaḥ ca eva darśanam syāt caturvidham

original: NM1.31a/ dharmaśāstrārthaśāstrābhyām avirodhena mārgataḥ /
analyzed: dharma śāstra artha śāstrābhyām avirodhena mārgataḥ

original: NM1.31c/ samīkṣamāṇo nipuṇaṃ vyavahāragatiṃ nayet // 31
analyzed: samīkṣamāṇaḥ nipuṇam vyavahāra gatim nayet

original: NM1.32a/ yathā mṛgasya viddhasya vyādho mṛgapadaṃ nayet /
analyzed: yathā mṛgasya viddhasya vyādhaḥ mṛga padam nayet

original: NM1.32c/ kakṣe śoṇitaleśena tathā dharmapadaṃ nayet // 32
analyzed: kakṣe śoṇita leśena tathā dharma padam nayet

original: NM1.33a/ yatra vipratipattiḥ syād dharmaśāstrārthaśāstrayoḥ /
analyzed: yatra vipratipattiḥ syāt dharma śāstra artha śāstrayoḥ

original: NM1.33c/ arthaśāstra.uktam utsṛjya dharmaśāstra.uktam ācāret // 33
analyzed: arthaśāstra oktam utsṛjya dharma śāstra oktam ācāret

original: NM1.34a/ dharmaśāstravirodhe tu yuktiyukto 'api dharmataḥ /
analyzed: dharma śāstra virodhe tu yukti yuktaḥ api dharmataḥ

original: NM1.34c/ vyavahāro hi balavān dharmas tenāvahīyate // 34
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ hi balavān dharmaḥ tena avahīyate

original: NM1.35a/ sūkṣmo hi bhagavān dharmaḥ parokṣo durvicāraṇaḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣmaḥ hi bhagavān dharmaḥ parokṣaḥ durvicāraṇaḥ

original: NM1.35c/ ataḥ pratyakṣamārgeṇa vyavahāragatiṃ nayet // 35
analyzed: atas pratyakṣa mārgeṇa vyavahāra gatim nayet

original: NM1.36a/ yāty acauro 'api cauratvaṃ cauraś cāyāty acauratām /
analyzed: yāti acauraḥ api caura tvam cauraḥ ca āyāti acaura tām

original: NM1.36c/ acauraś cauratāṃ prāpto māṇḍavyo vyavahārataḥ // 36
analyzed: acauraḥ caura tām prāptaḥ māṇḍavyaḥ vyavahārataḥ

original: NM1.37a/ strīṣu rātrau bahir grāmād antarveśmany arātiṣu /
analyzed: strīṣu rātrau bahis grāmāt antarveśmani arātiṣu

original: NM1.37c/ vyavahāraḥ kṛto 'apy eṣu punaḥ kartavyatām iyāt // 37
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ kṛtaḥ api eṣu punar kartavya tām iyāt

original: NM1.38a/ gahanatvād vivādānām asāmarthyāt smṛter api /
analyzed: gahana tvāt vivādānām asāmarthyāt smṛteḥ api

original: NM1.38c/ ṛṇādiṣu haret kālaṃ kāmaṃ tattvabubhutsayā // 38
analyzed: ṛṇa ādiṣu haret kālam kāmam tattva bubhutsayā

original: NM1.39a/ gobhūhiraṇyastrīsteyapāruṣyātyayikeṣu ca /
analyzed: go bhū hiraṇya strī steya pāruṣya ātyayikeṣu ca

original: NM1.39c/ sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca sadya eva vivādayet // 39
analyzed: sāhaseṣu abhiśāpe ca sadyas eva vivādayet

original: NM1.40a/ anāvedya tu yo rājñe saṃdigdhe 'arthe pravartate /
analyzed: an āvedya tu yaḥ rājñe saṃdigdhe arthe pravartate

original: NM1.40c/ prasahya sa vineyaḥ syāt sa cāsyārtho na sidhyati // 40
analyzed: prasahya sa vineyaḥ syāt sa ca asya arthaḥ na sidhyati

original: NM1.41a/ vaktavye 'arthe na tiṣṭhantam utkrāmantaṃ ca tadvacaḥ /
analyzed: vaktavye arthe na tiṣṭhantam utkrāmantam ca tad vacaḥ

original: NM1.41c/ āsedhayed vivādārthī yāvad āhvānadarśanam // 41
analyzed: āsedhayet vivāda arthī yāvat āhvāna darśanam

original: NM1.42a/ sthānāsedhaḥ kālakṛtaḥ pravāsāt karmaṇas tathā /
analyzed: sthāna āsedhaḥ kāla kṛtaḥ pravāsāt karmaṇaḥ tathā

original: NM1.42c/ caturvidhaḥ syād āsedho nāsiddhas taṃ vilaṅghayet // 42
analyzed: caturvidhaḥ syāt āsedhaḥ na asiddhaḥ tam vilaṅghayet

original: NM1.43a/ nadīsaṃtārakāntāradurdeśa.upaplavādiṣu /
analyzed: nadī saṃtāra kāntāra durdeśa aupaplava ādiṣu

original: NM1.43c/ āsiddhas taṃ parāsedham utkrāman nāparādhnuyāt // 43
analyzed: āsiddhaḥ tam parāsedham utkrāman na aparādhnuyāt

original: NM1.44a/ āsedhakāla āsiddha āsedham yo vyatikramet /
analyzed: āsedha kāle āsiddhaḥ āsedham yaḥ vyatikramet

original: NM1.44c/ sa vineyo 'anyathā kurvann āseddhā daṇḍabhāg bhavet // 44
analyzed: sa vineyaḥ anyathā kurvan āseddhā daṇḍa bhāj bhavet

original: NM1.45a/ nirveṣṭukāmo rogārto yiyakṣur vyasane sthitaḥ /
analyzed: nirveṣṭu kāmaḥ roga ārtaḥ yiyakṣuḥ vyasane sthitaḥ

original: NM1.45c/ abhiyuktas tathānyena rājakārya.udyatas tathā // 45
analyzed: abhiyuktaḥ tathā anyena rāja kārya audyataḥ tathā

original: NM1.46a/ gavāṃ pracāre gopālāḥ sasyabandhe kṛṣīvalāḥ /
analyzed: gavām pracāre gopālāḥ sasya bandhe kṛṣīvalāḥ

original: NM1.46c/ śilpinaḥ cāpi tatkālam āyudhīyāś ca vigrahe // 46
analyzed: śilpinaḥ ca api tad kālam āyudhīyāḥ ca vigrahe

original: NM1.47a/ aprāptavyavahāraś ca dūto dāna.unmukho vratī /
analyzed: aprāpta vyavahāraḥ ca dūtaḥ dāna aunmukhaḥ vratī

original: NM1.47c/ viṣamasthaś ca nāsedhyo na ca-enān āhvayen nṛpaḥ // 47
analyzed: viṣama sthaḥ ca na āsedhyaḥ na ca enān āhvayet nṛpaḥ

original: NM1.48a/ nābhiyukto 'abhiyuñjīta tam atīrtvārtham anyataḥ /
analyzed: na abhiyuktaḥ abhiyuñjīta tam a tīrtvā artham anyatas

original: NM1.48c/ na cābhiyuktam anyena na viddhaṃ veddhum arhati // 48
analyzed: na ca abhiyuktam anyena na viddham veddhum arhati

original: NM1.49a/ yam artham abhiyuñjīta na taṃ viprakṛtiṃ nayet /
analyzed: yam artham abhiyuñjīta na tam viprakṛtim nayet

original: NM1.49c/ nānyat pakṣāntaraṃ gacched gacchan pūrvāt sa hīyate // 49
analyzed: na anyat pakṣa antaram gacchet gacchan pūrvāt sa hīyate  /

original: NM1.50a/ na ca mithyābhiyuñjīta doṣo mithyābhiyoginaḥ /
analyzed: na ca mithyā abhiyuñjīta doṣaḥ mithyā abhiyoginaḥ

original: NM1.50c/ yas tatra vinayaḥ proktaḥ so 'abhiyoktāram āvrajet // 50
analyzed: yaḥ tatra vinayaḥ proktaḥ saḥ abhiyoktāram āvrajet

original: NM1.51a/ sāpadeśaṃ haran kālam abruvaṃś cāpi saṃsadi /
analyzed: sa apadeśam haran kālam abruvān ca api saṃsadi

original: NM1.51c/ uktvā vaco vibruvaṃś ca hīyamānasya lakṣaṇam // 51
analyzed: uktvā vacaḥ vibruvan ca hīyamānasya lakṣaṇam

original: NM1.52a/ palāyate ya āhūtaḥ prāptaś ca vivaden na yaḥ /
analyzed: palāyate yaḥ āhūtaḥ prāptaḥ ca vivadet na yaḥ

original: NM1.52c/ vineyaḥ sa bhaved rājñā hīna eva sa vādataḥ // 52
analyzed: vineyaḥ sa bhavet rājñā hīnaḥ eva sa vādataḥ

original: NM1.53a/ nirṇiktavyavahāreṣu pramāṇam aphalaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: nirṇikta vyavahāreṣu pramāṇam aphalam bhavet

original: NM1.53c/ likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo vāpi pūrvam āveditaṃ na cet // 53
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ vā api pūrvam āveditam na ced

original: NM1.54a/ yathā pakveṣu dhānyeṣu niṣphalāḥ prāvṛṣo guṇāḥ /
analyzed: yathā pakveṣu dhānyeṣu niṣphalāḥ prāvṛṣaḥ guṇāḥ

original: NM1.54c/ nirṇiktavyavahārāṇāṃ pramāṇam aphalaṃ tathā // 54
analyzed: nirṇikta vyavahārāṇām pramāṇam aphalam tathā

original: NM1.55a/ abhūtam apy abhihitaṃ prāptakālaṃ parīkṣyate /
analyzed: abhūtam api abhihitam prāpta kālam parīkṣyate

original: NM1.55c/ yat tu pramādān na-ucyeta tad bhūtam api hīyate // 55
analyzed: yat tu pramādāt na ocyeta tat bhūtam api hīyate

original: NM1.56a/ tīritaṃ cānuśiṣṭaṃ ca yo manyeta vidharmataḥ /
analyzed: tīritam ca anuśiṣṭam ca yaḥ manyeta vidharmataḥ

original: NM1.56c/ dviguṇaṃ daṇḍam āsthāya tat kāryaṃ punar uddharet // 56
analyzed: dviguṇam daṇḍam āsthāya tat kāryam punar uddharet

original: NM1.57a/ durdṛṣṭe vyavahāre tu sabhyās taṃ daṇḍam āpnuyuḥ /

original: NM3.3a/ rājā tu dhārmikān sabhyān niyuñjyāt suparīkṣitān /
analyzed: rājā tu dhārmikān sabhyān niyuñjyāt su parīkṣitān

original: NM3.3c/ vyavahāradhuraṃ voḍhuṃ ye śaktāḥ sadgavā iva // 3
analyzed: vyavahāra dhuram voḍhum ye śaktāḥ sat gavāḥ iva

original: NM3.4a/ dharmaśāstrārthakuśalāḥ kulīnāḥ satyavādinaḥ /
analyzed: dharma śāstra artha kuśalāḥ kulīnāḥ satya vādinaḥ

original: NM3.4c/ samāḥ śatrau ca mitre ca nṛpateḥ syuḥ sabhāsadaḥ // 4
analyzed: samāḥ śatrau ca mitre ca nṛpateḥ syuḥ sabhāsadaḥ

original: NM3.5a/ tatpratiṣṭhaḥ smṛto dharmo dharmamūlaś ca pārthivaḥ /
analyzed: tad pratiṣṭhaḥ smṛtaḥ dharmaḥ dharma mūlaḥ ca pārthivaḥ

original: NM3.5c/ saha sadbhir ato rājā vyavahārān viśodhayet // 5
analyzed: saha sadbhiḥ atas rājā vyavahārān viśodhayet

original: NM3.6a/ śuddheṣu vyavahāreṣu śuddhiṃ yānti sabhāsadaḥ /
analyzed: śuddheṣu vyavahāreṣu śuddhim yānti sabhāsadaḥ

original: NM3.6c/ śuddhiś ca teṣāṃ dharmād dhi dharmam eva vadet tataḥ // 6
analyzed: śuddhiḥ ca teṣām dharmāt hi dharmam eva vadet tatas

original: NM3.7a/ yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ yatrānṛtena ca /
analyzed: yatra dharmaḥ hi adharmeṇa satyam yatra anṛtena ca

original: NM3.7c/ hanyate prekṣamāṇānāṃ hatās tatra sabhāsadaḥ // 7
analyzed: hanyate prekṣamāṇānām hatāḥ tatra sabhāsadaḥ

original: NM3.8a/ viddho dharmo hy adharmeṇa sabhāṃ yatra-upatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: viddhaḥ dharmaḥ hi adharmeṇa sabhām yatra eva upatiṣṭhate

original: NM3.8c/ na ced viśalyaḥ kriyate viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ // 8
analyzed: na ced viśalyaḥ kriyate viddhāḥ tatra sabhāsadaḥ

original: NM3.9a/ sabhā vā na praveṣṭavyā vaktavyaṃ vā samañjasam /
analyzed: sabhā vā na praveṣṭavyā vaktavyam vā samañjasam

original: NM3.9c/ abruvan vibruvan vāpi naro bhavati kilbiṣī // 9
analyzed: a bruvan vibruvan vā api naraḥ bhavati kilbiṣī

original: NM3.10a/ ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhāṃ gatvā tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate /
analyzed: ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhām gatvā tūṣṇīm dhyāyantaḥ āsate

original: NM3.10c/ yathāprāptaṃ na bruvate sarve te 'anṛtavādinaḥ // 10
analyzed: yathāprāptam na bruvate sarve te anṛta vādinaḥ

original: NM3.11a/ pādo 'adharmasya kartāraṃ pādaḥ sākṣiṇam ṛcchati /
analyzed: pādaḥ adharmasya kartāram pādaḥ sākṣiṇam ṛcchati

original: NM3.11c/ pādaḥ sabhāsadaḥ sarvān pādo rājānam ṛcchati // 11
analyzed: pādaḥ sabhāsadaḥ sarvān pādaḥ rājānam ṛcchati

original: NM3.12a/ rājā bhavaty anenās tu mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ /
analyzed: rājā bhavati anenāḥ tu mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ

original: NM3.12c/ eno gacchati kartāraṃ nindārho yatra nindyate // 12
analyzed: enaḥ gacchati kartāram nindā arhaḥ yatra nindyate

original: NM3.13a/ andho matsyān ivāśnāti nirapekṣaḥ sakaṇṭakān /
analyzed: andhaḥ matsyān iva aśnāti nirapekṣaḥ sa kaṇṭakān

original: NM3.13c/ parokṣam arthavaikalyād bhāṣate yaḥ sabhāṃ gataḥ // 13
analyzed: parokṣam artha vaikalyāt bhāṣate yaḥ sabhām gataḥ

original: NM3.14a/ tasmāt sabhyaḥ sabhāṃ prāpya rāgadveṣavivarjitaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt sabhyaḥ sabhām prāpya rāga dveṣa vivarjitaḥ

original: NM3.14c/ vacas tathāvidhaṃ brūyād yathā na narakaṃ patet // 14
analyzed: vacaḥ tathāvidham brūyāt yathā na narakam patet

original: NM3.15a/ yathā śalyaṃ bhiṣag vidvān uddhared yantrayuktitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā śalyam bhiṣaj vidvān uddharet yantra yuktitaḥ

original: NM3.15c/ prāḍvivākas tathā śalyam uddhared vyavahārataḥ // 15
analyzed: prāḍvivākaḥ tathā śalyam uddharet vyavahārataḥ

original: NM3.16a/ yatra sabhyo janaḥ sarvaḥ sādhv etad iti manyate /
analyzed: yatra sabhyaḥ janaḥ sarvaḥ sādhu etat iti manyate

original: NM3.16c/ sa niḥśalyo vivādaḥ syāt saśalyaḥ syād ato 'anyathā // 16
analyzed: sa niḥśalyaḥ vivādaḥ syāt sa śalyaḥ syāt atas anyathā

original: NM3.17a/ na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā /
analyzed: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā

original: vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam /
analyzed: vṛddhāḥ na te ye na vadanti dharmam

original: NM3.17c/ nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti /
analyzed: na asau dharmaḥ yatra na satyam asti

original: na tat satyaṃ yac chalenānuviddham // 17
analyzed: na tat satyam yat chalena anuviddham

original: vyavahārapadāni
analyzed: vyavahāra padāni

original: 1. ṛṇādānam
analyzed: ṛṇa ādānam

original: N1.01a/ ṛṇaṃ deyam adeyaṃ ca yena yatra yathā ca yat /
analyzed: ṛṇam deyam adeyam ca yena yatra yathā ca yat

original: N1.01c/ dānagrahaṇadharmāc ca ṛṇādānam iti smṛtam // 1
analyzed: dāna grahaṇa dharmāt ca ṛṇa ādānam iti smṛtam

original: N1.02a/ pitary uparate putrā ṛṇaṃ dadyur yathāṃśataḥ /
analyzed: pitari uparate putrāḥ ṛṇam dadyuḥ yathā aṃśataḥ

original: N1.02c/ vibhaktā hy avibhaktā vā yas tām udvahate dhuram // 2
analyzed: vibhaktā hi avibhaktā vā yaḥ tām udvahate dhuram

original: N1.03a/ pitṛvyeṇāvibhaktena bhrātrā vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: pitṛvyeṇa avibhaktena bhrātrā vā yat ṛṇam kṛtam

original: N1.03c/ mātrā vā yat kuṭumbārthe dadyus tad rikthino 'akhilam // 3
analyzed: mātrā vā yat kuṭumba arthe dadyuḥ tat rikthinaḥ akhilam

original: N1.04a/ kramād avyāhataṃ prāptaṃ putrair yan narṇam uddhṛtam /
analyzed: kramāt avyāhatam prāptam putraiḥ yat na ṛṇam uddhṛtam

original: N1.04c/ dadyuḥ paitāmahaṃ pautrās tac caturthān nivartate // 4
analyzed: dadyuḥ paitāmaham pautrāḥ tat caturthāt nivartate

original: N1.05a/ icchanti pitaraḥ putrān svārthahetor yatas tataḥ /
analyzed: icchanti pitaraḥ putrān sva artha hetoḥ yatas tatas

original: N1.05c/ uttamarṇādhamarṇebhyo mām ayaṃ mocayiṣyati // 5
analyzed: uttamarṇa adhamarṇebhyaḥ mām ayam mocayiṣyati

original: N1.06a/ ataḥ putreṇa jātena svārtham utsṛjya yatnataḥ /
analyzed: atas putreṇa jātena sva artham utsṛjya yatnataḥ

original: N1.06c/ pitā mokṣitavya ṛṇād yathā na narakaṃ patet // 6
analyzed: pitā mokṣitavyaḥ ṛṇāt yathā na narakam patet

original: N1.07a/ tapasvī cāgnihotrī ca ṛṇavān mriyate yadi /
analyzed: tapasvī ca agnihotrī ca ṛṇavān mriyate yadi

original: N1.07c/ tapaś caivāgnihotraṃ ca sarvaṃ tad dhanināṃ dhanam // 7
analyzed: tapaḥ ca eva agnihotram ca sarvam tat dhaninām dhanam

original: N1.08a/ na putrarṇaṃ pitā dadyād dadyāt putras tu paitṛkam /
analyzed: na putra ṛṇam pitā dadyāt dadyāt putraḥ tu paitṛkam

original: N1.08c/ kāmakrodhasurādyūtaprātibhāvyakṛtaṃ vinā // 8
analyzed: kāma krodha surā dyūta prātibhāvya kṛtam vinā

original: N1.09a/ pitur eva niyogād yat kuṭumbabharaṇāya ca /
analyzed: pituḥ eva niyogāt yat kuṭumba bharaṇāya ca

original: N1.09c/ kṛtaṃ vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā // 9
analyzed: kṛtam vā yat ṛṇam kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā

original: N1.10a/ śiṣyāntevāsidāsastrīvaiyāvṛttyakaraiś ca yat /
analyzed: śiṣya antevāsi dāsa strī vaiyāvṛttya karaiḥ ca yat

original: N1.10c/ kuṭumbahetor utkṣiptaṃ voḍhavyaṃ tat kuṭumbinā // 10
analyzed: kuṭumba hetoḥ utkṣiptam voḍhavyam tat kuṭumbinā

original: N1.11a/ nārvāg viṃśatimād varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ /
analyzed: na arvāk viṃśatimāt varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ

original: N1.11c/ ṛṇaṃ dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātary athāpi vā // 11
analyzed: ṛṇam dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātari atha api vā

original: N1.12a/ dāpyaḥ pararṇam eko 'api jīvatsv adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam /
analyzed: dāpyaḥ para ṛṇam ekaḥ api jīvatsu adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam

original: N1.12c/ preteṣu tu na tatputraḥ pararṇaṃ dātum arhati // 12
analyzed: preteṣu tu na tad putraḥ para ṛṇam dātum arhati

original: N1.13a/ na strī patikṛtaṃ dadyād ṛṇaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tathā /
analyzed: na strī pati kṛtam dadyāt ṛṇam putra kṛtam tathā

original: N1.13c/ abhyupetād ṛte yadvā saha patyā kṛtaṃ bhavet // 13
analyzed: abhyupetāt ṛte yat vā saha patyā kṛtam bhavet

original: N1.14a/ dadyād aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā /
analyzed: dadyāt aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā

original: N1.14c/ yo vā tadriktham ādadyād yato riktham ṛṇaṃ tataḥ // 14
analyzed: yaḥ vā tad riktham ādadyāt yatas riktham ṛṇam tatas

original: N1.15a/ na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ kathaṃcit patyur ābhavet /
analyzed: na ca bhāryā kṛtam ṛṇam kathaṃcid patyuḥ ābhavet

original: N1.15c/ āpatkṛtād ṛte puṃsāṃ kuṭumbārtho hi vistaraḥ // 15
analyzed: āpad kṛtāt ṛte puṃsām kuṭumba arthaḥ hi vistaraḥ

original: N1.16a/ anyatra rajakavyādhagopaśauṇḍikayoṣitām /
analyzed: anyatra rajaka vyādha gopa śauṇḍika yoṣitām

original: N1.16c/ teṣāṃ tatpratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṃ ca tadāśrayam // 16
analyzed: teṣām tad pratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbam ca tad āśrayam

original: N1.17a/ putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putraṃ strī yānyam āśrayet /
analyzed: putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putram strī yā anyam āśrayet

original: N1.17c/ ṛkthaṃ tasyā haret sarvaṃ niḥsvāyāḥ putra eva tu // 17
analyzed: ṛktham tasyāḥ haret sarvam niḥsvāyāḥ putraḥ eva tu

original: N1.18a/ yā tu sapradhanaiva strī sāpatyā cānyam āśrayet /
analyzed: yā tu sa pradhanā eva strī sa apatyā ca anyam āśrayet

original: N1.18c/ so 'asyā dadyād ṛṇaṃ bhartur utsṛjed vā tathaiva tām // 18
analyzed: saḥ asyāḥ dadyāt ṛṇam bhartuḥ utsṛjet vā tathā eva tām

original: N1.19a/ adhanasya hy aputrasya mṛtasyopaiti yaḥ striyam /
analyzed: adhanasya hi aputrasya mṛtasya upaiti yaḥ striyam

original: N1.19c/ ṛṇaṃ voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tad evāsya dhanaṃ smṛtam // 19
analyzed: ṛṇam voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tat eva asya dhanam smṛtam

original: N1.20a/ dhanastrīhāriputrāṇām ṛṇabhāg yo dhanaṃ haret /
analyzed: dhana strī hāri putrāṇām ṛṇa bhāj yaḥ dhanam haret

original: N1.20c/ putro 'asatoḥ strīdhaninoḥ strīhārī dhaniputrayoḥ // 20
analyzed: putraḥ asatoḥ strī dhaninoḥ strī hārī dhani putrayoḥ

original: N1.21a/ uttamā svairiṇī yā syād uttamā ca punarbhuvām /
analyzed: uttamā svairiṇī yā syāt uttamā ca punarbhuvām

original: N1.21c/ ṛṇaṃ tayoḥ patikṛtaṃ dadyād yas tām upāśnute // 21
analyzed: ṛṇam tayoḥ pati kṛtam dadyāt yaḥ tām upāśnute

original: N1.22a/ strīkṛtāny apramāṇāni kāryāṇy āhur anāpadi /
analyzed: strī kṛtāni apramāṇāni kāryāṇi āhuḥ anāpadi

original: N1.22c/ viśeṣato gṛhakṣetradānādhamanavikrayāḥ // 22
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ gṛha kṣetra dāna ādhamana vikrayāḥ

original: N1.23a/ etāny api pramāṇāni bhartā yady anumanyate /
analyzed: etāni api pramāṇāni bhartā yadi anumanyate

original: N1.23c/ putraḥ patyur abhāve vā rājā vā patiputrayoḥ // 23
analyzed: putraḥ patyuḥ abhāve vā rājā vā pati putrayoḥ

original: N1.24a/ bhartrā prītena yad dattaṃ striyai tasmin mṛte 'api tat /
analyzed: bhartrā prītena yat dattam striyai tasmin mṛte api tat

original: N1.24c/ sā yathākāmam aśnīyād dadyād vā sthāvarād ṛte // 24
analyzed: sā yathākāmam aśnīyāt dadyāt vā sthāvarāt ṛte

original: N1.25a/ tathā dāsakṛtaṃ kāryam akṛtaṃ paricakṣate /
analyzed: tathā dāsa kṛtam kāryam akṛtam paricakṣate

original: N1.25c/ anyatra svāmisaṃdeśān na dāsaḥ prabhur ātmanaḥ // 25
analyzed: anyatra svāmi saṃdeśāt na dāsaḥ prabhuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: N1.26a/ putreṇa ca kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yat syāt pitur anicchataḥ /
analyzed: putreṇa ca kṛtam kāryam yat syāt pituḥ an icchataḥ

original: N1.26c/ tad apy akṛtam evāhur dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau // 26
analyzed: tat api akṛtam eva āhuḥ dāsaḥ putraḥ ca tau samau

original: N1.27a/ aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'api hi na rṇabhāk /
analyzed: aprāptavyavahāraḥ ced svatantraḥ api hi na rṇa bhāj

original: N1.27c/ svātantryaṃ tu smṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyaṃ guṇavayaḥkṛtam // 27
analyzed: svātantryam tu smṛtam jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyam guṇa vayaḥ kṛtam

original: N1.28a/ trayaḥ svatantrā loke 'asmin rājācāryas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: trayaḥ svatantrāḥ loke asmin rājā ācāryaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N1.28c/ prati prati ca varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svagṛhe gṛhī // 28
analyzed: prati prati ca varṇānām sarveṣām sva gṛhe gṛhī

original: N1.29a/ asvatantrāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svatantraḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: asvatantrāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svatantraḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: N1.29c/ asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣya ācārye tu svatantratā // 29
analyzed: asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣyaḥ ācārye tu svatantra tā

original: N1.30a/ asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrā dāsāś ca saparigrahāḥ /
analyzed: asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrāḥ dāsāḥ ca sa parigrahāḥ

original: N1.30c/ svatantras tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt kramāgatam // 30
analyzed: svatantraḥ tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt krama āgatam

original: N1.31a/ garbhasthaiḥ sadṛśo jñeya ā varṣād aṣṭamāc chiṣuḥ /
analyzed: garbha sthaiḥ sadṛśaḥ jñeyaḥ ā varṣāt aṣṭamāt śiṣuḥ

original: N1.31c/ bāla ā ṣoḍaśāj jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaś cāpi śabdyate // 31
analyzed: bālaḥ ṣoḍaśāt jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaḥ ca api śabdyate

original: N1.32a/ parato vyavahārajñaḥ svatantraḥ pitarau vinā /
analyzed: paratas vyavahāra jñaḥ svatantraḥ pitarau vinā

original: N1.32c/ jīvator asvatantraḥ syāj jarayāpi samanvitaḥ // 32
analyzed: jīvatoḥ asvatantraḥ syāt jarayā api samanvitaḥ

original: N1.33a/ tayor api pitā śreyān bījaprādhānyadarśanāt /
analyzed: tayoḥ api pitā śreyān bīja prādhānya darśanāt

original: N1.33c/ abhāve bījino mātā tadabhāve tu pūrvajaḥ // 33
analyzed: abhāve bījinaḥ mātā tad abhāve tu pūrvajaḥ

original: N1.34a/ svatantrāḥ sarva evaite paratantreṣu sarvadā /
analyzed: svatantrāḥ sarve eva ete paratantreṣu sarvadā

original: N1.34c/ anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ceśvarā matāḥ // 34
analyzed: anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ca īśvarāḥ matāḥ

original: N1.35a/ yad bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantras tathaiva ca /
analyzed: yat bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantraḥ tathā eva ca

original: N1.35c/ akṛtaṃ tad iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstravido janāḥ // 35
analyzed: akṛtam tat iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstra vidaḥ janāḥ

original: N1.36a/ svatantro 'api hi yat kāryaṃ kuryād aprakṛtiṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: svatantraḥ api hi yat kāryam kuryāt aprakṛtim gataḥ

original: N1.36c/ tad apy akṛtam evāhur asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ // 36
analyzed: tat api akṛtam eva āhuḥ asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ

original: N1.37a/ kāmakrodhābhiyuktārtabhayavyasanapīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: kāma krodha abhiyukta ārta bhaya vyasana pīḍitāḥ

original: N1.37c/ rāgadveṣaparītāś ca jñeyās tv aprakṛtiṃ gatāḥ // 37
analyzed: rāga dveṣa parītāḥ ca jñeyāḥ tu aprakṛtim gatāḥ

original: N1.38a/ kule jyeṣṭhas tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛtisthaś ca yo bhavet /
analyzed: kule jyeṣṭhaḥ tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛti sthaḥ ca yaḥ bhavet

original: N1.38c/ tatkṛtaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nāsvatantrakṛtaṃ kṛtam // 38
analyzed: tat kṛtam syāt kṛtam kāryam na asvatantra kṛtam kṛtam

original: N1.39a/ dhanamūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yatnas tatsādhane mataḥ /
analyzed: dhana mūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ yatnaḥ tad sādhane mataḥ

original: N1.39c/ rakṣaṇaṃ vardhanaṃ bhoga iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt // 39
analyzed: rakṣaṇam vardhanam bhogaḥ iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt

original: N1.40a/ tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalam eva ca /
analyzed: tat punar trividham jñeyam śuklam śabalam eva ca

original: N1.40c/ kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // 40
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak

original: N1.41a/ śrutaśauryatapaḥkanyāśiṣyayājyānvayāgatam /
analyzed: śruta śaurya tapaḥ kanyā śiṣya yājya anvaya āgatam

original: N1.41c/ dhanaṃ saptavidhaṃ śuklam udayo 'apy asya tadvidhaḥ // 41
analyzed: dhanam saptavidham śuklam udayaḥ api asya tadvidhaḥ

original: N1.42a/ kusīdakṛṣivāṇijyaśulkaśilpānuvṛttibhiḥ /
analyzed: kusīda kṛṣi vāṇijya śulka śilpa anuvṛttibhiḥ

original: N1.42c/ kṛtopakārād āptaṃ ca śabalaṃ samudāhṛtam // 42
analyzed: kṛta upakārāt āptam ca śabalam samudāhṛtam

original: N1.43a/ pārśvikadyūtadautyārtipratirūpakasāhasaiḥ/
analyzed: pārśvika dyūta dautya ārti pratirūpaka sāhasaiḥ

original: N1.43c/ vyājenopārjitaṃ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // 43
analyzed: vyājena upārjitam yat ca tat kṛṣṇam samudāhṛtam

original: N1.44a/ tena krayo vikrayaś ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca /
analyzed: tena krayaḥ vikrayaḥ ca dānam grahaṇam eva ca

original: N1.44c/ vividhāś ca pravartante kriyāḥ saṃbhoga eva ca // 44
analyzed: vividhāḥ ca pravartante kriyāḥ saṃbhogaḥ eva ca

original: N1.45a/ yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yatkiṃcit kurute naraḥ /
analyzed: yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yat kiṃcid kurute naraḥ

original: N1.45c/ tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca // 45
analyzed: tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalam pretya ca iha ca

original: N1.46a/ tat punar dvādaśavidhaṃ prativarṇāśrayāt smṛtam /
analyzed: tat punar dvādaśavidham prativarṇa āśrayāt smṛtam

original: N1.46c/ sādhāraṇaṃ syāt trividhaṃ śeṣaṃ navavidhaṃ smṛtam // 46
analyzed: sādhāraṇam syāt trividham śeṣam navavidham smṛtam

original: N1.47a/ kramāgataṃ prītidāyaḥ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
analyzed: krama āgatam prīti dāyaḥ prāptam ca saha bhāryayā

original: N1.47c/ aviśeṣeṇa varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // 47
analyzed: aviśeṣeṇa varṇānām sarveṣām trividham dhanam

original: N1.48a/ vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanaṃ jñeyaṃ brāhmaṇasya trilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: vaiśeṣikam dhanam jñeyam brāhmaṇasya tri lakṣaṇam

original: N1.48c/ pratigraheṇa yallabdhaṃ yājyataḥ śiṣyatas tathā // 48
analyzed: pratigraheṇa yat labdham yājyataḥ śiṣyataḥ tathā

original: N1.49a/ trividhaṃ kṣatriyasyāpi prāhur vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: trividham kṣatriyasya api prāhuḥ vaiśeṣikam dhanam

original: N1.49c/ yuddhopalabdhaṃ kāraś ca daṇḍaś ca vyavahārataḥ // 49
analyzed: yuddha upalabdham kāraḥ ca daṇḍaḥ ca vyavahārataḥ

original: N1.50a/ vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanaṃ jñeyaṃ vaiśyasyāpi trilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: vaiśeṣikam dhanam jñeyam vaiśyasya api tri lakṣaṇam

original: N1.50c/ kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyaiḥ śūdrasyaibhyas tv anugrahāt // 50
analyzed: kṛṣi gorakṣa vāṇijyaiḥ śūdrasya ebhyaḥ tu anugrahāt

original: N1.51a/ sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyo dhanāgamaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyaḥ dhana āgamaḥ

original: N1.51c/ viparyayād adharmyaḥ syān na ced āpad garīyasī // 51
analyzed: viparyayāt adharmyaḥ syāt na ced āpad garīyasī

original: N1.52a/ āpatsv anantarā vṛttir brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate /
analyzed: āpatsu anantarā vṛttiḥ brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate

original: N1.52c/ vaiśyavṛttis tataś coktā na jaghanyā kathaṃcana // 52
analyzed: vaiśya vṛttiḥ tatas ca uktā na jaghanyā kathaṃcana

original: N1.53a/ na kathaṃcana kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ karma vārṣalam /
analyzed: na kathaṃcana kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ karma vārṣalam

original: N1.53c/ vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmaṃ patanīye hi te tayoḥ // 53
analyzed: vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmam patanīye hi te tayoḥ

original: N1.54a/ utkṛṣṭaṃ cāpakṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate /
analyzed: utkṛṣṭam ca apakṛṣṭam ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate

original: N1.54c/ madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarvasādhāraṇe hi te // 54
analyzed: madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarva sādhāraṇe hi te

original: N1.55a/ āpadaṃ brāhmaṇas tīrtvā kṣatravṛttyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ /
analyzed: āpadam brāhmaṇaḥ tīrtvā kṣatra vṛttyā hṛtaiḥ dhanaiḥ

original: N1.55c/ utsṛjet kṣatravṛttiṃ tāṃ kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ // 55
analyzed: utsṛjet kṣatra vṛttim tām kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ

original: N1.56a/ tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau brāhmaṇo ramate rasāt /
analyzed: tasyām eva tu yaḥ vṛttau brāhmaṇaḥ ramate rasāt

original: N1.56c/ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaś cyuto mārgāt so 'apāṅkteyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 56
analyzed: kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaḥ cyutaḥ mārgāt saḥ a pāṅkteyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: N1.57a/ vaiśyavṛttāv avikreyaṃ brāhmaṇasya payo dadhi /
analyzed: vaiśya vṛttau avikreyam brāhmaṇasya payaḥ dadhi

original: N1.57c/ ghṛtaṃ madhu madhūcchiṣṭaṃ lākṣākṣārarasāsavāḥ // 57
analyzed: ghṛtam madhu madhūcchiṣṭam lākṣā kṣāra rasa āsavāḥ

original: N1.58a/ māṃsaudanatilakṣaumasomapuṣpaphalapalāḥ /
analyzed: māṃsa odana tila kṣauma soma puṣpa phala palāḥ

original: N1.58c/ manuṣyaviṣaśastrāmbulavaṇāpūpavīrudhaḥ // 58
analyzed: manuṣya viṣa śastra ambu lavaṇa apūpa vīrudhaḥ

original: N1.59a/ nīlīkauṣeyacarmāsthikutapaikaśaphā mṛdaḥ /
analyzed: nīlī kauṣeya carma asthi kutapa ekaśaphāḥ mṛdaḥ

original: N1.59c/ udaśvitkeśapiṇyākaśākādyauṣadhayas tathā // 59
analyzed: udaśvit keśa piṇyāka śāka ādya oṣadhayaḥ tathā

original: N1.60a/ brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyaṃ śuṣkaṃ dāru tṛṇāni ca /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyam śuṣkam dāru tṛṇāni ca

original: N1.60c/ gandhadravyairakāvetratūlamūlatuśād ṛte // 60
analyzed: ṛte

original: N1.61a/ svayaṃ śīrṇaṃ ca vidalaṃ phalānāṃ badareṅgude /
analyzed: svayam śīrṇam ca vidalam phalānām badara iṅgude

original: N1.61c/ rajjuḥ kārpāsikaṃ sūtraṃ tac ced avikṛtaṃ bhavet // 61
analyzed: rajjuḥ kārpāsikam sūtram tat ced avikṛtam bhavet

original: N1.62a/ aśaktau bheṣajasyārthe yajñahetos tathaiva ca /
analyzed: aśaktau bheṣajasya arthe yajña hetoḥ tathā eva ca

original: N1.62c/ yady avaśyaṃ tu vikreyās tilā dhānyena tatsāmāḥ // 62
analyzed: yadi avaśyam tu vikreyāḥ tilāḥ dhānyena

original: N1.63a/ avikreyāṇi vikrīṇan brāhmaṇaḥ pracyutaḥ pathaḥ /
analyzed: avikreyāṇi vikrīṇan brāhmaṇaḥ pracyutaḥ pathaḥ

original: N1.63c/ mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā // 63
analyzed: mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā

original: N1.64a/ pramāṇāni pramāṇasthaiḥ paripālyāni yatnataḥ /
analyzed: pramāṇāni pramāṇa sthaiḥ paripālyāni yatnataḥ

original: N1.64c/ sīdanti hi pramāṇāni pramāṇair avyavasthitaiḥ // 64
analyzed: sīdanti hi pramāṇāni pramāṇaiḥ avyavasthitaiḥ

original: N1.65a/ likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtaṃ /
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ bhuktiḥ pramāṇam trividham smṛtam

original: N1.65c/ dhanasvīkaraṇe yena dhanī dhanam upāśnute // 65
analyzed: dhana svīkaraṇe yena dhanī dhanam upāśnute

original: N1.66a/ likhitaṃ balavan nityaṃ jīvantas tv eva sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: likhitam balavat nityam jīvantaḥ tu eva sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.66c/ kālātiharaṇād bhuktir iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ // 66
analyzed: kāla atiharaṇāt bhuktiḥ iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ

original: N1.67a/ trividhasyāsya dṛṣṭasya pramāṇasya yathākramam /
analyzed: trividhasya asya dṛṣṭasya pramāṇasya yathākramam

original: N1.67c/ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ guru jñeyaṃ bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī // 67
analyzed: pūrvam pūrvam guru jñeyam bhuktiḥ ebhyaḥ garīyasī

original: N1.68a/ vidyamāne 'api likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu /
analyzed: vidyamāne api likhite jīvatsu api hi sākṣiṣu

original: N1.68c/ viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram // 68
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇām yat na bhuktam na tat sthiram

original: N1.69a/ bhujyamānān parair arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyād upekṣate /
analyzed: bhujyamānān paraiḥ arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyāt upekṣate

original: N1.69c/ samakṣaṃ jīvato 'apy asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe // 69
analyzed: samakṣam jīvataḥ api asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe

original: N1.70a/ yatkiṃcid daśa varṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid daśa varṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī

original: N1.70c/ bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati // 70
analyzed: bhujyamānam paraiḥ tūṣṇīm na sa tat labdhum arhati

original: N1.71a/ upekṣāṃ kurvatas tasya tūṣṇīṃ bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: upekṣām kurvataḥ tasya tūṣṇīm bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ

original: N1.71c/ kāle 'atipanne pūrvokte vyavahāro na sidhyati // 71
analyzed: kāle atipanne pūrva ukte vyavahāraḥ na sidhyati

original: N1.72a/ ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate /
analyzed: ajaḍaḥ ced apogaṇḍaḥ viṣaye ca asya bhujyate

original: N1.72c/ bhuktaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati // 72
analyzed: bhuktam tat vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tat dhanam arhati

original: N1.73a/ ādhiḥ sīmā bāladhanaṃ nikṣepopanidhī striyaḥ /
analyzed: ādhiḥ sīmā bāla dhanam nikṣepa upanidhī striyaḥ

original: N1.73c/ rājasvaṃ śrotriyasvaṃ ca nopabhogena jīryate // 73
analyzed: rāja svam śrotriya svam ca na upabhogena jīryate

original: N1.74a/ pratyakṣaparibhogāc ca svāmino dvidaśāḥ samāḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa paribhogāt ca svāminaḥ dvidaśāḥ samāḥ

original: N1.74c/ ādhyādīny api jīryante strīnarendradhanād ṛte // 74
analyzed: ādhi ādīni api jīryante strī narendra dhanāt ṛte

original: N1.75a/ strīdhanaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ na kadācana jīryate /
analyzed: strīdhanam ca narendrāṇām na kadācana jīryate

original: N1.75c/ anāgamaṃ bhujyamānaṃ vatsarāṇāṃ śatair api // 75
analyzed: anāgamam bhujyamānam vatsarāṇām śataiḥ api

original: N1.76a/ nirbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: nirbhogaḥ yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyeta āgamaḥ kvacid

original: N1.76c/ āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na bhogas tatra kāraṇam // 76
analyzed: āgamaḥ kāraṇam tatra na bhogaḥ tatra kāraṇam

original: N1.77a/ anāgamaṃ bhujyate yan na tad bhogo 'ativartate /
analyzed: anāgamam bhujyate yat na tat bhogaḥ ativartate

original: N1.77c/ prete tu bhoktari dhanaṃ yāti tadvaṃśyabhogyatām // 77
analyzed: prete tu bhoktari dhanam yāti tad vaṃśya bhogya tām

original: N1.78a/ āhartaivābhiyuktaḥ sann arthānām uddharet padam /
analyzed: āhartā eva abhiyuktaḥ san arthānām uddharet padam

original: N1.78c/ bhuktir eva viśuddhiḥ syāt prāptānāṃ pitṛtaḥ kramāt // 78
analyzed: bhuktiḥ eva viśuddhiḥ syāt prāptānām pitṛtaḥ kramāt

original: N1.79a/ anvāhitaṃ hṛtaṃ nyastaṃ balāvaṣṭabdhaṃ yācitam /
analyzed: anvāhitam hṛtam nyastam bala avaṣṭabdham yācitam

original: N1.79c/ apratyakṣaṃ ca yad bhuktaṃ ṣaḍ etāny āgamaṃ vinā // 79
analyzed: apratyakṣam ca yat bhuktam ṣaḍ etāni āgamam vinā

original: N1.80a/ tathārūḍhavivādasya pretasya vyavahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ārūḍha vivādasya pretasya vyavahāriṇaḥ

original: N1.80c/ putreṇa so 'arthaḥ saṃśodhyo na taṃ bhogo 'ativartate // 80
analyzed: putreṇa saḥ arthaḥ saṃśodhyaḥ na tam bhogaḥ ativartate

original: N1.81a/ yad vināgamam apy ūrdhvaṃ bhuktaṃ pūrvais tribhir bhavet /
analyzed: yat vinā āgamam api ūrdhvam bhuktam pūrvaiḥ tribhiḥ bhavet

original: N1.81c/ na tac chakyam apākartuṃ kramāt tripuruṣāgatam // 81
analyzed: na tat śakyam apākartum kramāt tri puruṣa āgatam

original: N1.82a/ santo 'api na pramāṇaṃ syur mṛte dhanini sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: santaḥ api na pramāṇam syuḥ mṛte dhanini sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.82c/ anyatra śrāvitaṃ yat syāt svayam āsannamṛtyunā // 82
analyzed: anyatra śrāvitam yat syāt svayam āsanna mṛtyunā

original: N1.83a/ na hi pratyarthini prete pramāṇaṃ sākṣiṇāṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: na hi pratyarthini prete pramāṇam sākṣiṇām vacaḥ

original: N1.83c/ sākṣimat karaṇaṃ tatra pramāṇaṃ syād viniścaye // 83
analyzed: sākṣimat karaṇam tatra pramāṇam syāt viniścaye

original: N1.84a/ śrāvitas tv ātureṇāpi yas tv artho dharmasaṃhitaḥ /
analyzed: śrāvitaḥ tu ātureṇa api yaḥ tu arthaḥ dharma saṃhitaḥ

original: N1.84c/ mṛte 'api tatra sākṣī syāt ṣaṭsu cānvāhitādiṣu // 84
analyzed: mṛte api tatra sākṣī syāt ṣaṭsu ca anvāhita ādiṣu

original: N1.85a/ kriya rṇādiṣu sarveṣu balavaty uttarottarā /
analyzed: kriya ṛ ṇa ādiṣu sarveṣu balavatī uttarottarā

original: N1.85c/ pratigrahādhikrīteṣu pūrvā pūrvā garīyasī // 85
analyzed: pratigraha ādhi krīteṣu pūrvā pūrvā garīyasī

original: N1.86a/ sthānalābhanimittaṃ hi dānagrahaṇam iṣyate /
analyzed: sthāna lābha nimittam hi dāna grahaṇam iṣyate

original: N1.86c/ tat kusīdam iti proktaṃ tena vṛttiḥ kusīdinām // 86
analyzed: tat kusīdam iti proktam tena vṛttiḥ kusīdinām

original: N1.87a/ kāyikā kālikā caiva kāritā ca tathā smṛtā /
N1.87c/ cakravṛddhiś ca śāstreṣu tasya vṛddhiś caturvidhā // 87
analyzed: cakravṛddhiḥ ca śāstreṣu tasya vṛddhiḥ caturvidhā

original: N1.88a/ kāyāvirodhinī śaśvat paṇapādyā tu kāyikā /
analyzed: kāya avirodhinī śaśvat paṇa pādyā tu kāyikā

original: N1.88c/ pratimāsaṃ sravati yā vṛddhiḥ sā kālikā smṛtā // 88
analyzed: pratimāsam sravati yā vṛddhiḥ sā kālikā smṛtā

original: N1.89a/ vṛddhiḥ sā kāritā nāma ya rṇikena svayaṃkṛtā /
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ sā kāritā nāma yā ṛṇikena svayaṃkṛtā

original: N1.89c/ vṛddher api punar vṛddhiś cakravṛddhir udāhṛtā // 89
analyzed: vṛddheḥ api punar vṛddhiḥ cakravṛddhiḥ udāhṛtā

original: N1.90a/ ṛṇānāṃ sārvabhaumo 'ayaṃ vidhir vṛddhikaraḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṇānām sārvabhaumaḥ ayam vidhiḥ vṛddhi karaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N1.90c/ deśācāravidhis tv anyo yatra rṇam avatiṣṭhati // 90
analyzed: deśa ācāra vidhiḥ tu anyaḥ yatra ṛṇam avatiṣṭhati

original: N1.91a/ dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ caiva tathānyasmiṃś caturguṇam /
analyzed: dviguṇam triguṇam ca eva tathā anyasmin caturguṇam

original: N1.91c/ tathāṣṭaguṇam anyasmin deśe deśe 'avatiṣṭhate // 91
analyzed: tathā aṣṭaguṇam anyasmin deśe deśe avatiṣṭhate

original: N1.92a/ hiraṇyadhānyavastrāṇāṃ vṛddhir dvitricaturguṇā /
analyzed: hiraṇya dhānya vastrāṇām vṛddhiḥ dvi tri caturguṇā

original: N1.92c/ ghṛtasyāṣṭaguṇā vṛddhiḥ strīpaśūnāṃ ca saṃtatiḥ // 92
analyzed: ghṛtasya aṣṭaguṇā vṛddhiḥ strī paśūnām ca saṃtatiḥ

original: N1.93a/ sūtrakarpāsakiṇvānāṃ trapuṣaḥ sīsakasya ca /
analyzed: sūtra karpāsa kiṇvānām trapuṣaḥ sīsakasya ca

original: N1.93c/ āyudhānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ carmaṇas tāmralohayoḥ // 93
analyzed: āyudhānām ca sarveṣām carmaṇaḥ tāmra lohayoḥ

original: N1.94a/ anyeṣāṃ caiva sarveṣām iṣṭakānāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca eva sarveṣām iṣṭakānām tathā eva ca

original: N1.94c/ akṣayyā vṛddhir eteṣāṃ manur āha prajāpatiḥ // 94
analyzed: akṣayyā vṛddhiḥ eteṣām manuḥ āha prajāpatiḥ

original: N1.95a/ tailānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ madyānāṃ madhusarpiṣām /
analyzed: tailānām ca eva sarveṣām madyānām madhu sarpiṣām

original: N1.95c/ vṛddhir aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca // 95
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca

original: N1.96a/ na vṛddhiḥ prītidattānāṃ syād anākāritā kvacit /
analyzed: na vṛddhiḥ prītidattānām syāt an ākāritā kvacid

original: N1.96c/ anākāritam apy ūrdhvaṃ vatsarārdhād vivardhate // 96
analyzed: an ākāritam api ūrdhvam vatsara ardhāt vivardhate

original: N1.97a/ eṣa vṛddhividhiḥ proktaḥ prativṛddhasya dharmataḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vṛddhi vidhiḥ proktaḥ prativṛddhasya dharmataḥ

original: N1.97c/ vṛddhis tu yoktā dhānyānāṃ vārdhuṣyaṃ tad udāhṛtam // 97
analyzed: vṛddhiḥ tu yoktā dhānyānām vārdhuṣyam tat udāhṛtam

original: N1.98a/ āpadaṃ nistared vaiśyaḥ kāmaṃ vārdhuṣakarmaṇā /
analyzed: āpadam nistaret vaiśyaḥ kāmam vārdhuṣa karmaṇā

original: N1.98c/ āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu brāhmaṇasya na vārdhuṣam // 98
analyzed: āpatsu api hi kaṣṭāsu brāhmaṇasya na vārdhuṣam

original: N1.99a/ brāhmaṇasya tu yad deyaṃ sānvayasya na cāsti saḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya tu yat deyam sa anvayasya na ca asti saḥ

original: N1.99c/ svakulyasyāsya nivapet tadabhāve 'asya bandhuṣu // 99
analyzed: sva kulyasya asya nivapet tad abhāve asya bandhuṣu

original: N1.100a/ yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syur na ca saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syuḥ na ca saṃbandhi bāndhavāḥ

original: N1.100c/ tadā dadyāt svajātibhyas teṣv asatsv apsu nikṣipet // 100
analyzed: tadā dadyāt sva jātibhyaḥ teṣu asatsu apsu nikṣipet

original: N1.101a/ gṛhītvopagataṃ dadyād ṛṇikāyodayaṃ dhanī /
analyzed: gṛhītvā upagatam dadyāt ṛṇikāya udayam dhanī

original: N1.101c/ adadad yācyamānas tu śeṣahānim avāpnuyāt // 101
analyzed: adadān yācyamānaḥ tu śeṣa hānim avāpnuyāt

original: N1.102a/ lekhyaṃ dadyād ṛṇe śuddhe tadabhāve pratiśravam /
analyzed: lekhyam dadyāt ṛṇe śuddhe tad abhāve pratiśravam

original: N1.102c/ dhanikarṇikayor evaṃ viśuddhiḥ syāt parasparam // 102
analyzed: dhanika ṛṇikayoḥ evam viśuddhiḥ syāt parasparam

original: N1.103a/ viśrambhahetū dvāv atra pratibhūr ādhir eva ca /
analyzed: viśrambha hetū dvau atra pratibhūḥ ādhiḥ eva ca

original: N1.103c/ likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś ca dve pramāṇe vyaktikārake // 103
analyzed: likhitam sākṣiṇaḥ ca dve pramāṇe vyakti kārake

original: N1.104a/ upasthānāya dānāya pratyayāya tathaiva ca /
analyzed: upasthānāya dānāya pratyayāya tathā eva ca

original: N1.104c/ trividhaḥ pratibhūr dṛṣṭas triṣv evārtheṣu sūribhiḥ //
analyzed: trividhaḥ pratibhūḥ dṛṣṭaḥ triṣu eva artheṣu sūribhiḥ

original: N1.105a/ ṛṇiṣv apratikurvatsu pratyaye vā vivādite /
analyzed: ṛṇiṣu a pratikurvatsu pratyaye vā vivādite

original: N1.105c/ pratibhūs tad ṛṇaṃ dadyād anupasthāpayaṃs tathā //
analyzed: pratibhūḥ tat ṛṇam dadyāt anupasthāpayān tathā

original: N1.106a/ bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'arthaṃ yathākṛtam /
analyzed: bahavaḥ ced pratibhuvaḥ dadyuḥ te artham yathākṛtam

original: N1.106c/ arthe 'aviśeṣite hy eṣu dhaninaś chandataḥ kriyā //
analyzed: arthe aviśeṣite hi eṣu dhaninaḥ chandataḥ kriyā

original: N1.107a/ yaṃ cārthaṃ pratibhūr dadyād dhanikenopapīḍitaḥ /
analyzed: yam ca artham pratibhūḥ dadyāt dhanikena upapīḍitaḥ

original: N1.107c/ ṛṇikas taṃ pratibhuve dviguṇaṃ pratipādayet // 107
analyzed: ṛṇikaḥ tam pratibhuve dviguṇam pratipādayet

original: N1.108a/ adhikriyata ity ādhiḥ sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: adhikriyate iti ādhiḥ sa vijñeyaḥ dvi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: N1.108c/ kṛtakālopaneyaś ca yāvaddeyodyatas tathā // 108
analyzed: kṛta kāla upaneyaḥ ca yāvaddeya udyataḥ tathā

original: N1.109a/ sa punar dvividhaḥ prokto gopyo bhogyas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: sa punar dvividhaḥ proktaḥ gopyaḥ bhogyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N1.109c/ pratidānaṃ tathaivāsya lābhahānir viparyaye // 109
analyzed: pratidānam tathā eva asya lābha hāniḥ viparyaye

original: N1.110a/ pramādād dhaninas tadvad ādhau vikṛtim āgate /
analyzed: pramādāt dhaninaḥ tadvat ādhau vikṛtim āgate

original: N1.110c/vinaṣṭe mūlanāśaḥ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte // 110
analyzed: mūla nāśaḥ syāt daiva rāja kṛtāt ṛte

original: N1.111a/ rakṣyamāṇo 'api yatrādhiḥ kāleneyād asāratām /
analyzed: rakṣyamāṇaḥ api yatra ādhiḥ kālena īyāt asāra tām

original: N1.111c/ ādhir anyo 'adhikartavyo deyaṃ vā dhanine dhanam //
analyzed: ādhiḥ anyaḥ adhikartavyaḥ deyam vā dhanine dhanam

original: N1.112a/ atha śaktivihīnaḥ syād ṛṇī kālaviparyayāt /
analyzed: atha śakti vihīnaḥ syāt ṛṇī kāla viparyayāt

original: N1.112c/ śakyaprekṣam ṛṇaṃ dāpyaḥ kāle kāle yathodayam // 112
analyzed: śakya prekṣam ṛṇam dāpyaḥ kāle kāle yathodayam

original: N1.113a/ śakto vā yadi daurātmyān na dadyād dhanine dhanam /
analyzed: śaktaḥ vā yadi daurātmyāt na dadyāt dhanine dhanam

original: N1.113c/ rājñā dāpayitavyaḥ syād gṛhītvāṃśaṃ tu viṃśakam //
analyzed: rājñā dāpayitavyaḥ syāt gṛhītvā aṃśam tu viṃśakam

original: N1.114a/ naśyed ṛṇaparīmāṇaṃ kāleneha rṇikasya cet /
analyzed: naśyet ṛṇa parīmāṇam kālena iha ṛṇikasya ced

original: N1.114c/ jātisaṃjñādhivāsānām āgamo lekhyataḥ smṛtaḥ // 114
analyzed: jāti saṃjñā adhivāsānām āgamaḥ lekhyataḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N1.115a/ lekhyaṃ tu dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ svahastānyakṛtaṃ tathā /
analyzed: lekhyam tu dvividham jñeyam sva hasta anya kṛtam tathā

original: N1.115c/ asākṣimat sākṣimac ca siddhir deśasthites tayoḥ //
analyzed: asākṣimat sākṣimat ca siddhiḥ deśa sthiteḥ tayoḥ

original: N1.116a/ deśācārāviruddhaṃ yad vyaktādhikṛtalakṣaṇam /
N1.116c/ tat pramāṇaṃ smṛtaṃ lekhyam aviluptakramākṣaram //
analyzed: tat pramāṇam smṛtam lekhyam avilupta krama akṣaram

original: N1.117a/ mattābhiyuktastrībālabalātkārakṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: matta abhiyukta strī bāla balātkāra kṛtam ca yat

original: N1.117c/ tad apramāṇakaraṇaṃ bhītopadhikṛtaṃ tathā // 117
analyzed: tat apramāṇa karaṇam bhīta upadhi kṛtam tathā

original: N1.118a/ mṛtāḥ syuḥ sākṣiṇo yatra dhanikarṇikalekhakāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtāḥ syuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ yatra dhanika ṛṇika lekhakāḥ

original: N1.118c/ tad apy apārthaṃ likhitam ṛte tv ādheḥ sthirāśrayāt //
analyzed: tat api apārtham likhitam ṛte tu ādheḥ sthira āśrayāt

original: N1.119a/ ādhir yo dvividhaḥ prokto jaṅgamaḥ sthāvaras tathā /
analyzed: ādhiḥ yaḥ dvividhaḥ proktaḥ jaṅgamaḥ sthāvaraḥ tathā

original: N1.119c/ siddhir atrobhayasyāsya bhogo yady asti nānyathā // 119
analyzed: siddhiḥ atra ubhayasya asya bhogaḥ yadi asti na anyathā

original: N1.120a/ darśitaṃ pratikālaṃ yac chrāvitaṃ śrāvitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: darśitam prati kālam yat śrāvitam śrāvitam ca yat

original: N1.120c/ lekhyaṃ sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣv api hi sākṣiṣu // 120
analyzed: lekhyam sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣu api hi sākṣiṣu

original: N1.121a/ aśrutārtham adṛṣṭārthaṃ vyavahārārtham eva ca /
analyzed: a śruta artham a dṛṣṭa artham vyavahāra artham eva ca

original: N1.121c/ na lekhyaṃ siddhim āpnoti jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu // 121
analyzed: na lekhyam siddhim āpnoti jīvatsu api hi sākṣiṣu

original: N1.122a/ lekhye deśāntaranyaste dagdhe durlikhite hṛte /
analyzed: lekhye deśa antara nyaste dagdhe durlikhite hṛte

original: N1.122c/ satas tatkālakaraṇam asato dṛṣṭadarśanam // 122
analyzed: sataḥ tad kāla karaṇam asataḥ dṛṣṭa darśanam

original: N1.123a/ yasmin syāt saṃśayo lekhye bhūtābhūtakṛte kvacit /
analyzed: yasmin syāt saṃśayaḥ lekhye bhūta abhūta kṛte kvacid

original: N1.123c/ tatsvahastakriyācihnaprāptiyuktibhir uddharet // 123
analyzed: tad sva hasta kriyā cihna prāpti yuktibhiḥ uddharet

original: N1.124a/ lekhyaṃ yac cānyanāmāṅkaṃ hetvantarakṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: lekhyam yat ca anya nāma aṅkam hetu antara kṛtam bhavet

original: N1.124c/ vipratyaye parīkṣyaṃ tat saṃbandhāgamahetubhiḥ // 124
analyzed: vipratyaye parīkṣyam tat saṃbandha āgama hetubhiḥ

original: N1.124-1a/ lekhyaṃ yac cānyanāmāṅkaṃ hetvantarakṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: lekhyam yat ca anya nāma aṅkam hetu antara kṛtam bhavet

original: N1.124-1c/ vipratyaye parīkṣyaṃ tat saṃbandhāgamahetubhiḥ //
analyzed: vipratyaye parīkṣyam tat saṃbandha āgama hetubhiḥ

original: N1.125a/ likhitaṃ likhitenaiva sākṣimat sākṣibhir haret /
analyzed: likhitam likhitena eva sākṣimat sākṣibhiḥ haret

original: N1.125c/ sākṣibhyo likhitaṃ śreyo likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ // 125
analyzed: sākṣibhyaḥ likhitam śreyaḥ likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.126a/ chinnabhinnahṛtonmṛṣṭanaṣṭadurlikhiteṣu ca /
analyzed: chinna bhinna hṛta unmṛṣṭa naṣṭa durlikhiteṣu ca

original: N1.126c/ kartavyam anyal lekhyaṃ syād eṣa lekhyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kartavyam anyat lekhyam syāt eṣa lekhya vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N1.127a/ saṃdigdheṣu tu kāryeṣu dvayor vivadamānayoḥ /
analyzed: saṃdigdheṣu tu kāryeṣu dvayoḥ vivadamānayoḥ

original: N1.127c/ dṛṣṭaśrutānubhūtatvāt sākṣibhyo vyaktidarśanam //
analyzed: dṛṣṭa śruta anubhūta tvāt sākṣibhyaḥ vyakti darśanam

original: N1.128a/ samakṣadarśanāt sākṣī vijñeyaḥ śrotracakṣuṣoḥ /
analyzed: samakṣa darśanāt sākṣī vijñeyaḥ śrotra cakṣuṣoḥ

original: N1.128c/ śrotrasya yat paro brūte cakṣuṣaḥ kāyakarma yat //
analyzed: śrotrasya yat paras brūte cakṣuṣaḥ kāya karma yat

original: N1.129a/ ekādaśavidhaḥ sākṣī sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: ekādaśavidhaḥ sākṣī sa tu dṛṣṭaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: N1.129c/ kṛtaḥ pañcavidhas teṣāṃ ṣaḍvidho 'akṛta ucyate // 129
analyzed: kṛtaḥ pañcavidhaḥ teṣām ṣaḍvidhaḥ akṛtaḥ ucyate

original: N1.130a/ likhitaḥ smāritaś caiva yadṛcchābhijña eva ca /
analyzed: likhitaḥ smāritaḥ ca eva yadṛcchā abhijñaḥ eva ca

original: N1.130c/ gūḍhaś cottarasākṣī ca sākṣī pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ ca uttara sākṣī ca sākṣī pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N1.131a/ akṛtaḥ ṣaḍvidhaś cāpi sūribhiḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: akṛtaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ ca api sūribhiḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: N1.131c/ grāmaś ca prāḍvivākaś ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām //
analyzed: grāmaḥ ca prāḍvivākaḥ ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām

original: N1.132a/ kāryeṣv abhyantaro yaḥ syād arthinā prahitaś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: kāryeṣu abhyantaraḥ yaḥ syāt arthinā prahitaḥ ca yaḥ

original: N1.132c/ kulaṃ kulavivādeṣu bhaveyus te 'api sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: kulam kula vivādeṣu bhaveyuḥ te api sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.133a/ kulīnā ṛjavaḥ śuddhā janmataḥ karmato 'arthataḥ /
analyzed: kulīnāḥ ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ janmataḥ karmataḥ arthataḥ

original: N1.133c/ tryavarāḥ sākṣiṇo 'anindyāḥ śucayaḥ syuḥ subuddhayaḥ //
analyzed: tryavarāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ anindyāḥ śucayaḥ syuḥ su buddhayaḥ

original: N1.134a/ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā ye cāpy aninditāḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ye ca api aninditāḥ

original: N1.134c/ prativarṇaṃ bhaveyus te sarve sarveṣu vā punaḥ //
analyzed: prativarṇam bhaveyuḥ te sarve sarveṣu vā punar

original: N1.135a/ śreṇīṣu śreṇipuruṣāḥ sveṣu vargeṣu vargiṇaḥ /
analyzed: śreṇīṣu śreṇi puruṣāḥ sveṣu vargeṣu vargiṇaḥ

original: N1.135c/ bahirvāsiṣu bāhyāś ca striyaḥ striṣu ca sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: bahirvāsiṣu bāhyāḥ ca striyaḥ striṣu ca sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.136a/ śreṇyādiṣu tu vargeṣu kaścic ced dveṣyatām iyāt /
analyzed: śreṇi ādiṣu tu vargeṣu kaścid ced dveṣya tām iyāt

original: N1.136c/ tebhya eva na sākṣī syād dveṣṭāraḥ sarva eva te //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ eva na sākṣī syāt dveṣṭāraḥ sarve eva te

original: N1.137a/ asākṣy api hi śāstreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ pañcavidho budhaiḥ /
analyzed: asākṣī api hi śāstreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ pañcavidhaḥ budhaiḥ

original: N1.137c/ vacanād doṣato bhedāt svayamukter mṛtāntaraḥ //
analyzed: vacanāt doṣataḥ bhedāt svayamukteḥ mṛtāntaraḥ

original: N1.138a/ śrotriyādyā vacanataḥ stenādyā doṣadarśanāt /
analyzed: śrotriya ādyāḥ vacanataḥ stena ādyāḥ doṣa darśanāt

original: N1.138c/ bhedād vipratipattiḥ syād vivāde yatra sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: bhedāt vipratipattiḥ syāt vivāde yatra sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.139a/ svayamukter anirdiṣṭaḥ svayam evaitya yo vadet /
analyzed: svayamukteḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ svayam eva etya yaḥ vadet

original: N1.139c/ mṛtāntaro 'arthini prete mumūrṣuśrāvitād ṛte //
analyzed: mṛtāntaraḥ arthini prete mumūrṣu śrāvitāt ṛte

original: N1.140a/ śrotriyās tāpasā vṛddhā ye ca pravrajitā narāḥ /
analyzed: śrotriyāḥ tāpasāḥ vṛddhāḥ ye ca pravrajitāḥ narāḥ

original: N1.140c/ asākṣiṇas te vacanān nātra hetur udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: asākṣiṇaḥ te vacanāt na atra hetuḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: N1.141a/ stenāḥ sāhasikāś caṇḍāḥ kitavā vadhakās tathā /
analyzed: stenāḥ sāhasikāḥ caṇḍāḥ kitavāḥ vadhakāḥ tathā

original: N1.141c/ asākṣiṇas te duṣṭatvāt teṣu satyaṃ na vidyate //
analyzed: asākṣiṇaḥ te duṣṭa tvāt teṣu satyam na vidyate

original: N1.142a/ rājñā parigṛhīteṣu sākṣiṣv ekārthaniścaye /
analyzed: rājñā parigṛhīteṣu sākṣiṣu eka artha niścaye

original: N1.142c/ vacanaṃ yatra bhidyate te syur bhedād asākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: vacanam yatra bhidyate te syuḥ bhedāt asākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.143a/ anirdiṣṭas tu sākṣitve svayam evaitya yo vadet /
analyzed: anirdiṣṭaḥ tu sākṣi tve svayam eva etya yaḥ vadet

original: N1.143c/ sūcīty uktaḥ sa śāstreṣu na sa sākṣitvam arhati //
analyzed: sūcī iti uktaḥ sa śāstreṣu na sa sākṣi tvam arhati

original: N1.144a/ yo 'arthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasminn asati cārthini /
analyzed: yaḥ arthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasmin asati ca arthini

original: N1.144c/ kva tad vadatu sākṣitvam ity asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ //
analyzed: kva tat vadatu sākṣi tvam iti asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ

original: N1.144-1a/ yo 'arthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasminn asati cārthini /
analyzed: yaḥ arthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasmin asati ca arthini

original: N1.144-1c/ kva tad vadatu sākṣitvam ity asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ //
analyzed: kva tat vadatu sākṣi tvam iti asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ

original: N1.145a/ dvayor vivadator arthe dvayoḥ satsu ca sākṣiṣu /
analyzed: dvayoḥ vivadatoḥ arthe dvayoḥ satsu ca sākṣiṣu

original: N1.145c/ pūrvapakṣo bhaved yasya bhaveyus tasya sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pūrvapakṣaḥ bhavet yasya bhaveyuḥ tasya sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.146a/ ādharyaṃ pūrvapakṣasya yasminn arthe vaśād bhavet /
analyzed: ādharyam pūrvapakṣasya yasmin arthe vaśāt bhavet

original: N1.146c/ praṣṭavyāḥ sākṣiṇas tatra vivāde prativādinaḥ //
analyzed: praṣṭavyāḥ sākṣiṇaḥ tatra vivāde prativādinaḥ

original: N1.147a/ na pareṇa samuddiṣṭam upeyāt sākṣiṇaṃ rahaḥ /
analyzed: na pareṇa samuddiṣṭam upeyāt sākṣiṇam rahaḥ

original: N1.147c/ bhedayet taṃ na cānyena hīyetaivaṃ samācaran //
analyzed: bhedayet tam na ca anyena hīyeta evam samācaran

original: N1.148a/ sākṣy uddiṣṭo yadi preyād gacched vāpi digantaram /
analyzed: sākṣī uddiṣṭaḥ yadi preyāt gacchet vā api diś antaram

original: N1.148c/ tacchrotāraḥ pramāṇaṃ syuḥ pramāṇaṃ hy uttarakriyā //
analyzed: tad śrotāraḥ pramāṇam syuḥ pramāṇam hi uttara kriyā

original: N1.149a/ sudīrgheṇāpi kālena likhitaṃ siddhim āpnuyāt /
analyzed: su dīrgheṇa api kālena likhitam siddhim āpnuyāt

original: N1.149c/ jānatā cātmanā lekhyaṃ ajānānas tu lekhayet //
analyzed: jānatā ca ātmanā lekhyam a jānānaḥ tu lekhayet

original: N1.150a/ siddhir uktāṣṭamād varṣāt smāritasyeha sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: siddhiḥ uktā aṣṭamāt varṣāt smāritasya iha sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.150c/ ā pañcamāt tathā siddhir yadṛcchopagatasya tu //
analyzed: pañcamāt tathā siddhiḥ yadṛcchā upagatasya tu

original: N1.151a/ ā tṛtīyāt tathā varṣāt siddhir gūḍhasya sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīyāt tathā varṣāt siddhiḥ gūḍhasya sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.151c/ ā vai saṃvatsarāt siddhiṃ vadanty uttarasākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: ā vai saṃvatsarāt siddhim vadanti uttara sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.152a/ athavā kālaniyamo na dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣiṇaṃ prati /
analyzed: athavā kāla niyamaḥ na dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣiṇam prati

original: N1.152c/ smṛtyapekṣaṃ hi sākṣitvam āhuḥ śāstravido janāḥ //
analyzed: smṛti apekṣam hi sākṣi tvam āhuḥ śāstra vidaḥ janāḥ

original: N1.153a/ yasya nopahatā puṃsaḥ smṛtiḥ śrotraṃ ca nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: yasya nā upahatā puṃsaḥ smṛtiḥ śrotram ca nityaśas

original: N1.153c/ sudīrgheṇāpi kālena sa sākṣī sākṣyam arhati //
analyzed: su dīrgheṇa api kālena sa sākṣī sākṣyam arhati

original: N1.154a/ asākṣipratyayās tv anye ṣaḍvivādāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: asākṣi pratyayāḥ tu anye ṣaṭ vivādāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: N1.154c/ lakṣaṇāny eva sākṣitvaṃ eṣām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: lakṣaṇāni eva sākṣi tvam eṣām āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.155a/ ulkāhasto 'agnido jñeyaḥ śastrapāṇis tu ghātakaḥ /
analyzed: ulkā hastaḥ agnidaḥ jñeyaḥ śastra pāṇiḥ tu ghātakaḥ

original: N1.155c/ keśākeśigṛhītaś ca yugapat pāradārikaḥ //
analyzed: keśākeśi gṛhītaḥ ca yugapad pāradārikaḥ

original: N1.156a/ kuddālapāṇir vijñeyaḥ setubhettā samīpagaḥ /
N1.156c/ tathā kuṭhārapāṇiś ca vanachettā prakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: tathā kuṭhāra pāṇiḥ ca vana chettā prakīrtitaḥ

original: N1.157a/ abhyagracihno vijñeyo daṇḍapāruṣyakṛn naraḥ /
N1.157c/ asākṣipratyayā hy ete pāruṣye tu parīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: asākṣi pratyayāḥ hi ete pāruṣye tu parīkṣaṇam

original: N1.158a/ kaścit kṛtvātmanaś cihnaṃ dveṣāt param upadravet /
analyzed: kaścid kṛtvā ātmanaḥ cihnam dveṣāt param upadravet

original: N1.158c/ hetvarthagatisāmarthyais tatra yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam //
analyzed: hetu artha gati sāmarthyaiḥ tatra yuktam parīkṣaṇam

original: N1.159a/ nārthasaṃbandhino nāptā na sahāyā na vairiṇaḥ /
analyzed: na artha saṃbandhinaḥ na āptāḥ na sahāyāḥ na vairiṇaḥ

original: N1.159c/ na dṛṣṭadoṣāḥ praṣṭavyāś na vyādhyārtā na dūṣitāḥ //
analyzed: na dṛṣṭa doṣāḥ praṣṭavyāḥ na vyādhi ārtāḥ na dūṣitāḥ

original: N1.160a/ dāsanaikṛtikāśraddhavṛddhastrībālacākrikāḥ /
analyzed: dāsa naikṛtika aśraddha vṛddha strī bāla cākrikāḥ

original: N1.160c/ mattonmattapramattārtakitavagrāmayājakāḥ //
analyzed: matta unmatta pramatta ārta kitava grāmayājakāḥ

original: N1.161a/ mahāpathikasāmudravaṇikpravrajitāturāḥ /
analyzed: mahāpathika sāmudra vaṇij pravrajita āturāḥ

original: N1.161c/ lubdhakaśrotriyācārahīnaklībakuśīlavāḥ //
analyzed: lubdhaka śrotriya ācāra hīna klība kuśīlavāḥ

original: N1.162a/ nāstikavrātyadārāgnityāgino 'ayājyayājakāḥ /
analyzed: nāstika vrātya dāra agni tyāginaḥ a yājya yājakāḥ

original: N1.162c/ ekasthālīsahāyāricarajñātisanābhayaḥ //
analyzed: eka sthālī sahāya ari cara jñāti sanābhayaḥ

original: N1.163a/ prāgdṛṣṭadoṣaśailūṣaviṣajīvyahituṇḍikāḥ /
analyzed: prāk dṛṣṭa doṣa śailūṣa viṣa jīvi ahituṇḍikāḥ

original: N1.163c/ garadāgnidakīnāśaśūdrāputropapātikāḥ // a
analyzed: garada agnida kīnāśa śūdrā putra upapātikāḥ

original: N1.164a/ klāntasāhasikaśrāntanirdhanāntyāvasāyinaḥ /
analyzed: klānta sāhasika śrānta nirdhana antyāvasāyinaḥ

original: N1.164c/ bhinnavṛttāsamāvṛttajaḍatailikamūlikāḥ //
analyzed: bhinna vṛtta asama avṛtta jaḍa tailika mūlikāḥ

original: N1.165a/ bhūtāviṣṭanṛpadviṣṭavarṣanakṣatrasūcakāḥ /
analyzed: bhūta āviṣṭa nṛpa dviṣṭa varṣa nakṣatra sūcakāḥ

original: N1.165c/ aghaśaṃsyātmavikretṛhīnāṅgabhagavṛttayaḥ //
analyzed: agha śaṃsi ātma vikretṛ hīna aṅga bhaga vṛttayaḥ

original: N1.166a/ kunakhī śyāvadan śvitrimitradhrukśaṭhaśauṇḍikāḥ /
analyzed: kunakhī śvitri mitra dhruk śaṭha śauṇḍikāḥ

original: N1.166c/ aindrajālikalubdhograśreṇīgaṇavirodhinaḥ //
analyzed: aindrajālika lubdha ugra śreṇī gaṇa virodhinaḥ

original: N1.167a/ vadhakṛccitrakṛnmaṅkhaḥ patitaḥ kūṭakārakaḥ /
analyzed: patitaḥ kūṭa kārakaḥ

original: N1.167c/ kuhakaḥ pratyavasitas taskaro rājapūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: kuhakaḥ pratyavasitaḥ taskaraḥ rāja pūruṣaḥ

original: N1.168a/ manuṣyaviṣaśastrāmbulavaṇāpūpavīrudhām /
analyzed: manuṣya viṣa śastra ambu lavaṇa apūpa vīrudhām

original: N1.168c/ vikretā brāhmaṇaś caiva dvijo vārdhuṣikaś ca yaḥ //
analyzed: vikretā brāhmaṇaḥ ca eva dvijaḥ vārdhuṣikaḥ ca yaḥ

original: N1.169a/ cyutaḥ svadharmāt kulikaḥ stāvako hīnasevakaḥ /
analyzed: cyutaḥ svadharmāt kulikaḥ stāvakaḥ hīna sevakaḥ

original: N1.169c/ pitrā vivadamānaś ca bhedakṛc cety asākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pitrā vivadamānaḥ ca bheda kṛt ca iti asākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.170a/ asākṣiṇo ye nirdiṣṭā dāsanaikṛtikādayaḥ /
analyzed: asākṣiṇaḥ ye nirdiṣṭāḥ dāsa naikṛtika ādayaḥ

original: N1.170c/ kāryagauravam āsādya bhaveyus te 'api sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: kārya gauravam āsādya bhaveyuḥ te api sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.171a/ sāhaseṣu ca sarveṣu steyasaṃgrahaṇeṣu ca /
analyzed: sāhaseṣu ca sarveṣu steya saṃgrahaṇeṣu ca

original: N1.171c/ pāruṣyayoś cāpy ubhayor na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pāruṣyayoḥ ca api ubhayoḥ na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.172a/ teṣām api na bālaḥ syān naiko na strī na kūṭakṛt /
analyzed: teṣām api na bālaḥ syāt na ekaḥ na strī na kūṭa kṛt

original: N1.172c/ na bāndhavo na cārātir brūyus te sākṣyam anyathā //
analyzed: na bāndhavaḥ na ca arātiḥ brūyuḥ te sākṣyam anyathā

original: N1.173a/ bālo 'ajñānād asatyāt strī pāpābhyāsāc ca kūṭakṛt /
analyzed: bālaḥ ajñānāt asatyāt strī pāpa abhyāsāt ca kūṭa kṛt

original: N1.173c/ vibrūyād bāndhavaḥ snehād vairaniryātanād ariḥ //
analyzed: vibrūyāt bāndhavaḥ snehāt vaira niryātanāt ariḥ

original: N1.174a/ athavānumato yaḥ syād dvayor vivadamānayoḥ /
analyzed: athavā anumataḥ yaḥ syāt dvayoḥ vivadamānayoḥ

original: N1.174c/ asākṣy eko 'api sākṣitve praṣṭavyaḥ syāt sa saṃsadi //
analyzed: asākṣī ekaḥ api sākṣi tve praṣṭavyaḥ syāt sa saṃsadi

original: N1.175a/ yas tv ātmadoṣabhinnatvād asvastha iva lakṣyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tu ātma doṣa bhinna tvāt asvasthaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: N1.175c/ sthānāt sthānāntaraṃ gacched ekaikaṃ copadhāvati //
analyzed: sthānāt sthāna antaram gacchet ekaikam ca upadhāvati

original: N1.176a/ kāsate 'anibhṛto 'akasmād abhīkṣṇaṃ niśvasaty api /
analyzed: kāsate a nibhṛtaḥ akasmāt abhīkṣṇam niśvasati api

original: N1.176c/ bhūmiṃ likhati pādābhyāṃ bāhu vāso dhunoti ca //
analyzed: bhūmim likhati pādābhyām bāhu vāsaḥ dhunoti ca

original: N1.177a/ bhidyate mukhavarṇo 'asya lalāṭaṃ svidyate tathā /
analyzed: bhidyate mukha varṇaḥ asya lalāṭam svidyate tathā

original: N1.177c/ śoṣam āgacchataś coṣṭhāv ūrdhvaṃ tiryak ca vīkṣate //
analyzed: śoṣam āgacchataḥ ca uṣṭhau ūrdhvam tiryak ca vīkṣate

original: N1.178a/ tvaramāṇa ivābaddham apṛṣṭo bahu bhāṣate /
analyzed: tvaramāṇaḥ iva abaddham apṛṣṭaḥ bahu bhāṣate

original: N1.178c/ kūṭasākṣī sa vijñeyas taṃ pāpaṃ vinayen nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: kūṭa sākṣī sa vijñeyaḥ tam pāpam vinayet nṛpaḥ

original: N1.179a/ śrāvayitvā ca yo 'anyebhyaḥ sākṣitvaṃ tad vinihnute /
analyzed: śrāvayitvā ca yaḥ anyebhyaḥ sākṣi tvam tat vinihnute

original: N1.179c/ sa vineyo bhṛśataraṃ kūṭasākṣyadhiko hi saḥ //
analyzed: sa vineyaḥ bhṛśataram kūṭa sākṣī adhikaḥ hi saḥ

original: N1.180a/ āhūya sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchen niyamya śapathair bhṛśam /
analyzed: āhūya sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchet niyamya śapathaiḥ bhṛśam

original: N1.180c/ samastān viditācārān vijñātārthān pṛthak pṛthak //
analyzed: samastān vidita ācārān vijñāta arthān pṛthak pṛthak

original: N1.181a/ satyena śāpayed vipraṃ kṣatriyaṃ vāhanāyudhaiḥ /
analyzed: satyena śāpayet vipram kṣatriyam vāhana āyudhaiḥ

original: N1.181c/ gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ //
analyzed: go bīja kāñcanaiḥ vaiśyam śūdram sarvaiḥ tu pātakaiḥ

original: N1.182a/ purāṇair dharmavacanaiḥ satyamāhātmyakīrtanaiḥ /
analyzed: purāṇaiḥ dharma vacanaiḥ satya māhātmya kīrtanaiḥ

original: N1.182c/ anṛtasyāpavādaiś ca bhṛśam uttrāsya sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: anṛtasya apavādaiḥ ca bhṛśam uttrāsya sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.183a/ nagno muṇḍaḥ kapālena bhikṣārthī kṣutpipāsitaḥ /
analyzed: nagnaḥ muṇḍaḥ kapālena bhikṣā arthī kṣudh pipāsitaḥ

original: N1.183c/ dīnaḥ śatrugṛhaṃ gacched yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet //
analyzed: dīnaḥ śatru gṛham gacchet yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtam vadet

original: N1.184a/ nagare pratiruddhaḥ san bahirdvāre bubhukṣitaḥ /
analyzed: nagare pratiruddhaḥ san bahirdvāre bubhukṣitaḥ

original: N1.184c/ amitrān bhūyaśaḥ paśyed yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet //
analyzed: amitrān bhūyaśas paśyet yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtam vadet

original: N1.185a/ yāṃ rātrim adhivinnā strī yāṃ caivākṣaparājitaḥ /
analyzed: yām rātrim adhivinnā strī yām ca eva akṣa parājitaḥ

original: N1.185c/ yāṃ ca bhārābhitaptāṅgo durvivaktā sa tāṃ vaset //
analyzed: yām ca bhāra abhitapta aṅgaḥ durvivaktā sa tām vaset

original: N1.186a/ sākṣī sākṣyasamuddeśe gokarṇaśithilaṃ caran /
analyzed: sākṣī sākṣya samuddeśe gokarṇa śithilam caran

original: N1.186c/ sahasraṃ vāruṇān pāśān ātmani pratimuñcati //
analyzed: sahasram vāruṇān pāśān ātmani pratimuñcati

original: N1.187a/ tasya varṣaśate pūrṇe pāśam ekaṃ pramucyate /
analyzed: tasya varṣa śate pūrṇe pāśam ekam pramucyate

original: N1.187c/ evaṃ sa bandhanāt tasmān mucyate niyutāḥ samāḥ //
analyzed: evam sa bandhanāt tasmāt mucyate niyutāḥ samāḥ

original: N1.188a/ yāvato bāndhavāṃs yasmin hanti sākṣye 'anṛtaṃ vadan /
analyzed: yāvataḥ bāndhavān yasmin hanti sākṣye anṛtam vadan

original: N1.188c/ tāvataḥ saṃkhyayā tasmin śṛṇu saumyānupūrvaśaḥ //
analyzed: tāvataḥ saṃkhyayā tasmin śṛṇu saumya anupūrvaśas

original: N1.189a/ pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte /
analyzed: pañca paśu anṛte hanti daśa hanti gava anṛte

original: N1.189c/ śatam aśvānṛte hanti sahasraṃ puruṣānṛte //
analyzed: śatam aśva anṛte hanti sahasram puruṣa anṛte

original: N1.190a/ hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'anṛtaṃ vadan /
analyzed: hanti jātān a jātān ca hiraṇya arthe anṛtam vadan

original: N1.190c/ sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti mā sma bhūmyanṛtaṃ vadīḥ //
analyzed: sarvam bhūmi anṛte hanti mā sma bhūmi anṛtam vadīḥ

original: N1.191a/ ekam evādvitīyaṃ tat prāhuḥ pāvanam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: ekam eva advitīyam tat prāhuḥ pāvanam ātmanaḥ

original: N1.191c/ satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva //
analyzed: satyam svargasya sopānam pārāvārasya nauḥ iva

original: N1.192a/ aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam /
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasram ca satyam ca tulayā dhṛtam

original: N1.192c/ aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate //
analyzed: aśvamedha sahasrāt hi satyam eva viśiṣyate

original: N1.193a/ varaṃ kūpaśatād vāpi varaṃ vāpīśatāt kratuḥ /
analyzed: varam kūpa śatāt vā api varam vāpī śatāt kratuḥ

original: N1.193c/ varaṃ kratuśatāt putraḥ satyaṃ putraśatād varam //
analyzed: varam kratu śatāt putraḥ satyam putra śatāt varam

original: N1.194a/ bhūr dhārayati satyena satyenodeti bhāskaraḥ /
analyzed: bhūḥ dhārayati satyena satyena udeti bhāskaraḥ

original: N1.194c/ satyena vāyuḥ pavate satyenāpaḥ sravanti ca //
analyzed: satyena vāyuḥ pavate satyena apaḥ sravanti ca

original: N1.195a/ satyam eva paraṃ dānaṃ satyam eva paraṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: satyam eva param dānam satyam eva param tapaḥ

original: N1.195c/ satyam eva paro dharmo lokānām iti naḥ śrutam //
analyzed: satyam eva paraḥ dharmaḥ lokānām iti naḥ śrutam

original: N1.196a/ satyaṃ devāḥ samāsena manuṣyās tv anṛtaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: satyam devāḥ samāsena manuṣyāḥ tu anṛtam smṛtam

original: N1.196c/ ihaiva tasya devatvaṃ yasya satye sthitā matiḥ //
analyzed: iha eva tasya deva tvam yasya satye sthitā matiḥ

original: N1.197a/ satyaṃ brūhy anṛtaṃ tyaktvā satyena svargam eṣyasi /
analyzed: satyam brūhi anṛtam tyaktvā satyena svargam eṣyasi

original: N1.197c/ uktvānṛtaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakaṃ pratipatsyate //
analyzed: uktvā anṛtam mahā ghoram narakam pratipatsyate

original: N1.198a/ nirayeṣu ca te śaśvaj jihvām utkṛtya dāruṇāḥ /
analyzed: nirayeṣu ca te śaśvat jihvām utkṛtya dāruṇāḥ

original: N1.198c/ asibhiḥ śātayiṣyanti balino yamakiṃkarāḥ //
analyzed: asibhiḥ śātayiṣyanti balinaḥ yama kiṃkarāḥ

original: N1.199a/ śūlair bhetsyanti cākruddhāḥ krośantam aparāyaṇam /
analyzed: śūlaiḥ bhetsyanti ca ākruddhāḥ krośantam aparāyaṇam

original: N1.199c/ avākśirasam utkṣipya kṣepsyanty agnihradeṣu ca //
analyzed: avākśirasam utkṣipya kṣepsyanti agni hradeṣu ca

original: N1.200a/ anubhūya ca duḥkhās tāś ciraṃ narakavedanāḥ /
analyzed: anubhūya ca duḥkhāḥ tāḥ ciram naraka vedanāḥ

original: N1.200c/ iha yāsyasy abhavyāsu gṛdhrakākādiyoniṣu //
analyzed: iha yāsyasi abhavyāsu gṛdhra kāka ādi yoniṣu

original: N1.201a/ jñātvaitān anṛte doṣāñ jñātvā satye ca sadguṇān /
analyzed: jñātvā etān anṛte doṣām jñātvā satye ca sat guṇān

original: N1.201c/ satyaṃ vadoddharātmānaṃ mātmānaṃ pātayiṣyasi //
analyzed: satyam vada uddhara ātmānam mā ātmānam pātayiṣyasi

original: N1.202a/ na bāndhavā na suhṛdo na dhanāni mahānty api /
analyzed: na bāndhavāḥ na suhṛdaḥ na dhanāni mahānti api

original: N1.202c/alaṃ tārayituṃ śaktās tamasy ugre nimajjataḥ //
analyzed: tārayitum śaktāḥ tamasi ugre nimajjataḥ

original: N1.203a/ pitaras tv avalambante tvayi sākṣitvam āgate /
analyzed: pitaraḥ tu avalambante tvayi sākṣi tvam āgate

original: N1.203c/ tārayiṣyati kiṃvāsmān ātmānaṃ pātayiṣyati //
analyzed: tārayiṣyati kiṃvā asmān ātmānam pātayiṣyati

original: N1.204a/ satyam ātmā manuṣyasya satye sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: satyam ātmā manuṣyasya satye sarvam pratiṣṭhitam

original: N1.204c/ sarvathaivātmanātmānaṃ śreyasā yojayiṣyasi //
analyzed: sarvathā eva ātmanā ātmānam śreyasā yojayiṣyasi

original: N1.205a/ yāṃ ca rātrim ajaniṣṭhā yāṃ rātriṃ ca mariṣyasi /
analyzed: yām ca rātrim ajaniṣṭhāḥ yām rātrim ca mariṣyasi

original: N1.205c/ vṛthā tadantaraṃ te syāt kuryāś cet satyam anyathā //
analyzed: vṛthā tad antaram te syāt kuryāḥ ced satyam anyathā

original: N1.206a/ nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ param /
analyzed: na asti satyāt paraḥ dharmaḥ na anṛtāt pātakam param

original: N1.206c/ sākṣidharme viśeṣeṇa satyam eva vadet tataḥ //
analyzed: sākṣi dharme viśeṣeṇa satyam eva vadet tatas

original: N1.207a/ yaḥ parārthe praharati svāṃ vācaṃ puruṣādhamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ para arthe praharati svām vācam puruṣa adhamaḥ

original: N1.207c/ ātmārthe kiṃ na kuryāt sa pāpo narakanirbhayaḥ //
analyzed: ātma arthe kim na kuryāt sa pāpaḥ naraka nirbhayaḥ

original: N1.208a/ arthā vai vāci niyatā vāṅmūlā vāgviniḥsṛtāḥ /
analyzed: arthāḥ vai vāci niyatāḥ vāc mūlāḥ vāc viniḥsṛtāḥ

original: N1.208c/ yo hy etāṃ stenayed vācaṃ sa sarvasteyakṛn naraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ hi etām stenayet vācam sa sarva steya kṛt naraḥ

original: N1.209a/ sākṣivipratipattau tu pramāṇaṃ bahavo yataḥ /
analyzed: sākṣi vipratipattau tu pramāṇam bahavaḥ yatas

original: N1.209c/ tatsāmye śucayo grāhyās tatsāmye smṛtimattarāḥ //
analyzed: tad sāmye śucayaḥ grāhyāḥ tad sāmye smṛtimattarāḥ

original: N1.210a/ smṛtimatsākṣisāmyaṃ tu vivāde yatra dṛśyate /
analyzed: smṛtimat sākṣi sāmyam tu vivāde yatra dṛśyate

original: N1.210c/ sūkṣmatvāt sākṣidharmasya sākṣyaṃ vyāvartate punaḥ //
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt sākṣi dharmasya sākṣyam vyāvartate punar

original: N1.211a/ nirdiṣṭeṣv arthajāteṣu sākṣī cet sākṣyam āgataḥ /
analyzed: nirdiṣṭeṣu artha jāteṣu sākṣī ced sākṣyam āgataḥ

original: N1.211c/ na brūyād akṣarasamaṃ na tan nigaditaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: na brūyāt akṣara samam na tat nigaditam bhavet

original: N1.212a/ deśakālavayodravyapramāṇākṛtijātiṣu /
analyzed: deśa kāla vayaḥ dravya pramāṇa ākṛti jātiṣu

original: N1.212c/ yatra vipratipattiḥ syāt sākṣyaṃ tad asad ucyate //
analyzed: yatra vipratipattiḥ syāt sākṣyam tat asat ucyate

original: N1.213a/ ūnam abhyadhikaṃ cārthaṃ prabrūyur yatra sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ūnam abhyadhikam ca artham prabrūyuḥ yatra sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.213c/ tad apy anuktaṃ vijñeyam eṣa sākṣyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tat api anuktam vijñeyam eṣa sākṣya vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N1.214a/ pramādād dhanino yatra na syāl lekhyaṃ na sākṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: pramādāt dhaninaḥ yatra na syāt lekhyam na sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N1.214c/ arthaṃ cāpahnuyād vādī tatroktas trividho vidhiḥ //
analyzed: artham ca apahnuyāt vādī tatra uktaḥ trividhaḥ vidhiḥ

original: N1.215a/ codanā pratikālaṃ ca yuktileśas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: codanā prati kālam ca yukti leśaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N1.215c/ tṛtīyaḥ śapathaś coktas tair evaṃ sādhayet kramāt //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ śapathaḥ ca uktaḥ taiḥ evam sādhayet kramāt

original: N1.216a/ abhīkṣṇaṃ codyamāno yaḥ pratihanyān na tadvacaḥ /
analyzed: abhīkṣṇam codyamānaḥ yaḥ pratihanyāt na tad vacaḥ

original: N1.216c/ tricatuḥpañcakṛtvo vā parato 'arthaṃ tam āvahet //
analyzed: tri catur pañca kṛtvas vā paratas artham tam āvahet

original: N1.217a/ codanāpratighāte tu yuktileśais tam anviyāt /
analyzed: codanā pratighāte tu yukti leśaiḥ tam anviyāt

original: N1.217c/ deśakālārthasaṃbandhaparimāṇakriyādibhiḥ //
analyzed: deśa kāla artha saṃbandha parimāṇa kriyā ādibhiḥ

original: N1.218a/ yuktiṣv apy asamarthāsu śapathair enam ardayet /
analyzed: yuktiṣu api asamarthāsu śapathaiḥ enam ardayet

original: N1.218c/ arthakālabalāpekṣam agnyambusukṛtādibhiḥ //
analyzed: artha kāla bala apekṣam agni ambu sukṛta ādibhiḥ

original: N1.219a/ dīptāgnir yaṃ na dahati yam antardhārayanty āpaḥ /
analyzed: dīpta agniḥ yam na dahati yam antardhārayanti āpaḥ

original: N1.219c/ sa taraty abhiśāpaṃ taṃ kilbiṣī syād viparyaye //
analyzed: sa tarati abhiśāpam tam kilbiṣī syāt viparyaye

original: N1.220a/ strīṇāṃ śīlābhiyogeṣu steyasāhasayor api /
analyzed: strīṇām śīla abhiyogeṣu steya sāhasayoḥ api

original: N1.220c/ eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ sarvārthāpahnaveṣu ca //
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sarva artha apahnaveṣu ca

original: N1.221a/ śapathā hy api devānām ṛṣīṇām api ca smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: śapathāḥ hi api devānām ṛṣīṇām api ca smṛtāḥ

original: N1.221c/ vasiṣṭhaḥ śapathaṃ śepe yātudhāne tu śaṅkitaḥ //
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ śapatham śepe yātudhāne tu śaṅkitaḥ

original: N1.222a/ saptarṣayas tathendrāya puṣkarārthe samāgatāḥ /
analyzed: saptarṣayaḥ tathā indrāya puṣkara arthe samāgatāḥ

original: N1.222c/ śepuḥ śapatham avyagrāḥ parasparaviśuddhaye //
analyzed: śepuḥ śapatham avyagrāḥ paraspara viśuddhaye

original: N1.223a/ ayuktaṃ sāhasaṃ kṛtvā pratyāpattiṃ bhajeta yaḥ /
analyzed: ayuktam sāhasam kṛtvā pratyāpattim bhajeta yaḥ

original: N1.223c/ brūyāt svayaṃ vā sadasi tasyārdhavinayaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: brūyāt svayam vā sadasi tasya ardha vinayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N1.224a/ gūhamānas tu daurātmyād yadi pāpaṃ sa jīyate /
analyzed: gūhamānaḥ tu daurātmyāt yadi pāpam sa jīyate

original: N1.224c/ sabhyāś cātra na tuṣyanti tīvro daṇḍaś ca pātyate //
analyzed: sabhyāḥ ca atra na tuṣyanti tīvraḥ daṇḍaḥ ca pātyate

original: 2.nikṣipaḥ
analyzed: nikṣipaḥ

original: N2.01a/ svadravyaṃ yatra viśrambhān nikṣipaty aviśaṅkitaḥ /
analyzed: sva dravyam yatra viśrambhāt nikṣipati a viśaṅkitaḥ

original: N2.01c/ nikṣepo nāma tat proktaṃ vyavahārapadaṃ budhaiḥ //
analyzed: nikṣepaḥ nāma tat proktam vyavahāra padam budhaiḥ

original: N2.02a/ anyadravyavyavahitaṃ dravyam avyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: anya dravya vyavahitam dravyam avyākṛtam ca yat

original: N2.02c/ nikṣipyate paragṛhe tad aupanidhikaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: nikṣipyate para gṛhe tat aupanidhikam smṛtam

original: N2.03a/ sa punar dvividhaḥ proktaḥ sākṣimān itaras tathā /
analyzed: sa punar dvividhaḥ proktaḥ sākṣimān itaraḥ tathā

original: N2.03c/ pratidānaṃ tathaivāsya pratyayaḥ syād viparyaye //
analyzed: pratidānam tathā eva asya pratyayaḥ syāt viparyaye

original: N2.04a/ yācyamānas tu yo dātrā nikṣepaṃ na prayacchati /
analyzed: yācyamānaḥ tu yaḥ dātrā nikṣepam na prayacchati

original: N2.04c/ daṇḍyaḥ sa rājñā dāpyaś ca naṣṭe dāpyaś ca tatsamam //
analyzed: daṇḍyaḥ sa rājñā dāpyaḥ ca naṣṭe dāpyaḥ ca tad samam

original: N2.05a/ yaś cārthaṃ sādhayet tena nikṣeptur ananujñayā /
analyzed: yaḥ ca artham sādhayet tena nikṣeptuḥ ananujñayā

original: N2.05c/ tatrāpi daṇḍyaḥ sa bhavet tac ca sodayam āvahet //
analyzed: tatra api daṇḍyaḥ sa bhavet tat ca sa udayam āvahet

original: N2.06a/ grahītuḥ saha yo 'arthena naṣṭo naṣṭaḥ sa dāyinaḥ /
analyzed: grahītuḥ saha yaḥ arthena naṣṭaḥ naṣṭaḥ sa dāyinaḥ

original: N2.06c/ daivarājakṛte tadvan na cet taj jihmakāritam //
analyzed: daiva rāja kṛte tadvat na ced tat jihma kāritam

original: N2.07a/ eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭo yācitānvāhitādiṣu /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yācita anvāhita ādiṣu

original: N2.07c/ śilpiṣūpanidhau nyāse pratinyāse tathaiva ca //
analyzed: śilpiṣu upanidhau nyāse pratinyāse tathā eva ca

original: N2.08a/ pratigṛhṇāti pogaṇḍaṃ yaś ca sapradhanaṃ naraḥ /
analyzed: pratigṛhṇāti pogaṇḍam yaḥ ca sa pradhanam naraḥ

original: N2.08c/ tasyāpy eṣa bhaved dharmaḥ ṣaḍ ete vidhayaḥ samāḥ //
analyzed: tasya api eṣa bhavet dharmaḥ ṣaṭ ete vidhayaḥ samāḥ

original: 3.saṃbhūyasamutthānam
analyzed: saṃbhūya samutthānam

original: N3.01a/ vaṇikprabhṛtayo yatra karma saṃbhūya kurvate /
analyzed: vaṇij prabhṛtayaḥ yatra karma saṃbhūya kurvate

original: N3.01c/ tat saṃbhūyasamutthānaṃ vyavahārapadaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: tat saṃbhūyasamutthānam vyavahāra padam smṛtam

original: N3.02a/ phalahetor upāyena karma saṃbhūya kurvatām /
analyzed: phala hetoḥ upāyena karma saṃbhūya kurvatām

original: N3.02c/ ādhārabhūtaḥ prakṣepas tenottiṣṭheyur aṃśataḥ //
analyzed: ādhāra bhūtaḥ prakṣepaḥ tena uttiṣṭheyuḥ aṃśataḥ

original: N3.03a/ samo 'atirikto hīno vā yatrāṃśo yasya yādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: samaḥ atiriktaḥ hīnaḥ vā yatra aṃśaḥ yasya yādṛśaḥ

original: N3.03c/ kṣayavyayau tathā vṛddhis tasya tatra tathāvidhāḥ //
analyzed: kṣaya vyayau tathā vṛddhiḥ tasya tatra tathāvidhāḥ

original: N3.04a/ bhāṇḍapiṇḍavyayoddhārabhārasārānvavekṣaṇam /
analyzed: bhāṇḍa piṇḍa vyaya uddhāra bhāra sāra anvavekṣaṇam

original: N3.04c/ kuryus te 'avyabhicāreṇa samaye sve vyavasthitāḥ //
analyzed: kuryuḥ te avyabhicāreṇa samaye sve vyavasthitāḥ

original: N3.05a/ pramādān nāśitaṃ dāpyaḥ pratiṣiddhakṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: pramādāt nāśitam dāpyaḥ pratiṣiddha kṛtam ca yat

original: N3.05c/ asaṃdiṣṭaś ca yat kuryāt sarvaiḥ saṃbhūyakāribhiḥ //
analyzed: asaṃdiṣṭaḥ ca yat kuryāt sarvaiḥ saṃbhūyakāribhiḥ

original: N3.06a/ daivataskararājotthe vyasane samupasthite /
analyzed: daiva taskara rāja utthe vyasane samupasthite

original: N3.06c/ yas tat svaśaktyā saṃrakṣet tasyāṃśo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ tat sva śaktyā saṃrakṣet tasya aṃśaḥ daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N3.07a/ ekasya cet syād vyasanaṃ dāyādo 'asya tad āpnuyāt /
analyzed: ekasya ced syāt vyasanam dāyādaḥ asya tat āpnuyāt
