original: N3.07c/ anyo vāsati dāyāde śaktāś cet sarva eva vā //
analyzed: anyaḥ vā asati dāyāde śaktāḥ ced sarve eva vā

original: N3.08a/ ṛtvijāṃ vyasane 'apy evam anyas tat karma nistaret /
analyzed: ṛtvijām vyasane api evam anyaḥ tat karma nistaret

original: N3.08c/ labheta dakṣiṇābhāgaṃ sa tasmāt saṃprakalpitam //
analyzed: labheta dakṣiṇā bhāgam sa tasmāt saṃprakalpitam

original: N3.09a/ ṛtvig yājyam aduṣṭaṃ yas tyajed anapakāriṇam /
analyzed: ṛtvij yājyam aduṣṭam yaḥ tyajet anapakāriṇam

original: N3.09c/ aduṣṭaṃ va rtvijaṃ yājyo vineyau tāv ubhāv api //
analyzed: aduṣṭam vaḥ ṛtvijam yājyaḥ vineyau tau ubhau api

original: N3.10a/ ṛtvik tu trividho dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvajuṣṭaḥ svayaṃkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtvij tu trividhaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ pūrva juṣṭaḥ svayaṃkṛtaḥ

original: N3.10c/ yadṛcchayā ca yaḥ kuryād ārtvijyaṃ prītipūrvakam //
analyzed: yadṛcchayā ca yaḥ kuryāt ārtvijyam prīti pūrvakam

original: N3.11a/ kramāgateṣv eṣa dharmo vṛteṣv ṛtvikṣu ca svayam /
analyzed: krama āgateṣu eṣa dharmaḥ vṛteṣu ṛtvikṣu ca svayam

original: N3.11c/ yādṛcchike tu saṃyājye tattyāge nāsti kilbiṣam //
analyzed: yādṛcchike tu saṃyājye tad tyāge na asti kilbiṣam

original: N3.12a/ śulkasthānaṃ vaṇik prāptaḥ śulkaṃ dadyād yathopagam /
analyzed: śulkasthānam vaṇij prāptaḥ śulkam dadyāt yathā upagam

original: N3.12c/ na tad vyatihared rājñāṃ balir eṣa prakalpitaḥ //
analyzed: na tat vyatiharet rājñām baliḥ eṣa prakalpitaḥ

original: N3.13a/ śulkasthānaṃ pariharan na kāle krayavikrayī /
analyzed: śulkasthānam pariharan na kāle krayavikrayī

original: N3.13c/ mithyoktvā ca parīmāṇaṃ dāpyo 'aṣṭaguṇam atyayam //
analyzed: mithyā uktvā ca parīmāṇam dāpyaḥ aṣṭaguṇam atyayam

original: N3.14a/ kaścic cet saṃcaran deśāt preyād abhyāgato vaṇik /
analyzed: kaścid ced saṃcaran deśāt preyāt abhyāgataḥ vaṇij

original: N3.14c/ rājāsya bhāṇḍaṃ tad rakṣet yāvad dāyādadarśanam //
analyzed: rājā asya bhāṇḍam tat rakṣet yāvat dāyāda darśanam

original: N3.15a/ dāyāde 'asati bandhubhyo jñātibhyo vā tad arpayet /
analyzed: dāyāde asati bandhubhyaḥ jñātibhyaḥ vā tat arpayet

original: N3.15c/ tadabhāve suguptaṃ tad dhārayed daśatīḥ samāḥ //
analyzed: tad abhāve su guptam tat dhārayet daśatīḥ samāḥ

original: N3.16a/ asvāmikam adāyādaṃ daśavarṣasthitaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: a svāmikam a dāyādam daśa varṣa sthitam tatas

original: N3.16c/ rājā tad ātmasāt kuryād evaṃ dharmo na hīyate //
analyzed: rājā tat ātmasāt kuryāt evam dharmaḥ na hīyate

original: 4.dattāpradānikam
analyzed: datta apradānikam

original: N4.01a/ dattvā dravyam asamyag yaḥ punar ādātum icchati /
analyzed: dattvā dravyam asamyak yaḥ punar ādātum icchati

original: N4.01c/ dattāpradānikaṃ nāma tad vivādapadaṃ smṛtam //
N4.02a/ adeyam atha deyaṃ ca dattaṃ cādattam eva ca /
analyzed: adeyam atha deyam ca dattam ca adattam eva ca

original: N4.02c/ vyavahāreṣu vijñeyo dānamārgaś caturvidhaḥ //
analyzed: vyavahāreṣu vijñeyaḥ dāna mārgaḥ caturvidhaḥ

original: N4.03a/ tatra hyaṣṭāv adeyāni deyam ekavidhaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: tatra hi aṣṭau adeyāni deyam ekavidham smṛtam

original: N4.03c/ dattaṃ saptavidhaṃ vidyād adattaṃ ṣoḍaśātmakam //
analyzed: dattam saptavidham vidyāt adattam ṣoḍaśa ātmakam

original: N4.04a/ anvāhitaṃ yācitakam ādhiḥ sādhāraṇaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: anvāhitam yācitakam ādhiḥ sādhāraṇam ca yat

original: N4.04c/ nikṣepaḥ putradāraṃ ca sarvasvaṃ cānvaye sati //
analyzed: nikṣepaḥ putra dāram ca sarva svam ca anvaye sati

original: N4.05a/ āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu vartamānena dehinā /
analyzed: āpatsu api hi kaṣṭāsu vartamānena dehinā

original: N4.05c/ adeyāny āhur ācāryā yac cānyasmai pratiśrutam //
analyzed: adeyāni āhuḥ ācāryāḥ yat ca anyasmai pratiśrutam

original: N4.06a/ kuṭumbabharaṇād dravyaṃ yatkiṃcid atiricyate /
analyzed: kuṭumba bharaṇāt dravyam yat kiṃcid atiricyate

original: N4.06c/ tad deyam upahṛtyānyad dadad doṣam avāpnuyāt //
analyzed: tat deyam upahṛtya anyat dadat doṣam avāpnuyāt

original: N4.07a/ paṇyamūlyaṃ bhṛtis tuṣṭyā snehāt pratyupakārataḥ /
analyzed: paṇya mūlyam bhṛtiḥ tuṣṭyā snehāt pratyupakārataḥ

original: N4.07c/ strīśulkānugrahārthaṃ ca dattaṃ dānavido viduḥ //
analyzed: strī śulka anugraha artham ca dattam dāna vidaḥ viduḥ

original: N4.08a/ adattaṃ tu bhayakrodhaśokavegarujānvitaiḥ /
analyzed: adattam tu bhaya krodha śoka vega rujā anvitaiḥ

original: N4.08c/ tathotkocaparīhāsavyatyāsacchalayogataḥ //
analyzed: tathā utkoca parīhāsa vyatyāsa chala yogataḥ

original: N4.09a/ bālamūḍhāsvatantrārtamattonmattāpavarjitam /
N4.09c/ kartā mamāyaṃ karmeti pratilābhecchayā ca yat //
analyzed: kartā mama ayam karma iti pratilābha icchayā ca yat

original: N4.10a/ apātre pātram ity ukte kārye cādharmasaṃhite /
analyzed: apātre pātram iti ukte kārye ca adharma saṃhite

original: N4.10c/ yad dattaṃ syād avijñānād adattaṃ tad api smṛtam //
analyzed: yat dattam syāt avijñānāt adattam tat api smṛtam

original: N4.11a/ gṛhṇāty adattaṃ yo lobhād yaś cādeyaṃ prayacchati /
analyzed: gṛhṇāti adattam yaḥ lobhāt yaḥ ca adeyam prayacchati

original: N4.11c/ adattādāyako daṇḍyas tathādeyasya dāyakaḥ //
analyzed: adatta ādāyakaḥ daṇḍyaḥ tathā adeyasya dāyakaḥ

original: 5.abhyupetyāśuśrūṣā
analyzed: abhyupetyā śuśrūṣā

original: N5.01a/ abhyupetya tu śuśrūṣāṃ yas tāṃ na pratipadyate /
analyzed: abhyupetya tu śuśrūṣām yaḥ tām na pratipadyate

original: N5.01c/ aśuśrūṣābhyupetyaitad vivādapadam ucyate //
analyzed: a śuśrūṣā abhyupetya etat vivāda padam ucyate

original: N5.02a/ śuśrūṣakaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāstre dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: śuśrūṣakaḥ pañcavidhaḥ śāstre dṛṣṭaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: N5.02c/ caturvidhaḥ karmakaras teṣāṃ dāsās tripañcakāḥ //
analyzed: caturvidhaḥ karmakaraḥ teṣām dāsāḥ tripañcakāḥ

original: N5.03a/ śiṣyāntevāsibhṛtakāś caturthas tv adhikarmakṛt /
analyzed: śiṣya antevāsi bhṛtakāḥ caturthaḥ tu adhikarma kṛt

original: N5.03c/ ete karmakarāḥ proktā dāsās tu gṛhajādayaḥ //
analyzed: ete karmakarāḥ proktāḥ dāsāḥ tu gṛha ja ādayaḥ

original: N5.04a/ sāmānyam asvatantratvam eṣām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: sāmānyam asvatantra tvam eṣām āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: N5.04c/ jātikarmakṛtas tūkto viśeṣo vṛttir eva ca //
analyzed: jāti karma kṛtaḥ tu uktaḥ viśeṣaḥ vṛttiḥ eva ca

original: N5.05a/ karmāpi dvividhaṃ jñeyam aśubhaṃ śubham eva ca /
analyzed: karma api dvividham jñeyam aśubham śubham eva ca

original: N5.05c/ aśubhaṃ dāsakarmoktaṃ śubhaṃ karmakṛtāṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: aśubham dāsa karma uktam śubham karma kṛtām smṛtam

original: N5.06a/ gṛhadvārāśucisthānarathyāvaskaraśodhanam /
analyzed: gṛha dvāra aśuci sthāna rathyā avaskara śodhanam

original: N5.06c/ guhyāṅgasparśanocchiṣṭaviṇmūtragrahaṇojjhanam //
N5.07a/ iṣṭataḥ svāminaś cāṅgair upasthānam athāntataḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭatas svāminaḥ ca aṅgaiḥ upasthānam atha antatas

original: N5.07c/ aśubhaṃ karma vijñeyaṃ śubham anyad ataḥ param //
analyzed: aśubham karma vijñeyam śubham anyat atas param

original: N5.08a/ ā vidyāgrahaṇāc chiṣyaḥ śuśrūṣet prayato gurum /
analyzed: ā vidyā grahaṇāt śiṣyaḥ śuśrūṣet prayataḥ gurum

original: N5.08c/ tadvṛttir gurudāreṣu guruputre tathaiva ca //
analyzed: tad vṛttiḥ guru dāreṣu guru putre tathā eva ca

original: N5.09a/ brahmacārī cared bhaikṣam adhaḥśāyy analaṅkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: brahmacārī caret bhaikṣam adhas śāyī an alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: N5.09c/ jaghanyaśāyī sarveṣāṃ pūrvotthāyī guror gṛhe //
analyzed: jaghanya śāyī sarveṣām pūrva utthāyī guroḥ gṛhe

original: N5.10a/ nāsaṃdiṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭheta tiṣṭhed vāpi guruṃ kvacit /
analyzed: na a saṃdiṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭheta tiṣṭhet vā api gurum kvacid

original: N5.10c/ saṃdiṣṭaḥ karma kurvīta śaktaś ced avicārayan //
analyzed: saṃdiṣṭaḥ karma kurvīta śaktaḥ ced a vicārayan

original: N5.11a/ yathākālam adhīyīta yāvan na vimanā guruḥ /
analyzed: yathākālam adhīyīta yāvat na vimanāḥ guruḥ

original: N5.11c/ āsīno 'adho guroḥ kūrce phalake vā samāhitaḥ //
analyzed: āsīnaḥ adhas guroḥ kūrce phalake vā samāhitaḥ

original: N5.12a/ anuśāsyaś ca guruṇā na ced anuvidhīyate /
analyzed: anuśāsyaḥ ca guruṇā na ced anuvidhīyate

original: N5.12c/ avadhenāthavā hanyāt rajjvā veṇudalena vā //
analyzed: avadhena athavā hanyāt rajjvā veṇu dalena vā

original: N5.13a/ bhṛśaṃ na tāḍayed enaṃ nottamāṅge na vakṣasi /
analyzed: bhṛśam na tāḍayet enam na uttamāṅge na vakṣasi

original: N5.13c/ anuśāsyātha viśvāsyaḥ śāsyo rājñānyathā guruḥ //
analyzed: anuśāsya atha viśvāsyaḥ śāsyaḥ rājñā anyathā guruḥ

original: N5.14a/ samāvṛttaś ca gurave pradāya gurudakṣiṇām /
analyzed: samāvṛttaḥ ca gurave pradāya guru dakṣiṇām

original: N5.14c/ pratīyāt svagṛhān eṣā śiṣyavṛttir udāhṛtā //
analyzed: pratīyāt sva gṛhān eṣā śiṣya vṛttiḥ udāhṛtā

original: N5.15a/ svaśilpam icchann āhartuṃ bāndhavānām anujñayā /
analyzed: sva śilpam icchan āhartum bāndhavānām anujñayā

original: N5.15c/ ācāryasya vased ante kālaṃ kṛtvā suniścitam //
analyzed: ācāryasya vaset ante kālam kṛtvā su niścitam

original: N5.16a/ ācāryaḥ śikṣayed enaṃ svagṛhād dattabhojanam /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ śikṣayet enam sva gṛhāt datta bhojanam

original: N5.16c/ na cānyat kārayet karma putravac cainam ācaret //
analyzed: na ca anyat kārayet karma putra vat ca enam ācaret

original: N5.17a/ śikṣayantam aduṣṭaṃ ca yas tv ācāryaṃ parityajet /
analyzed: śikṣayantam aduṣṭam ca yaḥ tu ācāryam parityajet

original: N5.17c/ balād vāsayitavyaḥ syād vadhabandhau ca so 'arhati //
analyzed: balāt vāsayitavyaḥ syāt vadha bandhau ca saḥ arhati

original: N5.18a/ śikṣito 'api kṛtaṃ kālam antevāsī samāpnuyāt /
analyzed: śikṣitaḥ api kṛtam kālam antevāsī samāpnuyāt

original: N5.18c/ tatra karma ca yat kuryād ācāryasyaiva tatphalam //
analyzed: tatra karma ca yat kuryāt ācāryasya eva tat phalam

original: N5.19a/ gṛhītaśilpaḥ samaye kṛtvācāryaṃ pradakṣiṇam /
analyzed: gṛhīta śilpaḥ samaye kṛtvā ācāryam pradakṣiṇam

original: N5.19c/ śaktitaś cānumānyainam antevāsī nivartayet //
analyzed: śaktitaḥ ca anumānya enam antevāsī nivartayet

original: N5.20a/ bhṛtakas trividho jñeya uttamo madhyamo 'adhamaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛtakaḥ trividhaḥ jñeyaḥ uttamaḥ madhyamaḥ adhamaḥ

original: N5.20c/ śaktibhaktyanurūpā syād eṣāṃ karmāśrayā bhṛtiḥ //
analyzed: śakti bhakti anurūpā syāt eṣām karma āśrayā bhṛtiḥ

original: N5.21a/ uttamas tv āyudhīyo 'atra madhyamas tu kṛṣīvalaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ tu āyudhīyaḥ atra madhyamaḥ tu kṛṣīvalaḥ

original: N5.21c/ adhamo bhāravāhaḥ syād ity evaṃ trividho bhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: adhamaḥ bhāra vāhaḥ syāt iti evam trividhaḥ bhṛtaḥ

original: N5.22a/ artheṣv adhikṛto yaḥ syāt kuṭumbasya tathopari /
analyzed: artheṣu adhikṛtaḥ yaḥ syāt kuṭumbasya tathā upari

original: N5.22c/ so 'adhikarmakaro jñeyaḥ sa ca kauṭumbikaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ adhikarmakaraḥ jñeyaḥ sa ca kauṭumbikaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N5.23a/ śubhakarmakarās tv ete catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: śubha karma karāḥ tu ete catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ

original: N5.23c/ jaghanyakarmabhājas tu śeṣā dāsās tripañcakāḥ //
analyzed: jaghanya karma bhājaḥ tu śeṣāḥ dāsāḥ tri pañcakāḥ

original: N5.24a/ gṛhajātas tathā krīto labdho dāyād upāgataḥ /
analyzed: gṛha jātaḥ tathā krītaḥ labdhaḥ dāyāt upāgataḥ

original: N5.24c/ anākālabhṛtas tadvad ādhattaḥ svāminā ca yaḥ //
analyzed: an ākālabhṛtaḥ tadvat ādhattaḥ svāminā ca yaḥ

original: N5.25a/ mokṣito mahataś carṇāt prāpto yuddhāt paṇe jitaḥ /
analyzed: mokṣitaḥ mahataḥ ca ṛṇāt prāptaḥ yuddhāt paṇe jitaḥ

original: N5.25c/ tavāham ity upagataḥ pravrajyāvasitaḥ kṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tava aham iti upagataḥ pravrajyā avasitaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: N5.26a/ bhaktadāsaś ca vijñeyas tathaiva vaḍavābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: bhaktadāsaḥ ca vijñeyaḥ tathā eva vaḍavābhṛtaḥ

original: N5.26c/ vikretā cātmanaḥ śāstre dāsāḥ pañcadaśā smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: vikretā ca ātmanaḥ śāstre dāsāḥ pañcadaśā smṛtāḥ

original: N5.27a/ tatra pūrvaś caturvargo dāsatvān na vimucyate /
analyzed: tatra pūrvaḥ caturvargaḥ dāsa tvāt na vimucyate

original: N5.27c/ prasādād svāmino 'anyatra dāsyam eṣāṃ kramāgatam //
analyzed: prasādāt svāminaḥ anyatra dāsyam eṣām krama āgatam

original: N5.28a/ yaś caiṣāṃ svāminaṃ kaścin mokṣayet prāṇasaṃśayāt /
analyzed: yaḥ ca eṣām svāminam kaścid mokṣayet prāṇa saṃśayāt

original: N5.28c/ dāsatvāt sa vimucyeta putrabhāgaṃ labheta ca //
analyzed: dāsa tvāt sa vimucyeta putra bhāgam labheta ca

original: N5.29a/ anākālabhṛto dāsyān mucyate goyugaṃ dadat /
analyzed: an ākālabhṛtaḥ dāsyāt mucyate go yugam dadat

original: N5.29c/ saṃbhakṣitaṃ yad durbhikṣe na tac chudhyeta karmaṇā //
analyzed: saṃbhakṣitam yat durbhikṣe na tat śudhyeta karmaṇā

original: N5.30a/ ādhatto 'api dhanaṃ dattvā svāmī yady enam uddharet /
analyzed: ādhattaḥ api dhanam dattvā svāmī yadi enam uddharet

original: N5.30c/ athopagamayed enaṃ sa vikrītād anantaraḥ //
analyzed: atha upagamayet enam sa vikrītāt anantaraḥ

original: N5.31a/ dattvā tu sodayam ṛṇaṃ ṛṇī dāsyāt pramucyate /
analyzed: dattvā tu sa udayam ṛṇam ṛṇī dāsyāt pramucyate

original: N5.31c/ kṛtakālābhyupagamāt kṛtako 'api vimucyate //
analyzed: kṛta kāla abhyupagamāt kṛtakaḥ api vimucyate

original: N5.32a/ tavāham ity upagato yuddhaprāptaḥ paṇe jitaḥ /
analyzed: tava aham iti upagataḥ yuddha prāptaḥ paṇe jitaḥ

original: N5.32c/ pratiśīrṣapradānena mucyate tulyakarmaṇā //
analyzed: prati śīrṣa pradānena mucyate tulya karmaṇā

original: N5.33a/ rājña eva tu dāsaḥ syāt pravrajyāvasito naraḥ /
analyzed: rājñaḥ eva tu dāsaḥ syāt pravrajyā avasitaḥ naraḥ

original: N5.33c/ na tasya pratimokṣo 'asti na viśuddhiḥ kathaṃcana //
analyzed: na tasya pratimokṣaḥ asti na viśuddhiḥ kathaṃcana

original: N5.34a/ bhaktasyopekṣaṇāt sadyo bhaktadāsaḥ pramucyate /
analyzed: bhaktasya upekṣaṇāt sadyas bhakta dāsaḥ pramucyate

original: N5.34c/ nigrahād vaḍavāyāś ca mucyate vaḍavābhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: nigrahāt vaḍavāyāḥ ca mucyate vaḍavābhṛtaḥ

original: N5.35a/ vikrīṇīte ya ātmānaṃ svatantraḥ san narādhamaḥ /
analyzed: vikrīṇīte yaḥ ātmānam svatantraḥ san nara adhamaḥ

original: N5.35c/ sa jaghanyataras teṣāṃ naiva dāsyāt pramucyate //
analyzed: sa jaghanyataraḥ teṣām na eva dāsyāt pramucyate

original: N5.36a/ caurāpahṛtavikrītā ye ca dāsīkṛtā balāt /
analyzed: caura apahṛta vikrītāḥ ye ca dāsīkṛtāḥ balāt

original: N5.36c/ rājñā mokṣayitavyās te dāsatvaṃ teṣu neṣyate //
analyzed: rājñā mokṣayitavyāḥ te dāsa tvam teṣu na iṣyate

original: N5.37a/ varṇānāṃ prātilomyena dāsatvaṃ na vidhīyate /
analyzed: varṇānām prātilomyena dāsa tvam na vidhīyate

original: N5.37c/ svadharmatyāgino 'anyatra dāravad dāsatā matā //
analyzed: svadharma tyāginaḥ anyatra dāra vat dāsa tā matā

original: N5.38a/ tavāham iti cātmānaṃ yo 'asvatantraḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: tava aham iti ca ātmānam yaḥ asvatantraḥ prayacchati

original: N5.38c/ na sa taṃ prāpnuyāt kāmaṃ pūrvasvāmī labheta tam //
analyzed: na sa tam prāpnuyāt kāmam pūrva svāmī labheta tam

original: N5.39a/ adhanās traya evoktā bhāryā dāsas tathā sutaḥ /
analyzed: adhanāḥ trayaḥ eva uktāḥ bhāryā dāsaḥ tathā sutaḥ

original: N5.39c/ yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tad dhanam //
analyzed: yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tat dhanam

original: N5.40a/ svadāsam icched yaḥ kartum adāsaṃ prītamānasaḥ /
analyzed: sva dāsam icchet yaḥ kartum adāsam prīta mānasaḥ

original: N5.40c/ skandhād ādāya tasyāpi bhindyāt kumbhaṃ sahāmbhasā //
analyzed: skandhāt ādāya tasya api bhindyāt kumbham saha ambhasā

original: N5.41a/ akṣatābhiḥ sapuṣpābhir mūrdhany enam avākiret /
analyzed: akṣatābhiḥ sa puṣpābhiḥ mūrdhani enam avākiret

original: N5.41c/ adāsa iti coktvā triḥ prāṅmukhaṃ tam athotsṛjet //
analyzed: adāsaḥ iti ca uktvā tris prāc mukham tam atha utsṛjet

original: N5.42a/ tataḥprabhṛti vaktavyaḥ svāmyanugrahapālitaḥ /
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti vaktavyaḥ svāmi anugraha pālitaḥ

original: N5.42c/ bhojyānnaḥ pratigṛhyaś ca bhavaty abhimataś ca saḥ //
analyzed: bhojya annaḥ pratigṛhyaḥ ca bhavati abhimataḥ ca saḥ

original: 6.vetanasyānapākarma
analyzed: vetanasya an apākarma

original: N6.1a/ bhṛtānāṃ vetanasyokto dānādānavidhikramaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛtānām vetanasya uktaḥ dāna ādāna vidhi kramaḥ

original: N6.1c/ vetanasyānapākarma tad vivādapadaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: vetanasya anapākarma tat vivāda padam smṛtam

original: N6.2a/ bhṛtāya vetanaṃ dadyāt karmasvāmī yathākramam /
analyzed: bhṛtāya vetanam dadyāt karma svāmī yathākramam

original: N6.2c/ ādau madhye 'avasāne vā karmaṇo yad viniścitam //
analyzed: ādau madhye avasāne vā karmaṇaḥ yat viniścitam

original: N6.3a/ bhṛtāvaniścitāyāṃ tu daśabhāgaṃ samāpnuyuḥ /
analyzed: bhṛtau aniścitāyām tu daśa bhāgam samāpnuyuḥ

original: N6.3c/ lābhagobījasasyānāṃ vaṇiggopakṛṣībalāḥ //
analyzed: lābha go bīja sasyānām vaṇij gopa kṛṣī balāḥ

original: N6.4a/ karmopakaraṇaṃ caiṣāṃ kriyāṃ prati yad āhṛtam /
analyzed: karma upakaraṇam ca eṣām kriyām prati yat āhṛtam

original: N6.4c/ āptabhāvena kurvīta na jihmena samācaret //
analyzed: āpta bhāvena kurvīta na jihmena samācaret

original: N6.5a/ karmākurvan pratiśrutya kāryo dattvā bhṛtiṃ balāt /
analyzed: karma a kurvan pratiśrutya kāryaḥ dattvā bhṛtim balāt

original: N6.5c/ bhṛtiṃ gṛhītvākurvāṇo dviguṇāṃ bhṛtim āvahet //
analyzed: bhṛtim gṛhītvā a kurvāṇaḥ dviguṇām bhṛtim āvahet

original: N6.6a/ kāle 'apūrṇe tyajet karma bhṛtināśo 'asya cārhati /
analyzed: kāle a pūrṇe tyajet karma bhṛti nāśaḥ asya ca arhati

original: N6.6c/ svāmidoṣād apākrāman yāvat kṛtam avāpnuyāt //
analyzed: svāmi doṣāt apākrāman yāvat kṛtam avāpnuyāt

original: N6.7a/ bhṛtiṣaḍbhāgam ābhāṣya pathi yugyakṛtaṃ tyajan /
analyzed: bhṛti ṣaṣ bhāgam ābhāṣya pathi yugya kṛtam tyajan

original: N6.7c/ adadat kārayitvā tu karmaivaṃ sodayāṃ bhṛtim //
analyzed: adadān kārayitvā tu karma evam sa udayām bhṛtim

original: N6.8a/ anayan bhāṭayitvā tu bhāṇḍavān yānavāhane /
analyzed: anayān bhāṭayitvā tu bhāṇḍavān yāna vāhane

original: N6.8c/ dāpyo bhṛticaturbhāgaṃ samam ardhapathe tyajan //
analyzed: dāpyaḥ bhṛti catur bhāgam samam ardha pathe tyajan

original: N6.9a/ anayan vāhako 'apy evaṃ bhṛtihānim avāpnuyāt /
analyzed: anayān vāhakaḥ api evam bhṛti hānim avāpnuyāt

original: N6.9c/ dviguṇāṃ tu bhṛtiṃ dāpyaḥ prasthāne vighnam ācaran //
analyzed: dviguṇām tu bhṛtim dāpyaḥ prasthāne vighnam ācaran

original: N6.10a/ bhāṇḍaṃ vyasanam āgacched yadi vāhakadoṣataḥ /
analyzed: bhāṇḍam vyasanam āgacchet yadi vāhaka doṣataḥ

original: N6.10c/ dāpyo yat tatra naṣṭaṃ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte //
analyzed: dāpyaḥ yat tatra naṣṭam syāt daiva rāja kṛtāt ṛte

original: N6.11a/ gavāṃ śatād vatsatarī dhenuḥ syād dviśatād bhṛtiḥ /
analyzed: gavām śatāt vatsatarī dhenuḥ syāt dviśatāt bhṛtiḥ

original: N6.11c/ prati samvatsaraṃ gope sadohaś cāṣṭame 'ahani //
analyzed: prati samvatsaram gope sa dohaḥ ca aṣṭame ahani

original: N6.12a/ upānayet gā gopāya pratyahaṃ rajanīkṣaye /
analyzed: upānayet gāḥ gopāya pratyaham rajanī kṣaye

original: N6.12c/ cīṛṇāḥ pītāś ca tā gopaḥ sāyāhne pratyupānayet //
analyzed: cīṛṇāḥ pītāḥ ca tāḥ gopaḥ sāyāhne pratyupānayet

original: N6.13a/ syāc ced govyasanaṃ gopo vyāyacchet tatra śaktitaḥ /
analyzed: syāt ced go vyasanam gopaḥ vyāyacchet tatra śaktitaḥ

original: N6.13c/ aśaktas tūrṇam āgamya svāmine tan nivedayet //
analyzed: aśaktaḥ tūrṇam āgamya svāmine tat nivedayet

original: N6.14a/ avyāyac channavikrośan svāmine cānivedayan /
analyzed: avyāyat channa vikrośan svāmine ca a nivedayan

original: N6.14c/ voḍhum arhati gopas tāṃ vinayaṃ cāpi rājani //
analyzed: voḍhum arhati gopaḥ tām vinayam ca api rājani

original: N6.15a/ naṣṭavinaṣṭaṃ kṛmibhiḥ śvahataṃ viṣame mṛtam /
analyzed: naṣṭa vinaṣṭam kṛmibhiḥ śva hatam viṣame mṛtam

original: N6.15c/ hīnaṃ puruṣakāreṇa gopāyaiva nipātayet //
analyzed: hīnam puruṣakāreṇa gopāya eva nipātayet

original: N6.16a/ ajāvike tathāruddhe vṛkaiḥ pāle tv anāyati /
analyzed: ajāvike tathā āruddhe vṛkaiḥ pāle tu anāyati

original: N6.16c/ yat prasahya vṛko hanyāt pāle tatkilbiṣam bhavet //
analyzed: yat prasahya vṛkaḥ hanyāt pāle tad kilbiṣam bhavet

original: N6.17a/ tāsāṃ caivāniruddhānāṃ carantīnāṃ mitho vane /
analyzed: tāsām ca eva aniruddhānām carantīnām mithas vane

original: N6.17c/ yām utpatya vṛko hanyān na pālas tatra kilbiṣī //
analyzed: yām utpatya vṛkaḥ hanyāt na pālaḥ tatra kilbiṣī

original: N6.18a/ vighuṣya tu hṛtaṃ caurair na pālo dātum arhati /
analyzed: vighuṣya tu hṛtam cauraiḥ na pālaḥ dātum arhati

original: N6.18c/ yadi deśe ca kāle ca svāminaḥ svasya śaṃsati //
analyzed: yadi deśe ca kāle ca svāminaḥ svasya śaṃsati

original: N6.19a/ etena sarvapālānāṃ vivādaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: etena sarva pālānām vivādaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: N6.19c/ mṛteṣu ca viśuddhiḥ syāt pālasyāṅkādidarśanāt //
analyzed: mṛteṣu ca viśuddhiḥ syāt pālasya aṅka ādi darśanāt

original: N6.20a/ śulkaṃ gṛhītvā paṇyastrī necchantī dvis tad āvahet /
analyzed: śulkam gṛhītvā paṇya strī na icchantī dvis tat āvahet

original: N6.20c/ aprayacchaṃs tadā śulkam anubhūya pumān striyam //
analyzed: aprayacchān tadā śulkam anubhūya pumān striyam

original: N6.21a/ ayonau kramate yas tu bahubhir vāpi vāsayet /
analyzed: ayonau kramate yaḥ tu bahubhiḥ vā api vāsayet

original: N6.21c/ śulkam aṣṭaguṇaṃ dāpyo vinayas tāvad eva ca //
analyzed: śulkam aṣṭaguṇam dāpyaḥ vinayaḥ tāvat eva ca

original: N6.22a/ parājire gṛhaṃ kṛtvā stomaṃ dattvā vaset tu yaḥ /
analyzed: para ajire gṛham kṛtvā stomam dattvā vaset tu yaḥ

original: N6.22c/ sa tad gṛhītvā nirgacchet tṛṇakāṣṭheṣṭakādikam //
analyzed: sa tat gṛhītvā nirgacchet tṛṇa kāṣṭha iṣṭakā ādikam

original: N6.23a/ stomavāhīni bhāṇḍāni pūrṇakālāny upānayet /
analyzed: stoma vāhīni bhāṇḍāni pūrṇa kālāni upānayet

original: N6.23c/ grahītur ābhaved bhagnaṃ naṣṭaṃ cānyatra saṃplavāt //
analyzed: grahītuḥ ābhavet bhagnam naṣṭam ca anyatra saṃplavāt

original: 7.asvāmivikrayaḥ
analyzed: asvāmi vikrayaḥ

original: N7.1a/ nikṣiptaṃ vā paradravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ labdhvāpahṛtya vā /
analyzed: nikṣiptam vā para dravyam naṣṭam labdhvā apahṛtya vā

original: N7.1c/ vikrīyate 'asamakṣaṃ yad vijñeyo 'asvāmivikrayaḥ //
analyzed: vikrīyate a samakṣam yat vijñeyaḥ asvāmi vikrayaḥ

original: N7.2a/ dravyam asvāmivikrītaṃ prāpya svāmī samāpnuyāt /
analyzed: dravyam asvāmi vikrītam prāpya svāmī samāpnuyāt

original: N7.2c/ prakāśaṃ krayataḥ śuddhiḥ kretuḥ steyaṃ rahaḥ krayāt //
analyzed: prakāśam krayataḥ śuddhiḥ kretuḥ steyam rahaḥ krayāt

original: N7.3a/ asvāmyanumatād dāsād asataś ca janād rahaḥ /
analyzed: a svāmi anumatāt dāsāt asataḥ ca janāt rahaḥ

original: N7.3c/ hīnamūlyam avelāyāṃ krīṇaṃs taddoṣabhāg bhavet //
analyzed: hīna mūlyam avelāyām krīṇan tad doṣa bhāj bhavet

original: N7.4a/ na gūhetāgamaṃ kretā śuddhis tasya tadāgamāt /
analyzed: na gūheta āgamam kretā śuddhiḥ tasya tad āgamāt

original: N7.4c/ viparyaye tulyadoṣaḥ steyadaṇḍaṃ ca so 'arhati //
analyzed: viparyaye tulya doṣaḥ steya daṇḍam ca saḥ arhati

original: N7.5a/ vikretā svāmine 'arthaṃ ca kretur mūlyaṃ ca tatkṛtam /
analyzed: vikretā svāmine artham ca kretuḥ mūlyam ca tad kṛtam

original: N7.5c/ dadyād daṇḍaṃ tathā rājñe vidhir asvāmivikraye //
analyzed: dadyāt daṇḍam tathā rājñe vidhiḥ asvāmi vikraye

original: N7.6a/ pareṇa nihitaṃ labdhvā rājany upaharen nidhim /
analyzed: pareṇa nihitam labdhvā rājani upaharet nidhim

original: N7.6c/ rājagāmī nidhiḥ sarvaḥ sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇād ṛte //
analyzed: rāja gāmī nidhiḥ sarvaḥ sarveṣām brāhmaṇāt ṛte

original: N7.7a/ brāhmaṇo 'api nidhiṃ labdhvā kṣipraṃ rājñe nivedayet /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ api nidhim labdhvā kṣipram rājñe nivedayet

original: N7.7c/ tena dattaṃ ca bhūñjīta stenaḥ syād anivedayan //
analyzed: tena dattam ca bhūñjīta stenaḥ syāt anivedayān

original: N7.8a/ svam apy arthaṃ tathā naṣṭaṃ labdhvā rājñe nivedayet /
analyzed: svam api artham tathā naṣṭam labdhvā rājñe nivedayet

original: N7.8c/ gṛhṇīyāt tatra taṃ śuddham aśuddhaṃ syāt tato 'anyathā //
analyzed: gṛhṇīyāt tatra tam śuddham a śuddham syāt tatas anyathā

original: 8.krītānuśayaḥ
analyzed: krīta anuśayaḥ

original: N8.1a/ vikrīya paṇyaṃ mūlyena kretur yan na pradīyate /
analyzed: vikrīya paṇyam mūlyena kretuḥ yat na pradīyate

original: N8.1c/ vikrīyāsaṃpradānaṃ tad vivādapadam ucyate //
analyzed: vikrīya asaṃpradānam tat vivāda padam ucyate

original: N8.2a/ loke 'asmin dvividhaṃ dravyaṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: loke asmin dvividham dravyam jaṅgamam sthāvaram tathā

original: N8.2c/ krayavikrayadharmeṣu sarvaṃ tat paṇyam ucyate //
analyzed: kraya vikraya dharmeṣu sarvam tat paṇyam ucyate

original: N8.3a/ ṣaḍvidhas tasya tu budhair dānādānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaḍvidhaḥ tasya tu budhaiḥ dāna ādāna vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N8.3c/ gaṇimaṃ tulimaṃ meyaṃ kriyayā rūpataḥ śriyā //
analyzed: gaṇimam tulimam meyam kriyayā rūpataḥ śriyā

original: N8.4a/ vikrīya paṇyaṃ mūlyena kretur yo na prayacchati /
analyzed: vikrīya paṇyam mūlyena kretuḥ yaḥ na prayacchati

original: N8.4c/ sthāvarasya kṣayaṃ dāpyo jaṅgamasya kriyāphalam //
analyzed: sthāvarasya kṣayam dāpyaḥ jaṅgamasya kriyā phalam

original: N8.5a/ arghaś ced apahīyeta sodayaṃ paṇyam āvahet /
analyzed: arghaḥ ced apahīyeta sa udayam paṇyam āvahet

original: N8.5c/ sthāyinām eṣa niyamo diglābho digvicāriṇām //
analyzed: sthāyinām eṣa niyamaḥ diglābhaḥ diś vicāriṇām

original: N8.6a/ upahanyeta vā paṇyaṃ dahyetāpahriyeta vā /
analyzed: upahanyeta vā paṇyam dahyeta apahriyeta vā

original: N8.6c/ vikretur eva so 'anartho vikrīyāsamprayacchataḥ //
analyzed: vikretuḥ eva saḥ anarthaḥ vikrīya a samprayacchataḥ

original: N8.7a/ nirdoṣaṃ darśayitvā tu sadoṣaṃ yaḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: nirdoṣam darśayitvā tu sa doṣam yaḥ prayacchati

original: N8.7c/ mūlyaṃ taddviguṇaṃ dāpyo vinayaṃ tāvad eva ca //
analyzed: mūlyam tad dviguṇam dāpyaḥ vinayam tāvat eva ca

original: N8.8a/ tathānyahaste vikrīya yo 'anyasmai saṃprayacchati /
analyzed: tathā anya haste vikrīya yaḥ anyasmai saṃprayacchati

original: N8.8c/ so 'api taddviguṇaṃ dāpyo vineyas tāvad eva ca //
analyzed: saḥ api tad dviguṇam dāpyaḥ vineyaḥ tāvat eva ca

original: N8.9a/ dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāti krītaṃ paṇyaṃ ca yaḥ krayī /
analyzed: dīyamānam na gṛhṇāti krītam paṇyam ca yaḥ krayī

original: N8.9c/ vikrīṇānas tad anyatra vikretā nāparādhnuyāt //
analyzed: vikrīṇānaḥ tat anyatra vikretā na aparādhnuyāt

original: N8.10a/ dattamūlyasya paṇyasya vidhir eṣa prakīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: datta mūlyasya paṇyasya vidhiḥ eṣa prakīrtitaḥ

original: N8.10c/ adatte 'anyatra samayān na vikretur atikramaḥ //
analyzed: adatte anyatra samayāt na vikretuḥ atikramaḥ

original: N8.11a/ lābhārthe vaṇijāṃ sarvapaṇyeṣu krayavikrayaḥ /
analyzed: lābha arthe vaṇijām sarva paṇyeṣu kraya vikrayaḥ

original: N8.11c/ sa ca lābho 'argham āsādya mahān bhavati vā na vā //
analyzed: sa ca lābhaḥ argham āsādya mahān bhavati vā na vā

original: N8.12a/ tasmād deśe ca kāle ca vaṇig arghaṃ parākramet /
analyzed: tasmāt deśe ca kāle ca vaṇij argham parākramet

original: N8.12c/ na jihmena pravarteta śreyān evaṃ vaṇikpathaḥ //
analyzed: na jihmena pravarteta śreyān evam vaṇikpathaḥ

original: 9.vikrīyāsaṃpradānam
analyzed: vikrīya asaṃpradānam

original: N9.1a/ krītvā mūlyena yaḥ paṇyaṃ kretā na bahu manyate /
analyzed: krītvā mūlyena yaḥ paṇyam kretā na bahu manyate

original: N9.1c/ krītvānuśaya ity etad vivādapadam ucyate //
analyzed: krītvā anuśayaḥ iti etat vivāda padam ucyate

original: N9.2a/ krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyaṃ duṣkrītaṃ manyate krayī /
analyzed: krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyam duṣkrītam manyate krayī

original: N9.2c/ vikretuḥ pratideyaṃ tat tasminn evāhny avikṣatam //
analyzed: vikretuḥ pratideyam tat tasmin eva ahni avikṣatam

original: N9.3a/ dvitīye 'ahni dadat kretā mūlyāt triṃśāṃśam āvahet /
analyzed: dvitīye ahni dadat kretā mūlyāt triṃśa aṃśam āvahet

original: N9.3c/ dviguṇaṃ tat tṛtīye 'ahni parataḥ kretur eva tat //
analyzed: dviguṇam tat tṛtīye ahni paratas kretuḥ eva tat

original: N9.4a/ kretā paṇyaṃ parīkṣeta prāk svayaṃ guṇadoṣataḥ /
analyzed: kretā paṇyam parīkṣeta prāk svayam guṇa doṣataḥ

original: N9.4c/ parīkṣyābhimataṃ krītaṃ vikretur na bhavet punaḥ //
analyzed: parīkṣya abhimatam krītam vikretuḥ na bhavet punar

original: N9.5a/ tryahād dohyaṃ parīkṣeta pañcāhād vāhyam eva tu /
analyzed: tri ahāt dohyam parīkṣeta pañca ahāt vāhyam eva tu

original: N9.5c/ muktāvajrapravālānāṃ saptāhaṃ syāt parīkṣaṇam //
N9.6a/ dvipadām ardhamāsaṃ syāt puṃsāṃ taddviguṇaṃ striyāḥ /
analyzed: dvipadām ardha māsam syāt puṃsām tad dviguṇam striyāḥ

original: N9.6c/ daśāhaṃ sarvabījānām ekāhaṃ lohavāsasām //
analyzed: daśa aham sarva bījānām eka aham loha vāsasām

original: N9.7a/ paribhuktaṃ ca yad vāsaḥ kliṣṭarūpaṃ malīmasam /
analyzed: paribhuktam ca yat vāsaḥ kliṣṭa rūpam malīmasam

original: N9.7c/ sadoṣam api vikrītaṃ vikretur na bhavet punaḥ //
analyzed: sa doṣam api vikrītam vikretuḥ na bhavet punar

original: N9.8a/ mūlyāṣṭabhāgo hīyeta sakṛd dhautasya vāsasaḥ /
analyzed: mūlya aṣṭa bhāgaḥ hīyeta sakṛt dhautasya vāsasaḥ

original: N9.8c/ dviḥ pādas tris tribhāgas tu catuḥkṛtvo 'ardham eva ca //
analyzed: dvis pādaḥ tris tri bhāgaḥ tu catur kṛtvas ardham eva ca

original: N9.9a/ ardhakṣayāt tu parataḥ pādāṃśāpacayaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: ardha kṣayāt tu paratas pāda aṃśa apacayaḥ kramāt

original: N9.9c/ yāvat kṣīṇadaśaṃ jīrṇaṃ jīrṇasyāniyamaḥ kṣaye //
analyzed: yāvat kṣīṇa daśam jīrṇam jīrṇasya aniyamaḥ kṣaye

original: N9.10a/ lohānām api sarveṣāṃ hetur agnikriyāvidhau /
analyzed: lohānām api sarveṣām hetuḥ agni kriyā vidhau

original: N9.10c/ kṣayaḥ saṃskriyamāṇānāṃ teṣāṃ dṛṣṭo 'agnisaṃgamāt //
analyzed: kṣayaḥ saṃskriyamāṇānām teṣām dṛṣṭaḥ agni saṃgamāt

original: N9.11a/ suvarṇasya kṣayo nāsti rajate dvipalaṃ śatam /
analyzed: suvarṇasya kṣayaḥ na asti rajate dvi palam śatam

original: N9.11c/ śatam aṣṭapalaṃ jñeyaṃ kṣayas syāt trapusīsayoḥ //
analyzed: śatam aṣṭa palam jñeyam kṣayaḥ syāt trapu sīsayoḥ

original: N9.12a/ tāmre pañcapalaṃ vidyād vikārā ye ca tanmayāḥ /
analyzed: tāmre pañca palam vidyāt vikārāḥ ye ca tad mayāḥ

original: N9.12c/ taddhātūnām anekatvād ayaso 'aniyamaḥ kṣaye //
analyzed: tad dhātūnām aneka tvāt ayasaḥ aniyamaḥ kṣaye

original: N9.13a/ tāntavasya ca saṃskāre kṣayavṛddhī udāhṛte /
analyzed: tāntavasya ca saṃskāre kṣaya vṛddhī udāhṛte

original: N9.13c/ sūtrakārpāsikorṇānāṃ vṛddhir daśapalaṃ śatam //
analyzed: sūtra kārpāsika ūrṇānām vṛddhiḥ daśa palam śatam

original: N9.14a/ sthūlasūtravatāṃ teṣāṃ madhyānāṃ pañcakaṃ śatam /
analyzed: sthūla sūtravatām teṣām madhyānām pañcakam śatam

original: N9.14c/ tripalaṃ tu susūkṣmāṇām antaḥkṣaya udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tri palam tu su sūkṣmāṇām antar kṣayaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: N9.15a/ triṃśāṃśo romaviddhasya kṣayaḥ karmakṛtasya tu /
analyzed: triṃśa aṃśaḥ roma viddhasya kṣayaḥ karma kṛtasya tu

original: N9.15c/ kauṣeyavalkalānāṃ tu naiva vṛddhir na ca kṣayaḥ //
analyzed: kauṣeya valkalānām tu nā eva vṛddhiḥ na ca kṣayaḥ

original: N9.16a/ krītvā nānuśayaṃ kuryād vaṇik paṇyavicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: krītvā na anuśayam kuryāt vaṇij paṇya vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: N9.16c/ vṛddhikṣayau tu jānīyāt paṇyānām āgamaṃ tathā //
analyzed: vṛddhi kṣayau tu jānīyāt paṇyānām āgamam tathā

original: N10.1a/ pāṣaṇḍanaigamādīnāṃ sthitiḥ samaya ucyate /
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍa naigama ādīnām sthitiḥ samayaḥ ucyate

original: N10.1c/ samayasyānapākarma tad vivādapadaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: samayasya anapākarma tat vivāda padam smṛtam

original: N10.2a/ pāṣaṇḍanaigamaśreṇīpūgavrātagaṇādiṣu /
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍa naigama śreṇī pūga vrāta gaṇa ādiṣu

original: N10.2c/ saṃrakṣet samayaṃ rājā durge janapade tathā //
analyzed: saṃrakṣet samayam rājā durge janapade tathā

original: N10.3a/ yo dharmaḥ karma yac caiṣām upasthānavidhiś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ dharmaḥ karma yat ca eṣām upasthāna vidhiḥ ca yaḥ

original: N10.3c/ yac caiṣāṃ vṛttyupādānam anumanyeta tat tathā //
analyzed: yat ca eṣām vṛtti upādānam anumanyeta tat tathā

original: N10.4a/ pratikūlaṃ ca yad rājñaḥ prakṛtyavamataṃ ca yat /
analyzed: pratikūlam ca yat rājñaḥ prakṛti avamatam ca yat

original: N10.4c/ bādhakaṃ ca yad arthānāṃ tat tebhyo vinivartayet //
analyzed: bādhakam ca yat arthānām tat tebhyaḥ vinivartayet

original: N10.5a/ mithaḥ saṃghātakaraṇam ahitaṃ śastradhāraṇam /
analyzed: mithas saṃghāta karaṇam ahitam śastra dhāraṇam

original: N10.5c/ parasparopaghātaṃ ca teṣāṃ rājā na marṣayet //
analyzed: paraspara upaghātam ca teṣām rājā na marṣayet

original: N10.6a/ pṛthag gaṇāṃś ca ye bhindyus te vineyā viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak gaṇān ca ye bhindyuḥ te vineyāḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: N10.6c/ āvaheyur bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vyādhivat te hy upekṣitāḥ //
analyzed: āvaheyuḥ bhayam ghoram vyādhi vat te hi upekṣitāḥ

original: N10.7a/ doṣavat karaṇaṃ yat syād anāmnāyaprakalpitam /
analyzed: doṣavat karaṇam yat syāt anāmnāya prakalpitam

original: N10.7c/ pravṛttam api tad rājā śreyaskāmo nivartayet //
analyzed: pravṛttam api tat rājā śreyaskāmaḥ nivartayet

original: N11.1a/ setukedāramaryādāvikṛṣṭākṛṣṭaniścayāḥ /
analyzed: setu kedāra maryādā vikṛṣṭa ākṛṣṭa niścayāḥ

original: N11.1c/ kṣetrādhikārā yatra syur vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tu saḥ //
analyzed: kṣetra adhikārāḥ yatra syuḥ vivādaḥ kṣetra jaḥ tu saḥ

original: N11.2a/ kṣetrasīmāvirodheṣu sāmantebhyo viniścayaḥ /
analyzed: kṣetra sīmā virodheṣu sāmantebhyaḥ viniścayaḥ

original: N11.2c/ nagaragrāmagaṇino ye ca vṛddhatamā narāḥ //
analyzed: nagara grāma gaṇinaḥ ye ca vṛddhatamāḥ narāḥ

original: N11.3a/ grāmasīmāsu ca bahir ye syus tatkṛṣijīvinaḥ /
analyzed: grāma sīmāsu ca bahis ye syuḥ tad kṛṣi jīvinaḥ

original: N11.3c/ gopaśākunikavyādhā ye cānye vanagocarāḥ //
analyzed: gopa śākunika vyādhāḥ ye ca anye vana gocarāḥ

original: N11.4a/ samunnayeyus te sīmāṃ lakṣaṇair upalakṣitām /
analyzed: samunnayeyuḥ te sīmām lakṣaṇaiḥ upalakṣitām

original: N11.4c/ tuṣāṅgārakapālaiś ca kumbhair āyatanair drumaiḥ //
analyzed: tuṣa aṅgāra kapālaiḥ ca kumbhaiḥ āyatanaiḥ drumaiḥ

original: N11.5a/ abhijñātaiś ca valmīkasthalanimnonnatādibhiḥ /
analyzed: abhijñātaiḥ ca valmīka sthala nimna unnata ādibhiḥ

original: N11.5c/ kedārārāmamārgaiś ca purāṇaiḥ setubhis tathā //
analyzed: kedāra ārāma mārgaiḥ ca purāṇaiḥ setubhiḥ tathā

original: N11.6a/ nimnagāpahṛtotsṛṣṭanaṣṭacihnāsu bhūmiṣu /
analyzed: nimnagā apahṛta utsṛṣṭa naṣṭa cihnāsu bhūmiṣu

original: N11.6c/ tatpradeśānumānāc ca pramāṇair bhogadarśanaiḥ //
analyzed: tad pradeśa anumānāt ca pramāṇaiḥ bhoga darśanaiḥ

original: N11.7a/ atha ced anṛtaṃ brūyuḥ sāmantās tadviniścaye /
analyzed: atha ced anṛtam brūyuḥ sāmantāḥ tad viniścaye

original: N11.7c/ sarve pṛthak pṛthag daṇḍyā rājñā madhyamasāhasam //
analyzed: sarve pṛthak pṛthak daṇḍyāḥ rājñā madhyamasāhasam

original: N11.8a/ gaṇavṛddhādayas tv anye daṇḍaṃ dāpyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
analyzed: gaṇa vṛddha ādayaḥ tu anye daṇḍam dāpyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: N11.8c/ vineyāḥ prathamena syuḥ sāhasenānṛte sthitāḥ //
analyzed: vineyāḥ prathamena syuḥ sāhasena anṛte sthitāḥ

original: N11.9a/ naikaḥ samunnayet sīmāṃ naraḥ pratyayavān api /
analyzed: na ekaḥ samunnayet sīmām naraḥ pratyayavān api

original: N11.9c/ gurutvād asya dharmasya kriyaiṣā bahuṣu sthitā //
analyzed: guru tvāt asya dharmasya kriyā eṣā bahuṣu sthitā

original: N11.10a/ ekaś ced unnayet sīmāṃ sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ ced unnayet sīmām sa upavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: N11.10c/ raktamālyāmbaradharaḥ kṣitim āropya mūrdhani //
analyzed: rakta mālya ambara dharaḥ kṣitim āropya mūrdhani

original: N11.11a/ yadā ca na syur jñātāraḥ sīmāyā na ca lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: yadā ca na syuḥ jñātāraḥ sīmāyāḥ na ca lakṣaṇam

original: N11.11c/ tadā rājā dvayoḥ sīmām uddhared iṣṭataḥ svayam //
analyzed: tadā rājā dvayoḥ sīmām uddharet iṣṭatas svayam

original: N11.12a/ etenaiva gṛhodyānanipānāyatanādiṣu /
analyzed: etena eva gṛha udyāna nipāna āyatana ādiṣu

original: N11.12c/ vivādavidhir ākhyātas tathā grāmāntareṣu ca //
analyzed: vivāda vidhiḥ ākhyātaḥ tathā grāma antareṣu ca

original: N11.13a/ avaskarasthalaśvabhrabhramasyandanikādibhiḥ /
analyzed: avaskara sthala śvabhra bhrama syandanikā ādibhiḥ

original: N11.13c/ catuṣpathasurasthānarathyāmārgān na rodhayet //
analyzed: catuṣpatha surasthāna rathyā mārgān na rodhayet

original: N11.14a/ parakṣetrasya madhye tu setur na pratiṣidhyate /
analyzed: para kṣetrasya madhye tu setuḥ na pratiṣidhyate

original: N11.14c/ mahāguṇo 'alpabādhaś ca vṛddhir iṣṭā kṣaye sati //
analyzed: mahā guṇaḥ alpa bādhaḥ ca vṛddhiḥ iṣṭā kṣaye sati

original: N11.15a/ setus tu dvididho jñeyaḥ kheyo bandhyas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: setuḥ tu dvididhaḥ jñeyaḥ kheyaḥ bandhyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N11.15c/ toyapravartanān kheyo bandhyaḥ syāt tannivartanāt //
analyzed: toya pravartanān kheyaḥ bandhyaḥ syāt tad nivartanāt

original: N11.16a/ nāntareṇodakaṃ sasyaṃ naśyed abhyudakena tu /
analyzed: na antareṇa udakam sasyam naśyet abhi udakena tu

original: N11.16c/ ya evānudake doṣaḥ sa evābhyudake smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ eva anudake doṣaḥ saḥ eva abhi udake smṛtaḥ

original: N11.17a/ pūrvapravṛttam utsannam apṛṣṭvā svāminaṃ tu yaḥ /
analyzed: pūrva pravṛttam utsannam a pṛṣṭvā svāminam tu yaḥ

original: N11.17c/ setuṃ pravartayet kaścin na sa tatphalabhāg bhavet //
analyzed: setum pravartayet kaścid na sa tad phala bhāj bhavet

original: N11.18a/ mṛte tu svāmini punas tadvaṃśye vāpi mānave /
analyzed: mṛte tu svāmini punar tad vaṃśye vā api mānave

original: N11.18c/ rājānam āmantrya tataḥ prakuryāt setukarma tat //
analyzed: rājānam āmantrya tatas prakuryāt setu karma tat

original: N11.19a/ ato 'anyathā kleśabhāk syān mṛgavyādhānudarśanāt /
analyzed: atas anyathā kleśa bhāj syāt mṛga vyādha anudarśanāt

original: N11.19c/ iṣavas tasya naśyanti yo viddham anuvidhyati //
analyzed: iṣavaḥ tasya naśyanti yaḥ viddham anuvidhyati

original: N11.20a/ aśaktapretanaṣṭeṣu kṣetrikeṣv anivāritaḥ /
analyzed: aśakta preta naṣṭeṣu kṣetrikeṣu a nivāritaḥ

original: N11.20c/ kṣetraṃ ced vikṛṣet kaścid aśnuvīta sa tatphalam //
analyzed: kṣetram ced vikṛṣet kaścid aśnuvīta sa tad phalam

original: N11.21a/ vikṛṣyamāṇe kṣetre cet kṣetrikaḥ punar āvrajet /
analyzed: vikṛṣyamāṇe kṣetre ced kṣetrikaḥ punar āvrajet

original: N11.21c/ khilopacāraṃ tat sarvaṃ dattvā svakṣetram āpnuyāt //
analyzed: khila upacāram tat sarvam dattvā sva kṣetram āpnuyāt

original: N11.22a/ tadaṣṭabhāgāpacayād yāvat sapta gatāḥ samāḥ /
analyzed: tad aṣṭa bhāga apacayāt yāvat sapta gatāḥ samāḥ

original: N11.22c/ saṃprāpte tv aṣṭame varṣe bhuktaṃ kṣetraṃ labheta saḥ //
analyzed: saṃprāpte tu aṣṭame varṣe bhuktam kṣetram labheta saḥ

original: N11.23a/ saṃvatsareṇārdhakhilaṃ khilaṃ tad vatsarais tribhiḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsareṇa ardha khilam khilam tat vatsaraiḥ tribhiḥ

original: N11.23c/ pañcavarṣāvasannaṃ tu syāt kṣetram aṭavīsamam //
analyzed: pañca varṣa avasannam tu syāt kṣetram aṭavī samam

original: N11.24a/ kṣetraṃ tripuruṣaṃ yat syād gṛhaṃ vā syāt kramāgatam /
analyzed: kṣetram tri puruṣam yat syāt gṛham vā syāt krama āgatam

original: N11.24c/ rājaprasādād anyatra na tadbhogaḥ paraṃ nayet //
analyzed: rāja prasādāt anyatra na tad bhogaḥ param nayet

original: N11.25a/ utkramya tu vṛtiṃ yatra sasyaghāto gavādibhiḥ /
analyzed: utkramya tu vṛtim yatra sasya ghātaḥ gavādibhiḥ

original: N11.25c/ pālaḥ śāsyo bhavet tatra na cec chaktyā nivārayet //
analyzed: pālaḥ śāsyaḥ bhavet tatra na ced śaktyā nivārayet

original: N11.26a/ samūlasasyanāśe tu tatsvāmī samam āpnuyāt /
analyzed: sa mūla sasya nāśe tu tad svāmī samam āpnuyāt

original: N11.26c/ vadhena pālo mucyeta daṇḍaṃ svāmini pātayet //
analyzed: vadhena pālaḥ mucyeta daṇḍam svāmini pātayet

original: N11.27a/ gauḥ prasūtā daśāhāt ca mahokṣājāvikuñjarāḥ /
analyzed: gauḥ prasūtā daśa ahāt ca mahā ukṣa aja avi kuñjarāḥ

original: N11.27c/ nivāryās tu prayatnena teṣāṃ svāmī na daṇḍabhāk //
analyzed: nivāryāḥ tu prayatnena teṣām svāmī na daṇḍa bhāj

original: N11.28a/ māṣaṃ gāṃ dāpayed daṇḍaṃ dvau māṣau mahiṣīṃ tathā /
analyzed: māṣam gām dāpayet daṇḍam dvau māṣau mahiṣīm tathā

original: N11.28c/ ajāvike savatse tu daṇḍaḥ syād ardhamāṣakaḥ //
analyzed: ajāvike sa vatse tu daṇḍaḥ syāt ardha māṣakaḥ

original: N11.29a/ adaṇḍyā hastino 'aśvāś ca prajāpālā hi te smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: a daṇḍyāḥ hastinaḥ aśvāḥ ca prajāpālāḥ hi te smṛtāḥ

original: N11.29c/ adaṇḍyā garbhiṇī gauś ca sūtikā cābhisāriṇī //
analyzed: a daṇḍyā garbhiṇī gauḥ ca sūtikā ca abhisāriṇī

original: N11.30a/ proktas tu dvir niṣaṇṇānāṃ vasantyāṃ tu caturguṇam /
analyzed: proktaḥ tu dvis niṣaṇṇānām vasantyām tu caturguṇam

original: N11.30c/ pratyakṣacārakāṇāṃ tu cauradaṇḍaḥ smṛṭas tathā //
analyzed: pratyakṣa cārakāṇām tu caura daṇḍaḥ smṛṭaḥ tathā

original: N11.31a/ yā naṣṭāḥ pāladoṣeṇa gāvaḥ kṣetraṃ samāśritāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ naṣṭāḥ pāla doṣeṇa gāvaḥ kṣetram samāśritāḥ

original: N11.31c/ na tatra gomino daṇḍaḥ pālas taṃ daṇḍam arhati //
analyzed: na tatra gominaḥ daṇḍaḥ pālaḥ tam daṇḍam arhati

original: N11.32a/ rājagrāhagṛhīto vā vajrāśanihato 'api vā /
analyzed: rāja grāha gṛhītaḥ vā vajra aśani hataḥ api vā

original: N11.32c/ atha sarpeṇa daṣṭo vā giry agrāt patito 'api vā //
analyzed: atha sarpeṇa daṣṭaḥ vā giri agrāt patitaḥ api vā

original: N11.33a/ siṃhavyāghrahato vāpi vyādhibhiḥ caiva pātitaḥ /
analyzed: siṃha vyāghra hataḥ vā api vyādhibhiḥ ca eva pātitaḥ

original: N11.33c/ na tatra doṣaḥ pālasya na ca doṣo 'asti gominām //
analyzed: na tatra doṣaḥ pālasya na ca doṣaḥ asti gominām

original: N11.34a/ gobhis tu bhakṣitaṃ dhānyaṃ yo naraḥ pratimārgati /
analyzed: gobhiḥ tu bhakṣitam dhānyam yaḥ naraḥ pratimārgati

original: N11.34c/ sāmantasya śado deyo dhānyaṃ yat tatra vāpitam /
analyzed: sāmantasya śadaḥ deyaḥ dhānyam yat tatra vāpitam

original: N11.34e/ gavatraṃ gomine deyaṃ dhānyaṃ tatkarṣikasya tu //
analyzed: gavatram gomine deyam dhānyam tat karṣikasya tu

original: N11.35a/ grāmopānte ca yat kṣetraṃ vivītānte mahāpathe /
analyzed: grāma upānte ca yat kṣetram vivīta ante mahāpathe

original: N11.35c/ anāvṛte cet tannāśe na pālasya vyatikramaḥ //
analyzed: anāvṛte ced tad nāśe na pālasya vyatikramaḥ

original: N11.36a/ pathi kṣetre vṛtiḥ kāryā yām uṣṭro nāvalokayet /
analyzed: pathi kṣetre vṛtiḥ kāryā yām uṣṭraḥ na avalokayet

original: N11.36c/ na laṅghayet paśur nāśvo na bhidyād yāṃ ca sūkaraḥ //
analyzed: na laṅghayet paśuḥ na aśvaḥ na bhidyāt yām ca sūkaraḥ

original: N11.37a/ gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ ca vijñeyaṃ vāsahetuḥ kuṭumbinām /
analyzed: gṛham kṣetram ca vijñeyam vāsa hetuḥ kuṭumbinām

original: N11.37c/ tasmāt tan nākṣiped rājā tad dhi mūlaṃ kuṭumbinām //
analyzed: tasmāt tat na ākṣipet rājā tat hi mūlam kuṭumbinām

original: N11.38a/ vṛddhe janapade rājño dharmaḥ kośaś ca vardhate /
analyzed: vṛddhe janapade rājñaḥ dharmaḥ kośaḥ ca vardhate

original: N11.38c/ hīyate hīyamāne ca vṛddhihetum ataḥ śrayet //
analyzed: hīyate hīyamāne ca vṛddhi hetum atas śrayet

original: N12.1a/ vivāhādividhiḥ strīṇāṃ yatra puṃsāṃ ca kīrtyate /
analyzed: vivāha ādi vidhiḥ strīṇām yatra puṃsām ca kīrtyate

original: N12.1c/ strīpuṃsayoganāmaitad vivādapadam ucyate //
analyzed: strīpuṃsa yoga nāma etat vivāda padam ucyate

original: N12.2a/ strīpuṃsayos tu saṃbandhād varaṇaṃ prāg vidhīyate /
analyzed: strīpuṃsayoḥ tu saṃbandhāt varaṇam prāk vidhīyate

original: N12.2c/ varaṇād grahaṇaṃ pāṇeḥ saṃskāro 'atha dvilakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: varaṇāt grahaṇam pāṇeḥ saṃskāraḥ atha dvi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: N12.3a/ tayor aniyataṃ proktaṃ varaṇaṃ doṣadarśanāt /
analyzed: tayoḥ aniyatam proktam varaṇam doṣa darśanāt

original: N12.3c/ pāṇigrahaṇamantrābhyāṃ niyataṃ dāralakṣaṇam //
analyzed: pāṇigrahaṇa mantrābhyām niyatam dāra lakṣaṇam

original: N12.4a/ brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca parigrahe /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām śūdrāṇām ca parigrahe

original: N12.4c/ svajātyā śreyasī bhāryā svajātyaś ca patiḥ striyāḥ //
analyzed: sva jātyā śreyasī bhāryā sva jātyaḥ ca patiḥ striyāḥ

original: N12.5a/ brāhmaṇasyānulomyena striyo 'anyās tisra eva tu /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya ānulomyena striyaḥ anyāḥ tisraḥ eva tu

original: N12.5c/ śūdrāyāḥ prātilomyena tathānye patayas trayaḥ //
analyzed: śūdrāyāḥ prātilomyena tathā anye patayaḥ trayaḥ

original: N12.6a/ dve bhārye kṣatriyasyānye vaiśyasyaikā prakīrtitā /
analyzed: dve bhārye kṣatriyasya anye vaiśyasya ekā prakīrtitā

original: N12.6c/ vaiśyāyā dvau patī jñeyāv eko 'anyaḥ kṣatriyāpatiḥ //
analyzed: vaiśyāyāḥ dvau patī jñeyau ekaḥ anyaḥ kṣatriyā patiḥ

original: N12.7a/ ā saptamāt pañcamād vā bandhubhyaḥ pitṛmātṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ā saptamāt pañcamāt vā bandhubhyaḥ

original: N12.7c/ avivāhyāḥ sagotrāḥ syuḥ samānapravarās tathā //
analyzed: avivāhyāḥ sagotrāḥ syuḥ samāna pravarāḥ tathā

original: N12.8a/ parīkṣyaḥ puruṣaḥ puṃstve nijair evāṅgalakṣaṇaiḥ /
analyzed: parīkṣyaḥ puruṣaḥ puṃstve nijaiḥ eva aṅga lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: N12.8c/ pumāṃś ced avikalpena sa kanyāṃ labdhum arhati //
analyzed: pumān ced avikalpena sa kanyām labdhum arhati

original: N12.9a/ subaddhajatrujānvasthiḥ subaddhāṃsaśirodharaḥ /
analyzed: su baddha jatru jānu asthiḥ su baddha aṃsa śirodharaḥ

original: N12.9c/ sthūlaghāṭas tanūrutvag avilagnagatisvaraḥ //
analyzed: sthūla ghāṭaḥ tanu ūru tvac avilagna gati svaraḥ

original: N12.10a/ viṭ cāsya plavate nāpsu hlādi mūtraṃ ca phenilam /
analyzed: viṣ ca asya plavate na apsu hlādi mūtram ca phenilam

original: N12.10c/ pumān syāṃl lakṣaṇair etair viparītais tu paṇḍakaḥ //
analyzed: pumān syān lakṣaṇaiḥ etaiḥ viparītaiḥ tu paṇḍakaḥ

original: N12.11a/ caturdaśavidhaḥ śāstre sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: caturdaśavidhaḥ śāstre sa tu dṛṣṭaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: N12.11c/ cikitsyaś cācikitsyaś ca teṣām ukto vidhiḥ kramāt //
analyzed: cikitsyaḥ ca acikitsyaḥ ca teṣām uktaḥ vidhiḥ kramāt

original: N12.12a/ nisargapaṇḍo vadhriś ca pakṣapaṇḍas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: nisarga paṇḍaḥ vadhriḥ ca pakṣa paṇḍaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N12.12c/ abhiśāpād guro rogād devakrodhāt tathaiva ca //
analyzed: abhiśāpāt guroḥ rogāt deva krodhāt tathā eva ca

original: N12.13a/ īrṣyāpaṇḍaś ca sevyaś ca vātaretā mukhebhagaḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyāpaṇḍaḥ ca sevyaḥ ca vātaretāḥ mukhebhagaḥ

original: N12.13c/ ākṣipto moghabījaś ca śālīno 'anyapatis tathā //
analyzed: ākṣiptaḥ moghabījaḥ ca śālīnaḥ anya patiḥ tathā

original: N12.14a/ tatrādyāv apratīkarau pakṣākhyo māsam ācaret /
analyzed: tatra ādyau apratīkarau pakṣa ākhyaḥ māsam ācaret

original: N12.14c/ anukramāt trayasyāsya kālaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: anukramāt trayasya asya kālaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N12.15a/ īrṣyāpaṇḍādayo ye 'anye catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: īrṣyāpaṇḍa ādayaḥ ye anye catvāraḥ samudāhṛtāḥ

original: N12.15c/ saṃtyaktavyāḥ patitavat kṣatayonyā api striyāḥ //
analyzed: saṃtyaktavyāḥ patita vat kṣata yonyāḥ api striyāḥ

original: N12.16a/ ākṣiptamoghabījābhyām patyāv apratikarmaṇi /
analyzed: ākṣipta moghabījābhyām patyau a pratikarmaṇi

original: N12.16c/ patir anyaḥ smṛto nāryā vatsaraṃ saṃpratīkṣya tu //
analyzed: patiḥ anyaḥ smṛtaḥ nāryāḥ vatsaram saṃpratīkṣya tu

original: N12.17a/ śālīnasyāpi dhṛṣṭastrīsaṃyogād bhajyate dhvajaḥ /
analyzed: śālīnasya api dhṛṣṭa strī saṃyogāt bhajyate dhvajaḥ

original: N12.17c/ taṃ hīnavegam anyastrībālādyābhir upakramet //
analyzed: tam hīna vegam anya strī bāla ādyābhiḥ upakramet

original: N12.18a/ anyasyām yo manuṣyaḥ syād amanuṣyaḥ svayoṣiti /
analyzed: anyasyām yaḥ manuṣyaḥ syāt amanuṣyaḥ sva yoṣiti

original: N12.18c/ labheta sānyaṃ bhartāram etat kāryaṃ prajāpateḥ //
analyzed: labheta sā anyam bhartāram etat kāryam prajāpateḥ

original: N12.19a/ apatyārthaṃ striyaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ strī kṣetraṃ bījinaḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: apatya artham striyaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ strī kṣetram bījinaḥ prajāḥ

original: N12.19c/ kṣetraṃ bījavate deyaṃ nābījī kṣetram arhati //
analyzed: kṣetram bījavate deyam na abījī kṣetram arhati

original: N12.20a/ pitā dadyāt svayaṃ kanyām bhrātā vānumate pituḥ /
analyzed: pitā dadyāt svayam kanyām bhrātā vā anumate pituḥ

original: N12.20c/ mātāmaho mātulaś ca sakulyā bāndhavās tathā //
analyzed: mātāmahaḥ mātulaḥ ca sakulyāḥ bāndhavāḥ tathā

original: N12.21a/ mātābhāve tu sarveṣāṃ prakṛtau yadi vartate /
analyzed: mātā abhāve tu sarveṣām prakṛtau yadi vartate

original: N12.21c/ tasyām aprakṛtisthāyāṃ dadyuḥ kanyāṃ svajātayaḥ //
analyzed: tasyām aprakṛti sthāyām dadyuḥ kanyām sva jātayaḥ

original: N12.22a/ yadā tu naiva kaścit syāt kanyā rājānam āvrajet /
analyzed: yadā tu nā eva kaścid syāt kanyā rājānam āvrajet

original: N12.22c/ anujñayā tasya varaṃ pratītya varayet svayam //
analyzed: anujñayā tasya varam pratītya varayet svayam

original: N12.23a/ savarṇam anurūpaṃ ca kularūpavayaḥśrutaiḥ /
analyzed: savarṇam anurūpam ca kula rūpa vayaḥ śrutaiḥ

original: N12.23c/ saha dharmaṃ caret tena putrāṃś cotpādayet tataḥ //
analyzed: saha dharmam caret tena putrān ca utpādayet tatas

original: N12.24a/ pratigṛhya ca yaḥ kanyāṃ naro deśāntaraṃ vrajet /
analyzed: pratigṛhya ca yaḥ kanyām naraḥ deśa antaram vrajet

original: N12.24c/ trīn ṛtūn samatikramya kanyānyaṃ varayed varam //
analyzed: trīn ṛtūn samatikramya kanyā anyam varayet varam

original: N12.25a/ kanyā nartum upekṣeta bāndhavebhyo nivedayet /
analyzed: kanyā na ṛtum upekṣeta bāndhavebhyaḥ nivedayet

original: N12.25c/ te cen na dadyus tāṃ bhartre te syur bhrūṇahabhiḥ samāḥ //
analyzed: te ced na dadyuḥ tām bhartre te syuḥ bhrūṇa habhiḥ samāḥ

original: N12.26a/ yāvantaś ca rtavas tasyāḥ samatītā patiṃ vinā /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ ca ṛtavaḥ tasyāḥ samatītā patim vinā

original: N12.26c/ tāvatyo bhrūṇahatyāḥ syus tasya yo na dadāti tām //
analyzed: tāvatyaḥ bhrūṇa hatyāḥ syuḥ tasya yaḥ na dadāti tām

original: N12.27a/ ato 'apravṛtte rajasi kanyāṃ dadyāt pitā sakṛt /
analyzed: atas apravṛtte rajasi kanyām dadyāt pitā sakṛt

original: N12.27c/ mahad enaḥ spṛśed enam anyathaiṣa vidhiḥ satām //
analyzed: mahat enaḥ spṛśet enam anyathā eṣa vidhiḥ satām

original: N12.28a/ sakṛd aṃśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate /
analyzed: sakṛt aṃśaḥ nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate

original: N12.28c/ sakṛd āha dadānīti trīṇy etāni sakṛt sakṛt //
analyzed: sakṛt āha dadāni iti trīṇi etāni sakṛt sakṛt

original: N12.29a/ brāhmādiṣu vivāheṣu pañcasv eṣu vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: brāhma ādiṣu vivāheṣu pañcasu eṣu vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N12.29c/ guṇāpekṣaṃ bhaved dānam āsurādiṣu ca triṣu //
analyzed: guṇa apekṣam bhavet dānam āsura ādiṣu ca triṣu

original: N12.30a/ kanyāyām prāptaśulkāyāṃ jyāyāṃś ced vara āvrajet /
analyzed: kanyāyām prāpta śulkāyām jyāyān ced varaḥ āvrajet

original: N12.30c/ dharmārthakāmasaṃyuktaṃ vācyaṃ tatrānṛtaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: dharma artha kāma saṃyuktam vācyam tatra anṛtam bhavet

original: N12.31a/ nāduṣṭāṃ dūṣayet kanyāṃ nāduṣṭaṃ dūṣayed varam /
analyzed: na aduṣṭām dūṣayet kanyām na aduṣṭam dūṣayet varam

original: N12.31c/ doṣe tu sati nāgaḥ syād anyonyaṃ tyajatos tayoḥ //
analyzed: doṣe tu sati nā āgaḥ syāt anyonyam tyajatoḥ tayoḥ

original: N12.32a/ dattvā nyāyena yaḥ kanyāṃ varāya na dadāti tām /
analyzed: dattvā nyāyena yaḥ kanyām varāya na dadāti tām

original: N12.32c/ aduṣṭaś ced varo rājñā sa daṇḍyas tatra coravat //
analyzed: aduṣṭaḥ ced varaḥ rājñā sa daṇḍyaḥ tatra cora vat

original: N12.33a/ yas tu doṣavatīṃ kanyām anākhyāya prayacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ tu doṣavatīm kanyām an ākhyāya prayacchati

original: N12.33c/ tasya kuryān nṛpo daṇḍaṃ pūrvasāhasacoditam //
analyzed: tasya kuryāt nṛpaḥ daṇḍam pūrvasāhasa coditam

original: N12.34a/ akanyeti tu yaḥ kanyāṃ brūyād dveṣeṇa mānavaḥ /
analyzed: a kanyā iti tu yaḥ kanyām brūyāt dveṣeṇa mānavaḥ

original: N12.34c/ sa śataṃ prāpnuyād daṇḍaṃ tasyā doṣam adarśayan //
analyzed: sa śatam prāpnuyāt daṇḍam tasyāḥ doṣam a darśayan

original: N12.35a/ pratigṛhya tu yaḥ kanyām aduṣṭām utsṛjed varaḥ /
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu yaḥ kanyām aduṣṭām utsṛjet varaḥ

original: N12.35c/ vineyaḥ so 'apy akāmo 'api kanyāṃ tām eva codvahet //
analyzed: vineyaḥ saḥ api akāmaḥ api kanyām tām eva ca udvahet

original: N12.36a/ dīrghakutsitarogārtā vyaṅgā saṃsṛṣṭamaithunā /
analyzed: dīrgha kutsita roga ārtā vyaṅgā saṃsṛṣṭa maithunā

original: N12.36c/ dhṛṣṭānyagatabhāvā ca kanyādoṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭā anya gata bhāvā ca kanyā doṣāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: N12.37a/ unmattaḥ patitaḥ klībo durbhagas tyaktabāndhavaḥ /
analyzed: unmattaḥ patitaḥ klībaḥ durbhagaḥ tyakta bāndhavaḥ

original: N12.37c/ kanyādoṣau ca yau pūrvau eṣa doṣagaṇo vare //
analyzed: kanyā doṣau ca yau pūrvau eṣa doṣa gaṇaḥ vare

original: N12.38a/ aṣṭau vivāhā varṇānāṃ saṃskārārthaṃ prakīrtitāḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭau vivāhāḥ varṇānām saṃskāra artham prakīrtitāḥ

original: N12.38c/ brāhmas tu prathamas teṣāṃ prājāpatyas tathaiva ca //
analyzed: brāhmaḥ tu prathamaḥ teṣām prājāpatyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N12.39a/ ārṣaś caivātha daivaś ca gāndharvaś cāsuras tathā /
analyzed: ārṣaḥ ca eva atha daivaḥ ca gāndharvaḥ ca āsuraḥ tathā

original: N12.39c/ rākṣaso 'anantaras tasmāt paiśācas tv aṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: rākṣasaḥ anantaraḥ tasmāt paiśācaḥ tu aṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N12.40a/ satkṛtyāhūya kanyāṃ tu brāhme dadyād tv alaṃkṛtām /
analyzed: satkṛtya āhūya kanyām tu brāhme dadyāt tu alaṃkṛtām

original: N12.40c/ saha dharmaṃ carety uktvā prājāpatyo vidhīyate //
analyzed: saha dharmam cara iti uktvā prājāpatyaḥ vidhīyate

original: N12.41a/ vastragomithune dattvā vivāhas tv ārṣa ucyate /
analyzed: vastra go mithune dattvā vivāhaḥ tu ārṣaḥ ucyate

original: N12.41c/ antarvedyāṃ tu daivaḥ syād ṛtvije karma kurvate //
analyzed: antar vedyām tu daivaḥ syāt ṛtvije karma kurvate

original: N12.42a/ icchantīm icchate prāhur gāndharvo nāma pañcamam /
analyzed: icchantīm icchate prāhuḥ gāndharvaḥ nāma pañcamam

original: N12.42c/ vivāhas tv āsuro jñeyaḥ śulkasaṃvyavahārataḥ //
analyzed: vivāhaḥ tu āsuraḥ jñeyaḥ śulka saṃvyavahārataḥ

original: N12.43a/ prasahya haraṇād ukto vivāho rākṣasas tathā /
analyzed: prasahya haraṇāt uktaḥ vivāhaḥ rākṣasaḥ tathā

original: N12.43c/ suptamattopagamanāt paiśācas tv aṣṭamo 'adhamaḥ //
analyzed: supta matta upagamanāt paiśācaḥ tu aṣṭamaḥ adhamaḥ

original: N12.44a/ eṣāṃ tu dharmyās catvāro brāhmādyāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: eṣām tu dharmyāḥ catvāraḥ brāhma ādyāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ

original: N12.44c/ sādhāraṇaḥ syād gāndharvas trayo 'adharmyās tv ataḥ pare //
analyzed: sādhāraṇaḥ syāt gāndharvaḥ trayaḥ adharmyāḥ tu atas pare

original: N12.45a/ parapūrvāḥ striyas tv anyāḥ sapta proktā yathākramam /
analyzed: parapūrvāḥ striyaḥ tu anyāḥ sapta proktāḥ yathākramam

original: N12.45c/ punarbhūs trividhā tāsāṃ svairiṇī tu caturvidhā //
analyzed: punarbhūḥ trividhā tāsām svairiṇī tu caturvidhā

original: N12.46a/ kanyaivākṣatayonir yā pāṇigrahaṇadūṣitā /
analyzed: kanyā eva akṣatayoniḥ yā pāṇigrahaṇa dūṣitā

original: N12.46c/ punarbhūḥ prathamā soktā punaḥ saṃskāram arhati //
analyzed: punarbhūḥ prathamā sā uktā punar saṃskāram arhati

original: N12.47a/ kaumāraṃ patim utsṛjya yānyaṃ puruṣam āśritā /
analyzed: kaumāram patim utsṛjya yā anyam puruṣam āśritā

original: N12.47c/ punaḥ patyur gṛham yāyāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: punar patyuḥ gṛham yāyāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā

original: N12.48a/ asatsu devareṣu strī bāndhavair yā pradīyate /
analyzed: asatsu devareṣu strī bāndhavaiḥ yā pradīyate

original: N12.48c/ savarṇāyāsapiṇḍāya sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: savarṇāya asapiṇḍāya sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā

original: N12.49a/ strī prasūtāprasūtā vā patyāv eva tu jīvati /
analyzed: strī prasūtā a prasūtā vā patyau eva tu jīvati

original: N12.49c/ kāmāt samāśrayed anyaṃ prathamā svairiṇī tu sā //
analyzed: kāmāt samāśrayet anyam prathamā svairiṇī tu sā

original: N12.50a/ mṛte bhartari yā prāptān devarān apy apāsya tu /
analyzed: mṛte bhartari yā prāptān devarān api apāsya tu

original: N12.50c/ upagacchet paraṃ kāmāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: upagacchet param kāmāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā

original: N12.51a/ prāptā deśād dhanakrītā kṣutpipāsāturā ca yā /
analyzed: prāptā deśāt dhana krītā kṣudh pipāsā āturā ca yā

original: N12.51c/ tavāham ity upagatā sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā //
analyzed: tava aham iti upagatā sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā

original: N12.52a/ deśadharmān apekṣya strī gurubhir yā pradīyate /
analyzed: deśa dharmān apekṣya strī gurubhiḥ yā pradīyate

original: N12.52c/ utpannasāhasānyasmai sāntyā vai svairiṇī smṛtā //
analyzed: utpanna sāhasā anyasmai sā antyā vai svairiṇī smṛtā

original: N12.53a/ punarbhuvāṃ eṣa vidhiḥ svairiṇīnāṃ ca kīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: punarbhuvām eṣa vidhiḥ svairiṇīnām ca kīrtitaḥ

original: N12.53c/ pūrvā pūrvājaghanyāsāṃ śreyasī tūttarottarā //
analyzed: pūrvā pūrvā jaghanī āsām śreyasī tu uttarottarā

original: N12.54a/ apatyam utpādayitus tāsāṃ yā śulkato hṛtā /
analyzed: apatyam utpādayituḥ tāsām yā śulkataḥ hṛtā

original: N12.54c/ aśulkopanatāyāṃ tu kṣetrikasyaiva tat phalam //
analyzed: a śulka upanatāyām tu kṣetrikasya eva tat phalam

original: N12.55a/ kṣetrikasya yad ajñātaṃ kṣetre bījaṃ pradīyate /
analyzed: kṣetrikasya yat ajñātam kṣetre bījam pradīyate

original: N12.55c/ na tatra bījino bhāgaḥ kṣetrikasyaiva tad bhavet //
analyzed: na tatra bījinaḥ bhāgaḥ kṣetrikasya eva tat bhavet

original: N12.56a/ oghavātāhṛtaṃ bījaṃ kṣetre yasya prarohati /
analyzed: ogha vāta āhṛtam bījam kṣetre yasya prarohati

original: N12.56c/ phalabhug yasya tat kṣetraṃ na bījī phalabhāg bhavet //
analyzed: phala bhuj yasya tat kṣetram na bījī phala bhāj bhavet

original: N12.57a/ mahokṣo janayed vatsān yasya goṣu vraje caran /
analyzed: mahā ukṣaḥ janayet vatsān yasya goṣu vraje caran

original: N12.57c/ tasya te yasya tā gāvo moghaṃ syanditam ārṣabham //
analyzed: tasya te yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ mogham syanditam ārṣabham

original: N12.58a/ kṣetrikānumataṃ bījaṃ yasya kṣetre pramucyate /
analyzed: kṣetrika anumatam bījam yasya kṣetre pramucyate

original: N12.58c/ tadapatyaṃ dvayor eva bījikṣetrikayor matam //
analyzed: tad apatyam dvayoḥ eva bīji kṣetrikayoḥ matam

original: N12.59a/ narte kṣetraṃ bhavet sasyaṃ na ca bījaṃ vināsti tat /
analyzed: na ṛte kṣetram bhavet sasyam na ca bījam vinā asti tat

original: N12.59c/ ato 'apatyaṃ dvayor iṣṭaṃ pitur mātuś ca dharmataḥ //
analyzed: atas apatyam dvayoḥ iṣṭam pituḥ mātuḥ ca dharmataḥ

original: N12.60a/ nāthavatyā paragṛhe saṃyuktasya striyā saha /
analyzed: nāthavatyā para gṛhe saṃyuktasya striyā saha

original: N12.60c/ dṛṣṭaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ tajjñair nāgatāyāḥ svayaṃ gṛhe //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam saṃgrahaṇam tad jñaiḥ na āgatāyāḥ svayam gṛhe

original: N12.61a/ praduṣṭatyaktadārasya klībasya kṣamakasya ca /
analyzed: praduṣṭa tyakta dārasya klībasya kṣamakasya ca

original: N12.61c/ svecchayopeyuṣo dārān na doṣaḥ sāhaso bhavet //
analyzed: sva icchayā upeyuṣaḥ dārān na doṣaḥ sāhasaḥ bhavet

original: N12.62a/ parastriyā sahākāle 'adeśe vā bhavato mithaḥ /
analyzed: para striyā saha akāle adeśe vā bhavataḥ mithas

original: N12.62c/ sthānasaṃbhāṣaṇāmodās trayaḥ saṃgrahaṇakramāḥ //
analyzed: sthāna saṃbhāṣaṇa āmodāḥ trayaḥ saṃgrahaṇa kramāḥ

original: N12.63a/ nadīnāṃ saṃgame tīrtheṣv ārāmeṣu vaneṣu ca /
analyzed: nadīnām saṃgame tīrtheṣu ārāmeṣu vaneṣu ca

original: N12.63c/ strī pumāṃś ca sameyātāṃ grāhyaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: strī pumān ca sameyātām grāhyam saṃgrahaṇam bhavet

original: N12.64a/ dūtīprasthāpanaiś caiva lekhāsaṃpreṣaṇair api /
analyzed: dūtī prasthāpanaiḥ ca eva lekhā saṃpreṣaṇaiḥ api

original: N12.64c/ anyair api vyabhicāraiḥ sarvaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: anyaiḥ api vyabhicāraiḥ sarvam saṃgrahaṇam smṛtam

original: N12.65a/ striyaṃ spṛśed adeśe yaḥ spṛṣṭo vā marśayet tathā /
analyzed: striyam spṛśet adeśe yaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ vā marśayet tathā

original: N12.65c/ parasparasyānumate tac ca saṃgrahaṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: parasparasya anumate tat ca saṃgrahaṇam bhavet

original: N12.66a/ bhakṣair vā yadi vā bhojyair vastrair mālyais tathaiva ca /
analyzed: bhakṣaiḥ vā yadi vā bhojyaiḥ vastraiḥ mālyaiḥ tathā eva ca

original: N12.66c/ saṃpreṣyamānair gandhaiś ca sarvaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: saṃpreṣyamānaiḥ gandhaiḥ ca sarvam saṃgrahaṇam smṛtam

original: N12.67a/ darpād vā yadi vā mohāc chlāghayā vā svayaṃ vadet /
analyzed: darpāt vā yadi vā mohāt ślāghayā vā svayam vadet

original: N12.67c/ mameyaṃ bhuktapūrveti sarvaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: mama iyam bhukta pūrvā iti sarvam saṃgrahaṇam smṛtam

original: N12.68a/ pāṇau yaś ca nigṛhṇīyad veṇyāṃ vastrāntare 'api vā /
analyzed: pāṇau yaḥ ca nigṛhṇīyat veṇyām vastra antare api vā

original: N12.68c/ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti vā bruyāt sarvaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti vā bruyāt sarvam saṃgrahaṇam smṛtam

original: N12.69a/ svajātyatikrame puṃsāṃ uktam uttamasāhasam /
analyzed: sva jāti atikrame puṃsām uktam uttamasāhasam

original: N12.69c/ viparyaye madhyamas tu prātilome pramāpaṇam //
analyzed: viparyaye madhyamaḥ tu pramāpaṇam

original: N12.70a/ kanyāyām asakāmāyāṃ dvyāṅgulasyāvakartanam /
analyzed: kanyāyām a sa kāmāyām dvi āṅgulasya avakartanam

original: N12.70c/ uttamāyāṃ vadhas tv eva sarvasvaharaṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: uttamāyām vadhaḥ tu eva sarva sva haraṇam tathā

original: N12.71a/ sakāmāyāṃ tu kanyāyāṃ savarṇe nāsty atikramaḥ /
analyzed: sa kāmāyām tu kanyāyām savarṇe na asti atikramaḥ

original: N12.71c/ kiṃtv alaṃkṛtya satkṛtya sa evaināṃ samudvahet //
analyzed: kiṃtu alaṃkṛtya satkṛtya saḥ eva enām samudvahet

original: N12.72a/ mātā mātṛṣvasā śvaśrūr mātulānī pitṛṣvasā /
analyzed: mātā mātṛṣvasā śvaśrūḥ mātulānī pitṛṣvasā

original: N12.72c/ pitṛvyasakhiśiṣyastrī bhaginī tatsakhī snuṣā //
N12.73a/ duhitācāryabhāryā ca sagotrā śaraṇāgatā /
analyzed: duhitā ācārya bhāryā ca sagotrā śaraṇa āgatā

original: N12.73c/ rājñī pravrajitā dhātrī sādhvī varṇottamā ca yā //
analyzed: rājñī pravrajitā dhātrī sādhvī varṇa uttamā ca yā

original: N12.74a/ āsām anyatamāṃ gatvā gurutalpaga ucyate /
analyzed: āsām anyatamām gatvā gurutalpa gaḥ ucyate

original: N12.74c/ śiśnasyotkartanaṃ daṇḍo nānyas tatra vidhīyate //
analyzed: śiśnasya utkartanam daṇḍaḥ na anyaḥ tatra vidhīyate

original: N12.75a/ paśuyonyām atikrāman vineyaḥ sa damaṃ śatam /
analyzed: paśu yonyām atikrāman vineyaḥ sa damam śatam

original: N12.75c/ madhyamaṃ sāhasaṃ goṣu tad evāntyāvasāyiṣu //
analyzed: madhyamam sāhasam goṣu tat eva antyāvasāyiṣu

original: N12.76a/ agamyāgāminaḥ śāsti daṇḍo rājñā pracoditaḥ /
analyzed: agamyā gāminaḥ śāsti daṇḍaḥ rājñā pracoditaḥ

original: N12.76c/ prāyaścittavidhāv atra prāyaścittaṃ viśodhanam //
analyzed: prāyaścitta vidhau atra prāyaścittam viśodhanam

original: N12.77a/ svairiṇy abrāhmaṇī veśyā dāsī niṣkāsinī ca yā /
analyzed: svairiṇī a brāhmaṇī veśyā dāsī niṣkāsinī ca yā

original: N12.77c/ gamyāḥ syur ānulomyena striyo na pratilomataḥ //
analyzed: gamyāḥ syuḥ ānulomyena striyaḥ na pratilomataḥ

original: N12.78a/ āsv eva tu bhujiṣyāsu doṣaḥ syāt paradāravat /
analyzed: āsu eva tu bhujiṣyāsu doṣaḥ syāt para dāra vat

original: N12.78c/ gamyā api hi nopeyās tāś ced anyaparigrahāḥ //
analyzed: gamyāḥ api hi na upeyāḥ tāḥ ced anya parigrahāḥ

original: N12.79a/ anutpannaprajāyās tu patiḥ preyād yadi striyāḥ /
analyzed: an utpanna prajāyāḥ tu patiḥ preyāt yadi striyāḥ

original: N12.79c/ niyuktā gurubhir gacched devaraṃ putrakāmyayā //
analyzed: niyuktā gurubhiḥ gacchet devaram putra kāmyayā

original: N12.80a/ sa ca tāṃ pratipadyeta tathaivā putrajanmataḥ /
analyzed: sa ca tām pratipadyeta tathā evā putra janmataḥ

original: N12.80c/ putre jāte nivarteta viplavaḥ syād ato 'anyathā //
analyzed: putre jāte nivarteta viplavaḥ syāt atas anyathā

original: N12.81a/ ghṛtenābhyajya gātrāṇi tailenāvikṛtena vā /
analyzed: ghṛtena abhyajya gātrāṇi tailena avikṛtena vā

original: N12.81c/ mukhān mukhaṃ pariharan gātrair gātrāṇy asaṃspṛśan //
analyzed: mukhāt mukham pariharan gātraiḥ gātrāṇi a saṃspṛśan

original: N12.82a/ striyaṃ putravatīṃ vandhyāṃ nīrajaskām anicchantīm /
analyzed: striyam putravatīm vandhyām nīrajaskām an icchantīm

original: N12.82c/ na gacched garbhiṇīṃ nindyām aniyuktāṃ ca bandhubhiḥ //
analyzed: na gacchet garbhiṇīm nindyām a niyuktām ca bandhubhiḥ

original: N12.83a/ aniyuktā tu yā nārī devarāj janayet sutam /
analyzed: a niyuktā tu yā nārī devarāj janayet sutam

original: N12.83c/ jārajātam arikthīyaṃ tam āhur dharmavādinaḥ //
analyzed: jārajātam arikthīyam tam āhuḥ dharma vādinaḥ

original: N12.84a/ tathāniyukto bhāryāyāṃ yavīyāñ jyāyaso vrajet /
analyzed: tathā a niyuktaḥ bhāryāyām yavīyān jyāyasaḥ vrajet

original: N12.84c/ yavīyaso vā yo jyāyān ubhau tau gurutalpagau //
analyzed: yavīyasaḥ vā yaḥ jyāyān ubhau tau guru talpa gau

original: N12.85a/ kule tadavaśeṣe tu saṃtānārthaṃ na kāmataḥ /
analyzed: kule tad avaśeṣe tu saṃtāna artham na kāmataḥ

original: N12.85c/ niyukto gurubhir gacched bhrātṛbhāryāṃ yavīyasaḥ //
analyzed: niyuktaḥ gurubhiḥ gacchet bhrātṛ bhāryām yavīyasaḥ

original: N12.86a/ avidyamāne tu gurau rājño vācyaḥ kulakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: a vidyamāne tu gurau rājñaḥ vācyaḥ kula kṣayaḥ

original: N12.86c/ tatas tadvacanād gacched anuśiṣya striyā saha //
analyzed: tatas tad vacanāt gacchet anuśiṣya striyā saha

original: N12.87a/ pūrvoktenaiva vidhinā snātāṃ puṃsavane śuciḥ /
analyzed: pūrva uktena eva vidhinā snātām puṃsavane śuciḥ

original: N12.87c/ sakṛd ā garbhādhānād vā kṛte garbhe snuṣaiva sā //
analyzed: sakṛt ā garbhādhānāt vā kṛte garbhe snuṣā eva sā

original: N12.88a/ ato 'anyathā vartamānaḥ pumān strī vāpi kāmataḥ /
analyzed: atas anyathā vartamānaḥ pumān strī vā api kāmataḥ

original: N12.88c/ vineyau subhṛśaṃ rājñā kilbiṣī syād anigrahāt //
analyzed: vineyau su bhṛśam rājñā kilbiṣī syāt anigrahāt

original: N12.89a/ īrṣyāsūyasamutthe tu saṃrambhe rāgahetuke /
analyzed: īrṣyā asūyā samutthe tu saṃrambhe rāga hetuke

original: N12.89c/ dampatī vivadeyātāṃ na jñātiṣu na rājani //
analyzed: dampatī vivadeyātām na jñātiṣu na rājani

original: N12.90a/ anyonyaṃ tyajator nāgaḥ syād anyonyaviruddhayoḥ /
analyzed: anyonyam tyajatoḥ na āgaḥ syāt anyonya viruddhayoḥ

original: N12.90c/ strīpuṃsayor nigūḍhāyā vyabhicārād ṛte striyāḥ //
analyzed: strīpuṃsayoḥ nigūḍhāyāḥ vyabhicārāt ṛte striyāḥ

original: N12.91a/ vyabhicāre striyā mauṇḍyam adhaḥśayanam eva ca /
analyzed: vyabhicāre striyāḥ mauṇḍyam adhas śayanam eva ca

original: N12.91c/ kadannaṃ vā kuvāsaś ca karma cāvaskaroñjhanam //
analyzed: kadannam vā kuvāsaḥ ca karma

original: N12.92a/ strīdhanabhraṣṭasarvasvāṃ garbhavisraṃsinīṃ tathā /
analyzed: strīdhana bhraṣṭa sarva svām garbha visraṃsinīm tathā

original: N12.92c/ bhartuś ca vadham icchantīṃ striyaṃ nirvāsayed gṛhāt //
analyzed: bhartuḥ ca vadham icchantīm striyam nirvāsayet gṛhāt

original: N12.93a/ anarthaśīlāṃ satataṃ tathaivāpriyavādinīm /
analyzed: anartha śīlām satatam tathā eva apriya vādinīm

original: N12.93c/ pūrvāśinīṃ ca yā bhartuḥ striyaṃ nirvāsayed budhaḥ //
analyzed: pūrva āśinīm ca yā bhartuḥ striyam nirvāsayet budhaḥ

original: N12.94a/ vandhyāṃ strījananīṃ nindyāṃ pratikulāṃ ca sarvadā /
analyzed: vandhyām strī jananīm nindyām ca sarvadā

original: N12.94c/ kāmato nābhinandeta kurvann evaṃ sa doṣabhāk //
analyzed: kāmataḥ na abhinandeta kurvan evam sa doṣa bhāj

original: N12.95a/ anukūlām avāgduṣṭāṃ dakṣāṃ sādhvīṃ prajāvatīm /
analyzed: anukūlām dakṣām sādhvīm prajāvatīm

original: N12.95c/ tyajan bhāryām avasthāpyo rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā //
analyzed: tyajan bhāryām avasthāpyaḥ rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā

original: N12.96a/ ajñātadoṣeṇoḍhā yā nirgatā nānyam āśritā /
analyzed: ajñāta doṣeṇa ūḍhā yā nirgatā na anyam āśritā

original: N12.96c/ bandhubhiḥ sā niyoktavyā nirbandhuḥ svayam āśrayet //
analyzed: bandhubhiḥ sā niyoktavyā nirbandhuḥ svayam āśrayet

original: N12.97a/ naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe ca patite patau /
analyzed: naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe ca patite patau

original: N12.97c/ pañcasv āpatsu nārīṇāṃ patir anyo vidhīyate //
analyzed: pañcasu āpatsu nārīṇām patiḥ anyaḥ vidhīyate

original: N12.98a/ aṣṭau varṣāṇy udīkṣeta brāhmaṇī proṣitaṃ patim /
analyzed: aṣṭau varṣāṇi udīkṣeta brāhmaṇī proṣitam patim

original: N12.98c/ aprasūtā tu catvāri parato 'anyaṃ samāśrayet //
analyzed: aprasūtā tu catvāri paratas anyam samāśrayet

original: N12.99a/ kṣatriyā ṣaṭ samās tiṣṭhed aprasūtā samātrayam /
analyzed: kṣatriyā ṣaḍ samāḥ tiṣṭhet a prasūtā samā trayam

original: N12.99c/ vaiśyā prasūtā catvāri dve same tv itarā vaset //
analyzed: vaiśyā prasūtā catvāri dve same tu itarā vaset

original: N12.100a/ na śūdrāyāḥ smṛtaḥ kālo na ca dharmavyatikramaḥ /
analyzed: na śūdrāyāḥ smṛtaḥ kālaḥ na ca dharma vyatikramaḥ

original: N12.100c/ viśeṣato 'aprasūtāyāḥ saṃvatsaraparā sthitiḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ aprasūtāyāḥ saṃvatsara parā sthitiḥ

original: N12.101a/ apravṛttau smṛtaḥ dharma eṣa proṣitayoṣitām /
analyzed: apravṛttau smṛtaḥ dharmaḥ eṣa proṣita yoṣitām

original: N12.101c/ jīvati śrūyamāṇe tu syād eṣa dviguṇo vidhiḥ //
analyzed: jīvati śrūyamāṇe tu syāt eṣa dviguṇaḥ vidhiḥ

original: N12.102a/ prajāpravṛttau bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭir eṣā prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: prajā pravṛttau bhūtānām sṛṣṭiḥ eṣā prajāpateḥ

original: N12.102c/ ato 'anyagamane strīṇām evaṃ doṣo na vidyate //
analyzed: atas anya gamane strīṇām evam doṣaḥ na vidyate

original: N12.103a/ ānulomyena varṇānāṃ yaj janma sa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: ānulomyena varṇānām yat janma sa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N12.103c/ prātilomyena yaj janma sa jñeyo varṇasaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: prātilomyena yat janma sa jñeyaḥ varṇa saṃkaraḥ

original: N12.104a/ anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ putraḥ putra ekāntaras tathā /
analyzed: anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ putraḥ putraḥ eka antaraḥ tathā

original: N12.104c/ dvyantaraś cānulomyena tathaiva pratilomataḥ //
analyzed: dvi antaraḥ ca ānulomyena tathā eva pratilomataḥ

original: N12.105a/ ugraḥ pāraśavaś caiva niṣādaś cānulomataḥ /
analyzed: ugraḥ pāraśavaḥ ca eva niṣādaḥ ca anulomataḥ

original: N12.105c/ uttamebhyas trayas tribhyaḥ śūdrāputrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: uttamebhyaḥ trayaḥ tribhyaḥ śūdrā putrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: N12.106a/ brāhmaṇyā api cāṇḍālasūtavaidehakā api /
analyzed: brāhmaṇyāḥ api cāṇḍālasūtavaidehakāḥ api

original: N12.106c/ aparebhyas trayas tribhyā vijñeyaḥ pratilomataḥ //
analyzed: aparebhyaḥ trayaḥ vijñeyaḥ pratilomataḥ

original: N12.107a/ ambaṣṭho māgadhaś caiva kṣattā ca kṣatriyāsutāḥ /
analyzed: ambaṣṭhaḥ māgadhaḥ ca eva kṣattā ca kṣatriyā sutāḥ

original: N12.107c/ ānulomyena tatraiko dvau jñeyau pratilomataḥ //
analyzed: ānulomyena tatra ekaḥ dvau jñeyau pratilomataḥ

original: N12.108a/ vaiśyāputrās tu dauṣṣantayavanāyogavā api /
analyzed: vaiśyā putrāḥ tu dauṣṣanta yavana ayogavāḥ api

original: N12.108c/ prātilomyena yatraiko dvau jñeyau cānulomajau //
analyzed: prātilomyena yatra ekaḥ dvau jñeyau ca anuloma jau

original: N12.109a/ sūtādyāḥ pratilomās tu ye jātipratilomajāḥ /
analyzed: sūta ādyāḥ pratilomāḥ tu ye jāti pratiloma jāḥ

original: N12.109c/ te saṃkarāḥ śvapākādyās teṣāṃ triḥ saptako gaṇaḥ //
analyzed: te saṃkarāḥ śvapāka ādyāḥ teṣām tris saptakaḥ gaṇaḥ

original: N12.110a/ savarṇo brāhmaṇīputraḥ kṣatriyāyām anantaraḥ /
analyzed: savarṇaḥ brāhmaṇī putraḥ kṣatriyāyām anantaraḥ

original: N12.110c/ ambaṣṭhograu tathā putrāv evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ //
analyzed: ambaṣṭha ugrau tathā putrau evam kṣatriya vaiśyayoḥ

original: N12.111a/ ekāntaras tu dauṣṣanto vaiśyāyāṃ brāhmaṇāt sutaḥ /
analyzed: eka antaraḥ tu vaiśyāyām brāhmaṇāt sutaḥ

original: N12.111c/ śūdrāyāṃ kṣatriyāt tadvan niṣādo nāma jāyate //
analyzed: śūdrāyām kṣatriyāt tadvat niṣādaḥ nāma jāyate

original: N12.112a/ śūdrā pāraśavaṃ sūte brāhmaṇād uttaraṃ sutam /
analyzed: śūdrā pāraśavam sūte brāhmaṇāt uttaram sutam

original: N12.112c/ ānulomyena varṇānāṃ putrā hy ete prakīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: ānulomyena varṇānām putrāḥ hi ete prakīrtitāḥ

original: N12.113a/ sūtaś ca māgadhaś caiva putrāv āyogavas tathā /
analyzed: sūtaḥ ca māgadhaḥ ca eva putrau āyogavaḥ tathā

original: N12.113c/ prātilomyena varṇānāṃ tadvad ete 'apy anantarāḥ //
analyzed: prātilomyena varṇānām tadvat ete api anantarāḥ

original: N12.114a/ anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ sūto brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāt sutaḥ /
analyzed: anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ sūtaḥ brāhmaṇyām kṣatriyāt sutaḥ

original: N12.114c/ māgadhāyogavau tadvad dvī putrau vaiśyaśūdrayoḥ //
analyzed: māgadha āyogavau tadvat putrau vaiśya śūdrayoḥ

original: N12.115a/ brāhmaṇy ekāntaraṃ vaiśyāt sūte vaidehakaṃ sutam /
analyzed: brāhmaṇī eka antaram vaiśyāt sūte vaidehakam sutam

original: N12.115c/ kṣattāraṃ kṣatriyā śūdrāt putram ekāntaraṃ tathā //
analyzed: kṣattāram kṣatriyā śūdrāt putram eka antaram tathā

original: N12.116a/ dvyantaraḥ prātilomyena pāpiṣṭhaḥ sati saṃkare /
analyzed: dvi antaraḥ prātilomyena pāpiṣṭhaḥ sati saṃkare

original: N12.116c/ cāṇḍālo jāyate śūdrād brāhmaṇī yatra muhyati //
analyzed: cāṇḍālaḥ jāyate śūdrāt brāhmaṇī yatra muhyati

original: N12.117a/ rājñā parīkṣyaṃ na yathā jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ /
analyzed: rājñā parīkṣyam na yathā jāyate varṇa saṃkaraḥ

original: N12.117c/ tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa trayī rakṣyā tu saṃkarāt //
analyzed: tasmāt rājñā viśeṣeṇa trayī rakṣyā tu saṃkarāt

original: N13.1a/ vibhāgo 'arthasya pitryasya putrair yatra prakalpyate /
analyzed: vibhāgaḥ arthasya pitryasya putraiḥ yatra prakalpyate

original: N13.1c/ dāyabhāga iti proktaṃ tad vivādapadaṃ budhaiḥ //
analyzed: dāya bhāgaḥ iti proktam tat vivāda padam budhaiḥ

original: N13.2a/ pitary ūrdhvaṃ mṛte putrā vibhajeyur dhanaṃ pituḥ /
analyzed: pitari ūrdhvam mṛte putrāḥ vibhajeyuḥ dhanam pituḥ

original: N13.2c/ mātur duhitaro 'abhāve duhitāṃ tadanvayaḥ //
analyzed: mātuḥ duhitaraḥ abhāve duhitām tad anvayaḥ

original: N13.3a/ mātur nivṛtte rajasi prattāsu bhaginīṣu ca /
analyzed: mātuḥ nivṛtte rajasi prattāsu bhaginīṣu ca

original: N13.3c/ niraṣṭe vāpy amaraṇe pitary uparataspṛhe //
analyzed: niraṣṭe vā api amaraṇe pitari uparata spṛhe

original: N13.4a/ pitaiva vā svayaṃ putrān vibhajed vayasi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: pitā eva vā svayam putrān vibhajet vayasi sthitaḥ

original: N13.4c/ jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhavibhāgena yathā vāsya matir bhavet //
analyzed: jyeṣṭham śreṣṭha vibhāgena yathā vā asya matiḥ bhavet

original: N13.5a/ bibhṛyād vecchataḥ sarvāñ jyeṣṭho bhrātā yathā pitā /
analyzed: bibhṛyāt vā icchataḥ sarvām jyeṣṭhaḥ bhrātā yathā pitā

original: N13.5c/ bhrātā śaktaḥ kaniṣṭho vā śaktyapekṣaḥ kule kriyā //
analyzed: bhrātā śaktaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ vā śakti apekṣaḥ kule kriyā

original: N13.6a/ śauryabhāryādhane hitvā yac ca vidyādhanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: śaurya bhāryā dhane hitvā yat ca vidyā dhanam bhavet

original: N13.6c/ trīṇy etāny avibhājyāni prasādo yaś ca paitṛkaḥ //
analyzed: trīṇi etāni avibhājyāni prasādaḥ yaḥ ca paitṛkaḥ

original: N13.7a/ mātrā ca svadhanaṃ dattaṃ yasmai syāt prītipūrvakam /
analyzed: mātrā ca sva dhanam dattam yasmai syāt prīti pūrvakam

original: N13.7c/ tasyāpy eṣa vidhir dṛṣṭo mātāpīṣṭe yathā pitā //
analyzed: tasya api eṣa vidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ mātā api īṣṭe yathā pitā

original: N13.8a/ adhyagnyadhyāvahanikaṃ bhartṛdāyas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: bhartṛ dāyaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N13.8c/ bhrātṛmātṛpitṛbhyaś ca ṣaḍvidhaṃ strīdhanaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: bhrātṛ mātṛ pitṛbhyaḥ ca ṣaḍvidham strīdhanam smṛtam

original: N13.9a/ strīdhanaṃ tadapatyānāṃ bhartṛgāmy aprajāsu ca /
analyzed: strīdhanam tat apatyānām bhartṛ gāmi aprajāsu ca

original: N13.9c/ brāhmādiṣu catuḥṣv āhuḥ pitṛgāmītareṣu tu //
analyzed: brāhma ādiṣu āhuḥ pitṛ gāmi itareṣu tu

original: N13.10a/ kuṭumbaṃ bibhṛyād bhrātur yo vidyām adhigacchataḥ /
analyzed: kuṭumbam bibhṛyāt bhrātuḥ yaḥ vidyām adhigacchataḥ

original: N13.10c/ bhāgaṃ vidyādhanāt tasmāt sa labhetāśruto 'api san //
analyzed: bhāgam vidyā dhanāt tasmāt sa labheta aśrutaḥ api san

original: N13.11a/ vaidyo 'avaidyāya nākāmo dadyād aṃśaṃ svato dhanāt /
analyzed: vaidyaḥ avaidyāya na akāmaḥ dadyāt aṃśam svataḥ dhanāt

original: N13.11c/ pitṛdravyaṃ tad āśritya na cet tena tad āhṛtam //
analyzed: pitṛ dravyam tat āśritya na ced tena tat āhṛtam

original: N13.12a/ dvāv āṃśau pratipadyeta vibhajann ātmanaḥ pitā /
analyzed: dvau āṃśau pratipadyeta vibhajan ātmanaḥ pitā

original: N13.12c/ samāṃśabhāginī mātā putrāṇāṃ syān mṛte patau //
analyzed: sama aṃśa bhāginī mātā putrāṇām syāt mṛte patau

original: N13.13a/ jyeṣṭhāyāṃśo 'adhiko deyaḥ jyeṣṭhāya tu varaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhāya aṃśaḥ adhikaḥ deyaḥ jyeṣṭhāya tu varaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N13.13c/ samāṃśabhājaḥ śeṣāḥ syur aprattā bhaginī tathā //
analyzed: sama aṃśa bhājaḥ śeṣāḥ syuḥ aprattā bhaginī tathā

original: N13.14a/ kṣetrajeṣv api putreṣu tadvaj jāteṣu dharmataḥ /
analyzed: kṣetrajeṣu api putreṣu tadvat jāteṣu dharmataḥ

original: N13.14c/ varṇāvareṣv aṃśahānir ūḍhājāteṣv anukramāt //
analyzed: varṇa avareṣu aṃśa hāniḥ ūḍhā jāteṣu anukramāt

original: N13.15a/ pitraiva tu vibhaktā ye hīnādhikasamair dhanaiḥ /
analyzed: pitrā eva tu vibhaktāḥ ye hīna adhika samaiḥ dhanaiḥ

original: N13.15c/ teṣāṃ sa eva dharmaḥ syāt sarvasya hi pitā prabhuḥ //
analyzed: teṣām saḥ eva dharmaḥ syāt sarvasya hi pitā prabhuḥ

original: N13.16a/ kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca gūḍhāyāṃ yaś ca jāyate /
analyzed: kānīnaḥ ca sahoḍhaḥ ca gūḍhāyām yaḥ ca jāyate

original: N13.16c/ teṣāṃ voḍhāpitā jñeyas te ca bhāgaharāḥ smṛtāḥ //
analyzed: teṣām vā ūḍhā pitā jñeyaḥ te ca bhāga harāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: N13.17a/ ajñātapitṛko yaś ca kānīno 'anūḍhamātṛkaḥ /
analyzed: a jñāta pitṛkaḥ yaḥ ca kānīnaḥ an ūḍha mātṛkaḥ

original: N13.17c/ mātāmahāya dadyāt sa piṇḍaṃ rikthaṃ hareta ca //
analyzed: mātāmahāya dadyāt sa piṇḍam riktham hareta ca

original: N13.18a/ jātā ye tv aniyuktāyām ekena bahubhis tathā /
analyzed: jātāḥ ye tu a niyuktāyām ekena bahubhiḥ tathā

original: N13.18c/ arikthabhājas te sarve bījinām eva te sutāḥ //
analyzed: arikthabhājaḥ te sarve bījinām eva te sutāḥ

original: N13.19a/ dadyus te bījine piṇḍaṃ mātā cec chulkato hṛtā /
analyzed: dadyuḥ te bījine piṇḍam mātā ced śulkataḥ hṛtā

original: N13.19c/ aśulkopagatāyāṃ tu piṇḍadā voḍhur eva te //
analyzed: a śulka upagatāyām tu piṇḍadāḥ voḍhuḥ eva te

original: N13.20a/ pitṛdviṭ patitaḥ paṇḍo yaś ca syād aupapātikaḥ /
analyzed: pitṛ dviṣ patitaḥ paṇḍaḥ yaḥ ca syāt aupapātikaḥ

original: N13.20c/ aurasā api naite 'aṃśaṃ labheran kṣetrajāḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: aurasāḥ api na ete aṃśam labheran kṣetrajāḥ kutas

original: N13.21a/ dīrghatīvrāmayagrastā jaḍonmattāndhapaṅgavaḥ /
analyzed: dīrgha tīvra āmaya grastāḥ jaḍa unmatta andha paṅgavaḥ

original: N13.21c/ bhartavyāḥ syuḥ kule caite tatputrās tv aṃśabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: bhartavyāḥ syuḥ kule ca ete tad putrāḥ tu aṃśa bhāginaḥ

original: N13.22a/ dvirāmuṣyāyaṇā dadyur dvābhyāṃ piṇḍodake pṛthak /
analyzed: dvis āmuṣyāyaṇāḥ dadyuḥ dvābhyām piṇḍa udake pṛthak

original: N13.22c/ rikthād ardhāṃśam ādadyur bījikṣetrikayos tathā //
analyzed: rikthāt ardha aṃśam ādadyuḥ bīji kṣetrikayoḥ tathā

original: N13.23a/ saṃsṛṣṭināṃ tu yo bhāgas teṣām eva sa iṣyate /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭinām tu yaḥ bhāgaḥ teṣām eva saḥ iṣyate

original: N13.23c/ ato 'anyathāṃśabhājo hi nirbījiṣv itarān iyāt //
analyzed: atas anyathā aṃśa bhājaḥ hi nirbījiṣu itarān iyāt

original: N13.24a/ bhrātām aprajaḥ preyāt kaścic cet pravrajet tu vā /
analyzed: aprajaḥ preyāt kaścid ced pravrajet tu vā

original: N13.24c/ vibhajeyur dhanaṃ tasya śeṣās tu strīdhanaṃ vinā //
analyzed: vibhajeyuḥ dhanam tasya śeṣāḥ tu strīdhanam vinā

original: N13.25a/ bharaṇam cāsya kurvīran strīṇām ā jīvitakṣayāt /
analyzed: bharaṇam ca asya kurvīran strīṇām ā jīvitakṣayāt

original: N13.25c/ rakṣanti śayyāṃ bhartuś ced ācchindyur itarāsu tu //
analyzed: rakṣanti śayyām bhartuḥ ced ācchindyuḥ itarāsu tu

original: N13.26a/ syād yasya duhitā tasyāḥ pitraṃśo bharaṇe mataḥ /
analyzed: syāt yasya duhitā tasyāḥ pitṛ aṃśaḥ bharaṇe mataḥ

original: N13.26c/ ā saṃskārād bhajed enāṃ parato bibhṛyāt patiḥ //
analyzed: ā saṃskārāt bhajet enām paratas bibhṛyāt patiḥ

original: N13.27a/ mṛte bhartary aputrāyāḥ patipakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ /
analyzed: mṛte bhartari aputrāyāḥ pati pakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ

original: N13.27c/ viniyogātmarakṣāsu bharaṇe ca sa īśvaraḥ //
analyzed: viniyoga ātma rakṣāsu bharaṇe ca saḥ īśvaraḥ

original: N13.28a/ parikṣīṇe patikule nirmaṇuṣye nirāśraye /
analyzed: parikṣīṇe pati kule nirmaṇuṣye nirāśraye

original: N13.28c/ tatsapiṇḍeṣu vāsatsu pitṛpakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ //
analyzed: tad sapiṇḍeṣu vā asatsu pitṛ pakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ

original: N13.29a/ pakṣadvayāvasāne tu rājā bhartā smṛtaḥ striyāḥ /
analyzed: pakṣa dvaya avasāne tu rājā bhartā smṛtaḥ striyāḥ

original: N13.29c/ sa tasyā bharaṇaṃ kuryān nigṛhṇīyāt pathaś cyutām //
analyzed: sa tasyāḥ bharaṇam kuryāt nigṛhṇīyāt pathaḥ cyutām

original: N13.30a/ svātantryād vipraṇaśyanti kule jātā api striyaḥ /
analyzed: svātantryāt vipraṇaśyanti kule jātāḥ api striyaḥ

original: N13.30c/ asvātantryam atas tāsāṃ prajāpatir akalpayat //
analyzed: asvātantryam atas tāsām prajāpatiḥ akalpayat

original: N13.31a/ pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane /
analyzed: pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane

original: N13.31c/ putrā rakṣanti vaidhavye na strī svātantryam arhati //
analyzed: putrāḥ rakṣanti vaidhavye na strī svātantryam arhati

original: N13.32a/ yac chiṣṭaṃ pitṛdāyebhyo dattva rṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ ca yat /
