analyzed: yat śiṣṭam pitṛ dāyebhyaḥ dattvā ṛṇam paitṛkam ca yat

original: N13.32c/ bhrātṛbhis tad vibhaktavyam ṛṇī na syād yathā pitā //
analyzed: bhrātṛbhiḥ tat vibhaktavyam ṛṇī na syāt yathā pitā

original: N13.33a/ yeṣāṃ ca na kṛtāḥ pitrā saṃskāravidhayaḥ kramāt /
analyzed: yeṣām ca na kṛtāḥ pitrā saṃskāra vidhayaḥ kramāt

original: N13.33c/ kartavyā bhrātṛbhis teṣāṃ paitṛkād eva te dhanāt //
analyzed: kartavyāḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ teṣām paitṛkāt eva te dhanāt

original: N13.34a/ avidyamāne pitrye 'arthe svāṃśād uddhṛtya vā punaḥ /
analyzed: a vidyamāne pitrye arthe sva aṃśāt uddhṛtya vā punar

original: N13.34c/ avaśyakāryāḥ saṃskārā bhrātāṃ pūrvasaṃskṛtaiḥ //
analyzed: avaśya kāryāḥ saṃskārāḥ bhrātām pūrva saṃskṛtaiḥ

original: N13.35a/ kuṭumbārtheṣu codyuktas tatkāryaṃ kurute ca yaḥ /
analyzed: kuṭumba artheṣu ca udyuktaḥ tat kāryam kurute ca yaḥ

original: N13.35c/ sa bhrātṛbhir bṛṃhaṇīyo grāsāchādanavāhanaiḥ //
analyzed: sa bhrātṛbhiḥ bṛṃhaṇīyaḥ grāsa āchādana vāhanaiḥ

original: N13.36a/ vibhāgadharmasaṃdehe dāyādānāṃ vinirṇaye /
analyzed: vibhāga dharma saṃdehe dāyādānām vinirṇaye

original: N13.36c/ jñātibhir bhāgalekhyaiś ca pṛthakkāryapravartanāt //
analyzed: jñātibhiḥ bhāga lekhyaiḥ ca pṛthak kārya pravartanāt

original: N13.37a/ bhrātām avibhaktānām eko dharmaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: avibhaktānām ekaḥ dharmaḥ pravartate

original: N13.37c/ vibhāge sati dharmo 'api bhaved eṣāṃ pṛthak pṛthak //
analyzed: vibhāge sati dharmaḥ api bhavet eṣām pṛthak pṛthak

original: N13.38a/ dānagrahaṇapaśvannagṛhakṣetraparigrahāḥ /
analyzed: dāna grahaṇa paśu anna gṛha kṣetra parigrahāḥ

original: N13.38c/ vibhaktānāṃ pṛthag jñeyāḥ pākadharmāgamavyayāḥ //
analyzed: vibhaktānām pṛthak jñeyāḥ pāka dharma āgama vyayāḥ

original: N13.39a/ sākṣitvaṃ prātibhāvyaṃ ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca /
analyzed: sākṣi tvam prātibhāvyam ca dānam grahaṇam eva ca

original: N13.39c/ vibhaktā bhrātaraḥ kūryur nāvibhaktā parasparam //
analyzed: vibhaktāḥ bhrātaraḥ kūryuḥ na avibhaktā parasparam

original: N13.40a/ yeṣām etāḥ kriyā loke pravartante svarikthinām /
analyzed: yeṣām etāḥ kriyāḥ loke pravartante sva rikthinām

original: N13.40c/ vibhaktān avagaccheyur lekhyam apy antareṇa tān //
analyzed: vibhaktān avagaccheyuḥ lekhyam api antareṇa tān

original: N13.41a/ yady ekajātā bahavaḥ pṛthagdharmāḥ pṛthakkriyāḥ /
analyzed: yadi eka jātāḥ bahavaḥ pṛthak dharmāḥ pṛthak kriyāḥ

original: N13.41c/ pṛthakkarmaguṇopetā na te kṛtyeṣu saṃmatāḥ //
analyzed: pṛthak karma guṇa upetāḥ na te kṛtyeṣu saṃmatāḥ

original: N13.42a/ svān bhāgān yadi dadyus te vikrīṇīrann athāpi vā /
analyzed: svān bhāgān yadi dadyuḥ te vikrīṇīran atha api vā

original: N13.42c/ kuryur yatheṣṭaṃ tat sarvam īśante svadhanasya te //
analyzed: kuryuḥ yathā iṣṭam tat sarvam īśante sva dhanasya te

original: N13.43a/ aurasaḥ kṣetrajaś caiva putrikāputra eva ca /
analyzed: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaḥ ca eva putrikā putraḥ eva ca

original: N13.43c/ kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca gūḍhotpannas tathaiva ca //
analyzed: kānīnaḥ ca sahoḍhaḥ ca gūḍha utpannaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N13.44a/ paunarbhavo 'apaviddhaś ca labdhaḥ krītaḥ kṛtas tathā /
analyzed: paunarbhavaḥ apaviddhaḥ ca labdhaḥ krītaḥ kṛtaḥ tathā

original: N13.44c/ svayaṃ copagataḥ putrā dvādaśaita udāhṛtāḥ //
analyzed: svayam ca upagataḥ putrāḥ dvādaśā ete udāhṛtāḥ

original: N13.45a/ teṣāṃ ṣaḍ bandhudāyādāḥ ṣaḍ adāyādabāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: teṣām ṣaṭ bandhu dāyādāḥ ṣaṭ a dāyāda bāndhavāḥ

original: N13.45c/ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ smṛtaḥ śreyāj jaghanyo yo ya uttaraḥ //
analyzed: pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ smṛtaḥ śreyāt jaghanyaḥ yaḥ yaḥ uttaraḥ

original: N13.46a/ kramād dhy ete prapadyeran mṛte pitari taddhanam /
analyzed: kramāt hi ete prapadyeran mṛte pitari tad dhanam

original: N13.46c/ jyāyaso jyāyaso 'abhāve jaghanyas tad avāpnuyāt //
analyzed: jyāyasaḥ jyāyasaḥ abhāve jaghanyaḥ tat avāpnuyāt

original: N13.47a/ putrābhāve tu duhitā tulyasaṃtānadarśanāt /
analyzed: putra abhāve tu duhitā tulya saṃtāna darśanāt

original: N13.47c/ putraś ca duhitā coktau pituḥ saṃtānakārakau //
analyzed: putraḥ ca duhitā ca uktau pituḥ saṃtāna kārakau

original: N13.48a/ abhāve tu duhitṛṛṇāṃ sakulyā bāndhavās tataḥ /
analyzed: abhāve tu duhitṛṛṇām sakulyāḥ bāndhavāḥ tatas

original: N13.48c/ tataḥ sajātyāḥ sarveṣām abhāve rājagāmi tat //
analyzed: tatas sajātyāḥ sarveṣām abhāve rāja gāmi tat

original: N13.49a/ anyatra brāhmaṇāt kiṃtu rājā dharmaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra brāhmaṇāt kiṃtu rājā dharma parāyaṇaḥ

original: N13.49c/ sa strīṇāṃ jīvanaṃ dadyād eṣa dāyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: sa strīṇām jīvanam dadyāt eṣa dāya vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N14.1a/ sahasā kriyate karma yatkiṃcid baladarpitaiḥ /
analyzed: sahasā kriyate karma yat kiṃcid bala darpitaiḥ

original: N14.1c/ tat sāhasam iti proktaṃ saho balam ihocyate //
analyzed: tat sāhasam iti proktam sahaḥ balam iha ucyate

original: N14.2a/ tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ prathamaṃ madhyamaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tat punar trividham jñeyam prathamam madhyamam tathā

original: N14.2c/ uttamaṃ ceti śāstreṣu tasyoktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak //
analyzed: uttamam ca iti śāstreṣu tasya uktam lakṣaṇam pṛthak

original: N14.3a/ phalamūlodakādīnāṃ kṣetropakaraṇasya ca /
analyzed: phala mūla udaka ādīnām kṣetra upakaraṇasya ca

original: N14.3c/ bhaṅgākṣepopamardādyaiḥ prathamaṃ sāhasaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: bhaṅga ākṣepa upamarda ādyaiḥ prathamam sāhasam smṛtam

original: N14.4a/ vāsaḥpaśvannapānānām gṛhopakaraṇasya ca /
analyzed: vāsaḥ paśu anna pānānām gṛha upakaraṇasya ca

original: N14.4c/ etenaiva prakāreṇa madhyamaṃ sāhasaṃ smṛtam //
analyzed: etena eva prakāreṇa madhyamam sāhasam smṛtam

original: N14.5a/ vyāpādo viṣaśastrād yaiḥ paradārapradharṣaṇam /
analyzed: vyāpādaḥ viṣa śastrāt yaiḥ para dāra pradharṣaṇam

original: N14.5c/ prāṇoparodhi yac cānyad uktam uttamasāhasam //
analyzed: prāṇa uparodhi yat ca anyat uktam uttamasāhasam

original: N14.6a/ tasya daṇḍaḥ kriyāpekṣaḥ prathamasya śatāvaraḥ /
analyzed: tasya daṇḍaḥ kriyā apekṣaḥ prathamasya śata avaraḥ

original: N14.6c/ madhyamasya tu śāstrajñair jñeyaḥ pañcaśatāvaraḥ //
analyzed: madhyamasya tu śāstra jñaiḥ jñeyaḥ pañca śata avaraḥ

original: N14.7a/ vadhaḥ sarvasvaharaṇaṃ purān nirvāsanāṅkane /
analyzed: vadhaḥ sarva sva haraṇam purāt nirvāsana aṅkane

original: N14.7c/ tadaṅgaccheda ity ukto daṇḍa uttamasāhase //
analyzed: tad aṅga chedaḥ iti uktaḥ daṇḍaḥ uttamasāhase

original: N14.8a/ aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eṣa daṇḍavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eṣa daṇḍa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N14.8c/ vadhād ṛte brāhmaṇasya na vadhaṃ brāhmaṇo 'arhati //
analyzed: vadhāt ṛte brāhmaṇasya na vadham brāhmaṇaḥ arhati

original: N14.9a/ śiraso muṇḍanaṃ daṇḍas tasya nirvāsanaṃ purāt /
analyzed: śirasaḥ muṇḍanam daṇḍaḥ tasya nirvāsanam purāt

original: N14.9c/ lalāṭe cābhiśastāṅkaḥ prayāṇaṃ gardabhena ca //
analyzed: lalāṭe ca abhiśasta aṅkaḥ prayāṇam gardabhena ca

original: N14.10a/ syātāṃ saṃvyavahāryau tau dhṛtadaṇḍau tu pūrvayoḥ /
analyzed: syātām saṃvyavahāryau tau dhṛta daṇḍau tu pūrvayoḥ

original: N14.10c/ dhṛtadaṇḍo 'apy asaṃbhojyo jñeya uttamasāhase //
analyzed: dhṛta daṇḍaḥ api asaṃbhojyaḥ jñeyaḥ uttamasāhase

original: N14.11a/ tasyaiva bhedaḥ steyaṃ syād viśeṣas tatra cocyate /
analyzed: tasya eva bhedaḥ steyam syāt viśeṣaḥ tatra ca ucyate

original: N14.11c/ atisāhasam ākramya steyam āhuś chalena tu //
analyzed: ati sāhasam ākramya steyam āhuḥ chalena tu

original: N14.12a/ tad api trividhaṃ proktaṃ dravyāpekṣaṃ manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: tat api trividham proktam dravya apekṣam manīṣibhiḥ

original: N14.12c/ kṣudramadhyottamānāṃ tu dravyāṇām apakarṣaṇāt //
analyzed: kṣudra madhya uttamānām tu dravyāṇām apakarṣaṇāt

original: N14.13a/ mṛdbhāṇḍāsanakhaṭvāsthidārucarmatṛṇādi yat /
analyzed: mṛd bhāṇḍa āsana khaṭvā asthi dāru carma tṛṇa ādi yat

original: N14.13c/ śamīdhānyamudgādīni kṣudradravyam udāhṛtam //
analyzed: śamīdhānya mudga ādīni kṣudra dravyam udāhṛtam

original: N14.14a/ vāsaḥ kauśeyavarjaṃ ca govarjaṃ paśavas tathā /
analyzed: vāsaḥ kauśeya varjam ca go varjam paśavaḥ tathā

original: N14.14c/ hiraṇyavarjaṃ lohaṃ ca madhyaṃ vrīhiyavā api //
analyzed: hiraṇya varjam loham ca madhyam vrīhi yavāḥ api

original: N14.15a/ hiraṇyaratnakauśeyastrīpuṃgogajavājinaḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya ratna kauśeya strī pum go gaja vājinaḥ

original: N14.15c/ devabrāhmaṇarājñāṃ ca dravyaṃ vijñeyam uttamam //
analyzed: deva brāhmaṇa rājñām ca dravyam vijñeyam uttamam

original: N14.16a/ upāyair vividhair eṣāṃ chalayitvāpakarṣaṇam /
analyzed: upāyaiḥ vividhaiḥ eṣām chalayitvā apakarṣaṇam

original: N14.16c/ suptapramattamattebhyaḥ steyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: supta pramatta mattebhyaḥ steyam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: N14.17a/ sahoḍhagrahaṇāt steyaṃ hoḍhe 'asaty upabhogataḥ /
analyzed: sahoḍha grahaṇāt steyam hoḍhe asati upabhogataḥ

original: N14.17c/ śaṅkā tv asajjanaikārthyād anāyavyayatas tathā //
analyzed: śaṅkā tu asat jana aikārthyāt anāyavyayataḥ tathā

original: N14.18a/ bhaktāvakāśadātāraḥ stenānāṃ ye prasarpatām /
analyzed: bhakta avakāśa dātāraḥ stenānām ye prasarpatām

original: N14.18c/ śaktāś ca ya upekṣante te 'api taddoṣabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: śaktāḥ ca ye upekṣante te api tad doṣa bhāginaḥ

original: N14.19a/ utkrośatāṃ janānāṃ ca hriyamāṇe dhane 'api ca /
analyzed: utkrośatām janānām ca hriyamāṇe dhane api ca

original: N14.19c/ śrutvā ye nābhidhāvanti te 'api taddoṣabhāginaḥ //
analyzed: śrutvā ye na abhidhāvanti te api tad doṣa bhāginaḥ

original: N14.20a/ sāhaseṣu ya evoktas triṣu daṇḍo manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: sāhaseṣu yaḥ eva uktaḥ triṣu daṇḍaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: N14.20c/ sa eva daṇḍaḥ steye 'api dravyeṣu triṣv anukramāt //
analyzed: saḥ eva daṇḍaḥ steye api dravyeṣu triṣu anukramāt

original: N14.21a/ gavādiṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu dravyeṣv apahṛteṣu vā /
analyzed: go ādiṣu praṇaṣṭeṣu dravyeṣu apahṛteṣu vā

original: N14.21c/ padenānveṣaṇaṃ kuryur ā mūlāt tadvido janāḥ //
analyzed: padena anveṣaṇam kuryuḥ ā mūlāt tad vidaḥ janāḥ

original: N14.22a/ grāme vraje vivīte vā yatra saṃnipatet padam /
analyzed: grāme vraje vivīte vā yatra saṃnipatet padam

original: N14.22c/ voḍhavyaṃ tad bhavet tena na cet so 'anyatra tan nayet //
analyzed: voḍhavyam tat bhavet tena na ced saḥ anyatra tat nayet

original: N14.23a/ pade pramūḍhe bhagne vā viṣamatvāj janāntike /
analyzed: pade pramūḍhe bhagne vā viṣama tvāt jana antike

original: N14.23c/ yas tv āsannataro grāmo vrajo vā tatra pātayet //
analyzed: yaḥ tu āsannataraḥ grāmaḥ vrajaḥ vā tatra pātayet

original: N14.24a/ same 'adhvani dvayor yatra tena prāyo 'aśucir janaḥ /
analyzed: same adhvani dvayoḥ yatra tena prāyas aśuciḥ janaḥ

original: N14.24c/ pūrvāpadānair dṛṣṭo vā saṃsṛṣṭo vā durātmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pūrva apadānaiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ vā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ vā durātmabhiḥ

original: N14.25a/ grāmeṣv anveṣaṇaṃ kuryuś caṇḍālavadhakādayaḥ /
analyzed: grāmeṣu anveṣaṇam kuryuḥ caṇḍāla vadhaka ādayaḥ

original: N14.25c/ rātrisaṃcāriṇo ye ca bahiḥ kuryur bahiścarāḥ //
analyzed: rātri saṃcāriṇaḥ ye ca bahis kuryuḥ bahiścarāḥ

original: N14.26a/ steneṣv alabhyamāneṣu rājā dadyāt svakād dhanāt /
analyzed: steneṣu a labhyamāneṣu rājā dadyāt svakāt dhanāt

original: N14.26c/ upekṣamāṇo hy enasvī dharmād arthāc ca hīyate //
analyzed: upekṣamāṇaḥ hi enasvī dharmāt arthāt ca hīyate

original: N15-16.1a/ deśajātikulādīnām ākrośanyaṅgasaṃhitam /
analyzed: deśa jāti kula ādīnām ākrośa nyaṅga saṃhitam

original: N15-16.1c/ yad vacaḥ pratikūlārthaṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ tad ucyate //
analyzed: yat vacaḥ pratikūla artham vāc pāruṣyam tat ucyate

original: N15-16.2a/ niṣṭhurāślīlatīvratvāt tad api trividhaṃ smṛtam /
analyzed: niṣṭhura aślīla tīvra tvāt tat api trividham smṛtam

original: N15-16.2c/ gauravānukramād asya daṇḍo 'apy atra kramād guruḥ //
analyzed: gaurava anukramāt asya daṇḍaḥ api atra kramāt guruḥ

original: N15-16.3a/ sākṣepaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ jñeyam aślīlaṃ nyaṅgasaṃyutam /
analyzed: sa ākṣepam niṣṭhuram jñeyam aślīlam nyaṅga saṃyutam

original: N15-16.3c/ pātanīyair upakrośais tīvram āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pātanīyaiḥ upakrośaiḥ tīvram āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: N15-16.4a/ paragātreṣv abhidroho hastapādāyudhādibhiḥ /
analyzed: para gātreṣu abhidrohaḥ hasta pāda āyudha ādibhiḥ

original: N15-16.4c/ bhasmādibhiś copaghāto daṇḍapāruṣyam ucyate //
analyzed: bhasma ādibhiḥ ca upaghātaḥ daṇḍa pāruṣyam ucyate

original: N15-16.5a/ tasyāpi dṛṣṭaṃ traividhyaṃ mṛdumadhyottamaṃ kramāt /
analyzed: tasya api dṛṣṭam traividhyam mṛdu madhya uttamam kramāt

original: N15-16.5c/ avagūraṇaniḥsaṅgapātanakṣatadarśanaiḥ //
analyzed: avagūraṇa niḥsaṅga pātana kṣata darśanaiḥ

original: N15-16.6a/ hīnamadhyottamānāṃ tu dravyāṇām samatikramāt /
analyzed: hīna madhya uttamānām tu dravyāṇām samatikramāt

original: N15-16.6c/ trīṇy eva sāhasāny āhus tatra kaṇṭakaśodhanam //
analyzed: trīṇi eva sāhasāni āhuḥ tatra kaṇṭaka śodhanam

original: N15-16.7a/ vidhiḥ pañcavidhas tūkta etayor ubhayor api /
analyzed: vidhiḥ pañcavidhaḥ tu uktaḥ etayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: N15-16.7c/ viśuddhir daṇḍabhāktvaṃ ca tatra saṃbadhyate yathā //
analyzed: viśuddhiḥ daṇḍa bhāj tvam ca tatra saṃbadhyate yathā

original: N15-16.8a/ pāruṣye sati saṃrambhād utpanne kṣubdhayor dvayoḥ /
analyzed: pāruṣye sati saṃrambhāt utpanne kṣubdhayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: N15-16.8c/ sa manyate yaḥ kṣamate daṇḍabhāg yo 'ativartate //
analyzed: sa manyate yaḥ kṣamate daṇḍa bhāj yaḥ ativartate

original: N15-16.9a/ pāruṣyadoṣāvṛtayor yugapat saṃpravṛttayoḥ /
analyzed: pāruṣya doṣa āvṛtayoḥ yugapad saṃpravṛttayoḥ

original: N15-16.9c/ viśeṣaś cen na dṛśyeta vinayaḥ syāt samas tayoḥ //
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ ced na dṛśyeta vinayaḥ syāt samaḥ tayoḥ

original: N15-16.10a/ pūrvam ākṣārayed yas tu niyataṃ syāt sa doṣabhāk /
analyzed: pūrvam ākṣārayet yaḥ tu niyatam syāt sa doṣa bhāj

original: N15-16.10c/ paścād yaḥ so 'apy asatkārī pūrve tu vinayo guruḥ //
analyzed: paścāt yaḥ saḥ api asatkārī pūrve tu vinayaḥ guruḥ

original: N15-16.11a/ dvayor āpannayos tulyam anubadhnāti yaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: dvayoḥ āpannayoḥ tulyam anubadhnāti yaḥ punar

original: N15-16.11c/ sa tayor daṇḍam āpnoti pūrvo vā yadi vetaraḥ //
analyzed: sa tayoḥ daṇḍam āpnoti pūrvaḥ vā yadi vā itaraḥ

original: N15-16.12a/ śvapākapaṇḍacaṇḍālavyaṅgeṣu vadhavṛttiṣu /
analyzed: śvapāka paṇḍa caṇḍāla vyaṅgeṣu vadha vṛttiṣu

original: N15-16.12c/ hastipavrātyadāreṣu gurvācāryāṅganāsu ca //
analyzed: hastipa vrātya dāreṣu guru ācārya aṅganāsu ca

original: N15-16.13a/ maryādātikrame sadyo ghāta evānuśāsanam /
analyzed: maryādā atikrame sadyas ghātaḥ eva anuśāsanam

original: N15-16.13c/ na ca taddaṇḍapāruṣye doṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: na ca tad daṇḍa pāruṣye doṣam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: N15-16.14a/ yam eva hy ativarterann ete santaṃ janaṃ nṛṣu /
analyzed: yam eva hi ativarteran ete santam janam nṛṣu

original: N15-16.14c/ sa eva vinayaṃ kuryān na tadvinayabhāṅ nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: saḥ eva vinayam kuryāt na tad vinaya bhāj nṛpaḥ

original: N15-16.15a/ malā hy ete manuṣyeṣu dhanam eṣāṃ malātmakam /
analyzed: malāḥ hi ete manuṣyeṣu dhanam eṣām mala ātmakam

original: N15-16.15c/ api tān ghātayed rājā nārthadaṇḍena daṇḍayet //
analyzed: api tān ghātayet rājā na artha daṇḍena daṇḍayet

original: N15-16.16a/ śataṃ brāhmaṇam ākruśya kṣatriyo daṇḍam arhati /
analyzed: śatam brāhmaṇam ākruśya kṣatriyaḥ daṇḍam arhati

original: N15-16.16c/ vaiśyo 'adhyardhaṃ śataṃ dve vā śūdras tu vadham arhati //
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ adhyardham śatam dve vā śūdraḥ tu vadham arhati

original: N15-16.17a/ vipraḥ pañcāśataṃ daṇḍyaḥ kṣatriyasyābhiśaṃsane /
analyzed: vipraḥ pañcāśatam daṇḍyaḥ kṣatriyasya abhiśaṃsane

original: N15-16.17c/ vaiśye syād ardhapañcāśac chūdre dvādaśako damaḥ //
analyzed: vaiśye syāt ardhapañcāśat śūdre dvādaśakaḥ damaḥ

original: N15-16.18a/ samavarṇadvijātīnāṃ dvādaśaiva vyatikrame /
analyzed: sama varṇa dvijātīnām dvādaśā eva vyatikrame

original: N15-16.18c/ vādeṣv avacanīyeṣu tad eva dviguṇaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: vādeṣu avacanīyeṣu tat eva dviguṇam bhavet

original: N15-16.19a/ kāṇam apy athavā khañjam anyaṃ vāpi tathāvidham /
analyzed: kāṇam api athavā khañjam anyam vā api tathāvidham

original: N15-16.19c/ tathyenāpi bruvan dāpyo rājñā kārṣāpaṇāvaram //
analyzed: tathyena api bruvan dāpyaḥ rājñā kārṣāpaṇa avaram

original: N15-16.20a/ na kilbiṣeṇāpavadec chāstrataḥ kṛtapāvanam /
analyzed: na kilbiṣeṇa apavadet śāstrataḥ kṛta pāvanam

original: N15-16.20c/ na rājñā dhṛtadaṇḍaṃ ca daṇḍabhāk tadvyatikramāt //
analyzed: na rājñā dhṛta daṇḍam ca daṇḍa bhāj tad vyatikramāt

original: N15-16.21a/ loke 'asmin dvāv avaktavyāv adaṇḍyau ca prakīrtitau /
analyzed: loke asmin dvau a vaktavyau a daṇḍyau ca prakīrtitau

original: N15-16.21c/ brāhmaṇaś caiva rājā ca tau hīdaṃ bibhṛto jagat //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ ca eva rājā ca tau hi idam bibhṛtaḥ jagat

original: N15-16.22a/ patitaṃ patitety uktvā cauraṃ caureti vā punaḥ /
analyzed: patitam patita iti uktvā cauram caura iti vā punar

original: N15-16.22c/ vacanāt tulyadoṣaḥ syān mithyā dvir doṣatāṃ vrajet //
analyzed: vacanāt tulya doṣaḥ syāt mithyā dvis doṣa tām vrajet

original: N15-16.23a/ nāmajātigrahaṃ teṣām abhidroheṇa kurvataḥ /
analyzed: nāma jāti graham teṣām abhidroheṇa kurvataḥ

original: N15-16.23c/ nikheyo 'ayomayaḥ śaṅkuḥ śūdrasyāṣṭādaśāṅgulaḥ //
analyzed: nikheyaḥ ayaḥ mayaḥ śaṅkuḥ śūdrasya aṣṭādaśa aṅgulaḥ

original: N15-16.24a/ dharmāpadeśaṃ darpeṇa dvijānām asya kurvataḥ /
analyzed: dharma apadeśam darpeṇa dvijānām asya kurvataḥ

original: N15-16.24c/ taptam āsecayet tailaṃ vaktre śrotre ca pārthivaḥ //
analyzed: taptam āsecayet tailam vaktre śrotre ca pārthivaḥ

original: N15-16.25a/ yenāṅgenāvaro varṇo brāhmaṇasyāparādhnuyāt /
analyzed: yena aṅgena avaraḥ varṇaḥ brāhmaṇasya aparādhnuyāt

original: N15-16.25c/ tad aṅgaṃ tasya chettavyam evaṃ śuddhim avāpnuyāt //
analyzed: tat aṅgam tasya chettavyam evam śuddhim avāpnuyāt

original: N15-16.26a/ sahāsanam abhiprepsur utkṛṣṭasyāvakṛṣṭajaḥ /
analyzed: sahāsanam abhiprepsuḥ utkṛṣṭasya avakṛṣṭa jaḥ

original: N15-16.26c/ kaṭyāṃ kṛṭāṅko nirvāsyaḥ sphigdeśaṃ vāsya kartayet //
analyzed: kaṭyām kṛṭa aṅkaḥ nirvāsyaḥ sphic deśam vā asya kartayet

original: N15-16.27a/ avaniṣṭhīvato darpād dvāv oṣṭhau chedayen nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: avaniṣṭhīvataḥ darpāt dvau oṣṭhau chedayet nṛpaḥ

original: N15-16.27c/ avamūtrayataḥ śiśnam avaśardhayato gudam //
analyzed: avamūtrayataḥ śiśnam avaśardhayataḥ gudam

original: N15-16.28a/ keśeṣu gṛhṇato hastau chedayed avicārayan /
analyzed: keśeṣu gṛhṇataḥ hastau chedayet a vicārayan

original: N15-16.28c/ pādayor nāsikāyāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ vṛṣaṇeṣu ca //
analyzed: pādayoḥ nāsikāyām ca grīvāyām vṛṣaṇeṣu ca

original: N15-16.29a/ upakruśya tu rājānaṃ vartmani sve vyavasthitam /
analyzed: upakruśya tu rājānam vartmani sve vyavasthitam

original: N15-16.29c/ jihvāchedād bhavec chuddhiḥ sarvasvaharaṇena vā //
N15-16.30a/ rājani prahared yas tu kṛtāgasy api durmatiḥ /
analyzed: rājani praharet yaḥ tu kṛta āgasi api durmatiḥ

original: N15-16.30c/ śūle tam agnau vipaced brahmahatyāśatādhikam //
analyzed: śūle tam agnau vipacet brahmahatyā śata adhikam

original: N15-16.31a/ putrāparādhe na pitā na śvavāñ śuni daṇḍabhāk /
analyzed: putra aparādhe na pitā na śvavām śuni daṇḍa bhāj

original: N15-16.31c/ na markaṭe ca tatsvāmī tair eva prahito na cet //
analyzed: na markaṭe ca tad svāmī taiḥ eva prahitaḥ na ced

original: N17.1a/ akṣavardhraśalākādyair devanaṃ jihmakāritam /
analyzed: akṣa vardhra śalākā ādyaiḥ devanam jihma kāritam

original: N17.1c/ paṇakrīḍā vayobhiś ca padaṃ dyūtasamāhvayam //
analyzed: paṇa krīḍā vayobhiḥ ca padam dyūta samāhvayam

original: N17.2a/ sabhikaḥ kārayed dyūtaṃ deyaṃ dadyāc ca tatkṛtam /
analyzed: sabhikaḥ kārayet dyūtam deyam dadyāt ca tad kṛtam

original: N17.2c/ daśakaṃ tu śataṃ vṛddhis tasya syād dyūtakāritā //
analyzed: daśakam tu śatam vṛddhiḥ tasya syāt dyūta kāri tā

original: N17.3a/ dvirabhyastāḥ patanty akṣā glahe yasyākṣadevinaḥ /
analyzed: dvis abhyastāḥ patanti akṣāḥ glahe yasya akṣa devinaḥ

original: N17.3c/ jayaṃ tasyāparasyāhuḥ kitavasya parājayam //
analyzed: jayam tasya aparasya āhuḥ kitavasya parājayam

original: N17.4a/ kitaveṣv eva tiṣṭheyuḥ kitavāḥ saṃśayaṃ prati /
analyzed: kitaveṣu eva tiṣṭheyuḥ kitavāḥ saṃśayam prati

original: N17.4c/ ta eva tasya draṣṭāraḥ syus ta eva ca sākṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: te eva tasya draṣṭāraḥ syuḥ te eva ca sākṣiṇaḥ

original: N17.5a/ aśuddhaḥ kitavo nānyad āśrayed dyūtamaṇḍalam /
analyzed: aśuddhaḥ kitavaḥ na anyat āśrayet dyūta maṇḍalam

original: N17.5c/ pratihanyān na sabhikaṃ dāpayet tat svam iṣṭataḥ //
analyzed: pratihanyāt na sabhikam dāpayet tat svam iṣṭatas

original: N17.6a/ kūṭākṣadevinaḥ pāpān nirbhajed dyūtamaṇḍalāt /
analyzed: kūṭa akṣa devinaḥ pāpān nirbhajet dyūta maṇḍalāt

original: N17.6c/ kaṇṭhe 'akṣamālām āsajya sa hy eṣāṃ vinayaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: kaṇṭhe akṣamālām āsajya sa hi eṣām vinayaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N18.1a/ prakīrṇake punar jñeyā vyavahārā nṛpāśrayāḥ /
analyzed: prakīrṇake punar jñeyāḥ vyavahārāḥ nṛpa āśrayāḥ

original: N18.1c/ rājñām ājñāpratīghātas tatkarmakaraṇaṃ tathā //
analyzed: rājñām ājñā pratīghātaḥ tad karma karaṇam tathā

original: N18.2a/ purapradānaṃ saṃbhedaḥ prakṛtīnāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: pura pradānam saṃbhedaḥ prakṛtīnām tathā eva ca

original: N18.2c/ pāṣaṇḍanaigamaśreṇīgaṇadharmaviparyayāḥ //
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍa naigama śreṇī gaṇa dharma viparyayāḥ

original: N18.3a/ pitṛputravivādaś ca prāyaścittavyatikramaḥ /
analyzed: pitṛ putra vivādaḥ ca prāyaścitta vyatikramaḥ

original: N18.3c/ pratigrahavilopaś ca kopa āśramiṇām api //
analyzed: pratigraha vilopaḥ ca kopaḥ āśramiṇām api

original: N18.4a/ varṇasaṃkaradoṣaś ca tadvṛttiniyamas tathā /
analyzed: varṇa saṃkara doṣaḥ ca tad vṛtti niyamaḥ tathā

original: N18.4c/ na dṛṣṭaṃ yac ca pūrveṣu tat sarvaṃ syāt prakīrṇake //
analyzed: na dṛṣṭam yat ca pūrveṣu tat sarvam syāt prakīrṇake

original: N18.5a/ rājā tv avahitaḥ sarvān āśramān paripālayet /
analyzed: rājā tu avahitaḥ sarvān āśramān paripālayet

original: N18.5c/ upāyaiḥ śāstravihitaiś caturbhiḥ prakṛtais tathā //
analyzed: upāyaiḥ śāstra vihitaiḥ caturbhiḥ prakṛtaiḥ tathā

original: N18.6a/ yo yo varṇo 'avahīyeta yo vodrekam anuvrajet /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ varṇaḥ avahīyeta yaḥ vā udrekam anuvrajet

original: N18.6c/ taṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā svato mārgāt pracyutaṃ sthāpayet pathi //
analyzed: tam tam dṛṣṭvā svatas mārgāt pracyutam sthāpayet pathi

original: N18.7a/ aśāstrokteṣu cānyeṣu pāpayukteṣu karmasu /
analyzed: a śāstra ukteṣu ca anyeṣu pāpa yukteṣu karmasu

original: N18.7c/ prasamīkṣyātmano rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu pātayet //
analyzed: prasamīkṣya ātmanaḥ rājā daṇḍam daṇḍyeṣu pātayet

original: N18.8a/ śrutismṛtiviruddhaṃ ca janānām ahitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: śruti smṛti viruddham ca janānām ahitam ca yat

original: N18.8c/ na tat pravartayed rājā pravṛttaṃ ca nivartayet //
analyzed: na tat pravartayet rājā pravṛttam ca nivartayet

original: N18.9a/ nyāyāpetaṃ yad anyena rājñājñānakṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: nyāya apetam yat anyena rājñā ajñāna kṛtam ca yat

original: N18.9c/ tad apy anyāyavihitaṃ punar nyāye niveśayet //
analyzed: tat api anyāya vihitam punar nyāye niveśayet

original: N18.10a/ rājñā pravartitān dharmānyo naro nānupālayet /
analyzed: rājñā pravartitān dharmān yaḥ naraḥ na anupālayet

original: N18.10c/ daṇḍyaḥ sa pāpo vadhyaś ca lopayan rājaśāsanam //
analyzed: daṇḍyaḥ sa pāpaḥ vadhyaḥ ca lopayan rāja śāsanam

original: N18.11a/ āyudhāny āyudhīyānāṃ vāhyādīn vāhyajīvinām /
analyzed: āyudhāni āyudhīyānām vāhya ādīn vāhya jīvinām

original: N18.11c/ veśyāstrīṇām alaṃkāraṃ vādyātodyāni tadvidām //
analyzed: veśyā strīṇām alaṃkāram vādya ātodyāni tad vidām

original: N18.12a/ yac ca yasyopakaraṇaṃ yena jīvanti kārukāḥ /
analyzed: yat ca yasya upakaraṇam yena jīvanti kārukāḥ

original: N18.12c/ sarvasvaharaṇe 'apy etān na rājā hartum arhati //
analyzed: sarva sva haraṇe api etān na rājā hartum arhati

original: N18.13a/ anādiś cāpy anantaś ca dvipadāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ /
analyzed: anādiḥ ca api anantaḥ ca dvipadām pṛthivīpatiḥ

original: N18.13c/ dīptimatvāc chucitvāc ca yadi na syāt pathaś cyutaḥ //
analyzed: dīptimat tvāt śuci tvāt ca yadi na syāt pathaḥ cyutaḥ

original: N18.14a/ yadi rājā na sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ daṇḍadhāraṇam /
analyzed: yadi rājā na sarveṣām varṇānām daṇḍadhāraṇam

original: N18.14c/ kuryāt patho vyapetānāṃ vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ //
analyzed: kuryāt pathaḥ vyapetānām vinaśyeyuḥ imāḥ prajāḥ

original: N18.15a/ brāhmaṇyaṃ brāhmaṇo jahyāt kṣatriyaḥ kṣātram utsṛjet /
analyzed: brāhmaṇyam brāhmaṇaḥ jahyāt kṣatriyaḥ kṣātram utsṛjet

original: N18.15c/ svakarma jahyād vaiśyas tu śūdraḥ sarvān viśeṣayet //
analyzed: sva karma jahyāt vaiśyaḥ tu śūdraḥ sarvān viśeṣayet

original: N18.16a/ rājānaś cen nābhaviṣyan pṛthivyāṃ daṇḍadhāraṇam /
analyzed: rājānaḥ ced na abhaviṣyan pṛthivyām daṇḍadhāraṇam

original: N18.16c/ śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ //
analyzed: śūle matsyān iva apakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ

original: N18.17a/ satām anugraho nityam asatāṃ nigrahas tathā /
analyzed: satām anugrahaḥ nityam asatām nigrahaḥ tathā

original: N18.17c/ eṣa dharmaḥ smṛto rājñām arthaś cāmitrapīḍanāt //
analyzed: eṣa dharmaḥ smṛtaḥ rājñām arthaḥ ca amitra pīḍanāt

original: N18.18a/ na lipyate yathā vahnir dahañ chaśvad imāḥ prajāḥ /
analyzed: na lipyate yathā vahniḥ daham śaśvat imāḥ prajāḥ

original: N18.18c/ na lipyate tathā rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu pātayan //
analyzed: na lipyate tathā rājā daṇḍam daṇḍyeṣu pātayan

original: N18.19a/ ājñā tejaḥ pārthivānāṃ sā ca vāci pratiṣṭhitā /
analyzed: ājñā tejaḥ pārthivānām sā ca vāci pratiṣṭhitā

original: N18.19c/ te yad brūyur asat sad vā sa dharmo vyavahāriṇām //
analyzed: te yat brūyuḥ asat sat vā sa dharmaḥ vyavahāriṇām

original: N18.20a/ rājā nāma caraty eṣa bhūmau sākṣāt sahasradṛk /
analyzed: rājā nāma carati eṣa bhūmau sākṣāt sahasradṛś

original: N18.20c/ na tasyājñām atikramya saṃtiṣṭheran prajāḥ kvacit //
analyzed: na tasya ājñām atikramya saṃtiṣṭheran prajāḥ kvacid

original: N18.21a/ rakṣādhikārād īśatvād bhūtānugrahadarśanāt /
analyzed: rakṣā adhikārāt īśa tvāt bhūta anugraha darśanāt

original: N18.21c/ yad eva rājā kurute tat pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: yat eva rājā kurute tat pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ

original: N18.22a/ nirguṇo 'api yathā strīṇāṃ pūjya eva patiḥ sadā /
analyzed: nirguṇaḥ api yathā strīṇām pūjyaḥ eva patiḥ sadā

original: N18.22c/ prajānāṃ viguṇo 'apy evaṃ pūjya eva narādhipaḥ //
analyzed: prajānām viguṇaḥ api evam pūjyaḥ eva narādhipaḥ

original: N18.23a/ tapaḥkrītāḥ prajā rājñā prabhur āsāṃ tato nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: tapaḥ krītāḥ prajāḥ rājñā prabhuḥ āsām tatas nṛpaḥ

original: N18.23c/ tatas tadvacasi stheyaṃ vārtā cāsāṃ tadāśrayā //
analyzed: tatas tad vacasi stheyam vārtā ca āsām tad āśrayā

original: N18.24a/ pañca rūpāṇi rājāno dhārayanty amitaujasaḥ /
analyzed: pañca rūpāṇi rājānaḥ dhārayanti amita ojasaḥ

original: N18.24c/ agner indrasya somasya yamasya dhanadasya ca //
analyzed: agneḥ indrasya somasya yamasya dhanadasya ca

original: N18.25a/ kāraṇād animittaṃ vā yadā krodhavaśaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇāt animittam vā yadā krodha vaśam gataḥ

original: N18.25c/ prajā dahati bhūpālas tadāgnir abhidhīyate //
analyzed: prajāḥ dahati bhūpālaḥ tadā agniḥ abhidhīyate

original: N18.26a/ yadā tejaḥ samālambya vijigīṣur udāyudhaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tejaḥ samālambya vijigīṣuḥ udāyudhaḥ

original: N18.26c/ abhiyāti parān rājā tadendraḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: abhiyāti parān rājā tadā indraḥ saḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: N18.27a/ vigatakrodhasaṃtāpo hṛṣṭarūpo yadā nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: vigata krodha saṃtāpaḥ hṛṣṭa rūpaḥ yadā nṛpaḥ

original: N18.27c/ prajānāṃ darśanaṃ yāti soma ity ucyate tadā //
analyzed: prajānām darśanam yāti somaḥ iti ucyate tadā

original: N18.28a/ dharmāsanagataḥ śrīmān daṇḍaṃ dhatte yadā nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: dharma āsana gataḥ śrīmān daṇḍam dhatte yadā nṛpaḥ

original: N18.28c/ samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tadā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ //
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tadā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ

original: N18.29a/ yadā tv arthiguruprājñabhṛtyādīn avanīpatiḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu arthi guru prājña bhṛtya ādīn avanīpatiḥ

original: N18.29c/ anugṛhṇāti dānena tadā sa dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: anugṛhṇāti dānena tadā sa dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N18.30a/ tasmāt taṃ nāvajānīyān nākrośen na viśeṣayet /
analyzed: tasmāt tam na avajānīyāt na ākrośet na viśeṣayet

original: N18.30c/ ājñāyāṃ cāsya tiṣṭheta mṛtyuḥ syāt tadvyatikramāt //
analyzed: ājñāyām ca asya tiṣṭheta mṛtyuḥ syāt tad vyatikramāt

original: N18.31a/ tasya vṛttiḥ prajārakṣā vṛddhaprājñopasevanam /
analyzed: tasya vṛttiḥ prajā rakṣā vṛddha prājña upasevanam

original: N18.31c/ darśanaṃ vyavahārāṇām ātmanaś cābhirakṣaṇam //
analyzed: darśanam vyavahārāṇām ātmanaḥ ca abhirakṣaṇam

original: N18.32a/ brāhmaṇān upaseveta nityaṃ rājā samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇān upaseveta nityam rājā samāhitaḥ

original: N18.32c/ saṃyuktaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatraṃ mūlaṃ lokābhirakṣaṇe //
analyzed: saṃyuktam brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatram mūlam loka abhirakṣaṇe

original: N18.33a/ brāhmaṇasyāparīhāro rājanyāsanam agrataḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya aparīhāraḥ rājani āsanam agratas

original: N18.33c/ prathamaṃ darśanaṃ prātaḥ sarvebhyaś cābhivādanam //
analyzed: prathamam darśanam prātar sarvebhyaḥ ca abhivādanam

original: N18.34a/ agraṃ navebhyaḥ sasyebhyo mārgadānaṃ ca gacchataḥ /
analyzed: agram navebhyaḥ sasyebhyaḥ mārga dānam ca gacchataḥ

original: N18.34c/ bhaikṣahetoḥ parāgāre praveśas tv anivāritaḥ //
analyzed: bhaikṣa hetoḥ para āgāre praveśaḥ tu a nivāritaḥ

original: N18.35a/ samitpuṣpodakādāneṣv asteyaṃ saparigrahāt /
analyzed: samidh puṣpa udaka ādāneṣu asteyam sa parigrahāt

original: N18.35c/ anākṣepaḥ parebhyaś ca saṃbhāṣaś ca parastriyā //
analyzed: anākṣepaḥ parebhyaḥ ca saṃbhāṣaḥ ca para striyā

original: N18.36a/ nadīṣv avetanas tāraḥ pūrvam uttaraṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: nadīṣu a vetanaḥ tāraḥ pūrvam uttaraṇam tathā

original: N18.36c/ tareṣv aśulkadānaṃ ca na ced vāṇijyam asya tat //
analyzed: tareṣu a śulka dānam ca na ced vāṇijyam asya tat

original: N18.37a/ vartamāno 'adhvani śrānto gṛhṇann anivasan svayam /
analyzed: vartamānaḥ adhvani śrāntaḥ gṛhṇan a nivasan svayam

original: N18.37c/ brāhmaṇo nāparādhnoti dvāv ikṣū pañca mūlakān //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ na aparādhnoti dvau ikṣū pañca mūlakān

original: N18.38a/ nābhiśastān na patitān na dviṣo na ca nāstikāt /
analyzed: na abhiśastāt na patitāt na dviṣaḥ na ca nāstikāt

original: N18.38c/ na sopadhān nānimittaṃ na dātāraṃ prapīḍya ca //
analyzed: na sa upadhāt na animittam na dātāram prapīḍya ca

original: N18.39a/ arthānāṃ bhūribhāvāc ca deyatvāc ca mahātmanām /
analyzed: arthānām bhūri bhāvāt ca deya tvāt ca mahātmanām

original: N18.39c/ śreyān pratigraho rājñāṃ anyeṣāṃ brāhmaṇād ṛte //
analyzed: śreyān pratigrahaḥ rājñām anyeṣām brāhmaṇāt ṛte

original: N18.40a/ brāhmaṇaś caiva rājā ca dvāv apy etau dhṛtavratau /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ ca eva rājā ca dvau api etau dhṛta vratau

original: N18.40c/ naitayor antaraṃ kiṃcit prajādharmābhirakṣaṇāt //
analyzed: na etayoḥ antaram kiṃcid prajā dharma abhirakṣaṇāt

original: N18.41a/ dharmajñasya kṛtajñasya rakṣārthaṃ śāsato 'aśucīn /
analyzed: dharma jñasya kṛtajñasya rakṣā artham śāsataḥ aśucīn

original: N18.41c/ medhyam eva dhanaṃ prāhus tīkṣṇasyāpi mahīpateḥ //
analyzed: medhyam eva dhanam prāhuḥ tīkṣṇasya api mahīpateḥ

original: N18.42a/ śucīnām aśucīnāṃ ca saṃnipāto yathāmbhasām /
analyzed: śucīnām aśucīnām ca saṃnipātaḥ yathā ambhasām

original: N18.42c/ samudre samatāṃ yāti tadvad rājño dhanāgamaḥ //
analyzed: samudre sama tām yāti tadvat rājñaḥ dhana āgamaḥ

original: N18.43a/ yathā cāgnau sthitaṃ dīpte śuddhim āyāti kāñcanam /
analyzed: yathā ca agnau sthitam dīpte śuddhim āyāti kāñcanam

original: N18.43c/ evam evāgamā sarve śuddhim āyānti rājasu //
analyzed: evam sarve śuddhim āyānti rājasu

original: N18.44a/ ya eva kaścit svadravyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati /
analyzed: yaḥ eva kaścid sva dravyam brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati

original: N18.44c/ tad rājñāpy anumantavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ //
analyzed: tat rājñā api anumantavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: N18.45a/ anyaprakārād ucitād bhūmeḥ ṣaḍbhāgasaṃjñitāt /
analyzed: anya prakārāt ucitāt bhūmeḥ ṣaṣ bhāga saṃjñitāt

original: N18.45c/ baliḥ sa tasya vihitaḥ prajāpālanavetanam //
analyzed: baliḥ sa tasya vihitaḥ prajā pālana vetanam

original: N18.46a/ śakyaṃ tat punar ādātuṃ yad abrāhmaṇasātkṛtam /
analyzed: śakyam tat punar ādātum yat a brāhmaṇasāt kṛtam

original: N18.46c/ brāhmaṇāya tu yad dattaṃ na tasya haraṇaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāya tu yat dattam na tasya haraṇam punar

original: N18.47a/ dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñas tasya karma trilakṣaṇam /
analyzed: dānam adhyayanam yajñaḥ tasya karma tri lakṣaṇam

original: N18.47c/ yājanādhyāpane vṛttis tṛtīyas tu pratigrahaḥ //
analyzed: yājana adhyāpane vṛttiḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu pratigrahaḥ

original: N18.48a/ svakarmaṇi dvijas tiṣṭhed vṛttim āhārayet kṛtām /
analyzed: sva karmaṇi dvijaḥ tiṣṭhet vṛttim āhārayet kṛtām

original: N18.48c/ nāsadbhyaḥ pratigṛhṇīyād varṇebhyo niyame 'asati //
analyzed: na asadbhyaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt varṇebhyaḥ niyame asati

original: N18.49a/ aśucir vacanād yasya śucir bhavati puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: aśuciḥ vacanāt yasya śuciḥ bhavati puruṣaḥ

original: N18.49c/ śuciś caivāśuciḥ sadyaḥ kathaṃ rājā na daivatam //
analyzed: śuciḥ ca eva aśuciḥ sadyas katham rājā na daivatam

original: N18.50a/ vidur ya eva devatvaṃ rājño hy amitatejasaḥ /
analyzed: viduḥ ye eva deva tvam rājñaḥ hi amita tejasaḥ

original: N18.50c/ tasya te pratigṛhṇanto na lipyante dvijātayaḥ //
analyzed: tasya te pratigṛhṇantaḥ na lipyante dvijātayaḥ

original: N18.51a/ loke 'asmin maṅgalāny aṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaur hutāśanaḥ /
analyzed: loke asmin maṅgalāni aṣṭau brāhmaṇaḥ gauḥ hutāśanaḥ

original: N18.51c/ hiraṇyaṃ sarpir āditya āpo rājā tathāṣṭamaḥ //
analyzed: hiraṇyam sarpiḥ ādityaḥ āpaḥ rājā tathā aṣṭamaḥ

original: N18.52a/ etāni satataṃ paśyen namasyed arcayec ca tān /
analyzed: etāni satatam paśyet namasyet arcayet ca tān

original: N18.52c/ pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvīta tathā hy āyur na hīyate //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam ca kurvīta tathā hi āyuḥ na hīyate

original: pariśiṣṭam
analyzed: pariśiṣṭam

original: N19.1a/ dvividhās taskarā jñeyāḥ paradravyāpahāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: dvividhāḥ taskarāḥ jñeyāḥ para dravya apahāriṇaḥ

original: N19.1c/ prakāśāś cāprakāśāś ca tān vidyād ātmavān nṛpaḥ //
analyzed: prakāśāḥ ca aprakāśāḥ ca tān vidyāt ātmavān nṛpaḥ

original: N19.2a/ prakāśavañcakās tatra kūṭamānatulāśritāḥ /
analyzed: prakāśa vañcakāḥ tatra kūṭa māna tulā āśritāḥ

original: N19.2c/ utkoṭakāḥ sāhasikāḥ kitavāḥ paṇyayoṣitaḥ //
analyzed: utkoṭakāḥ sāhasikāḥ kitavāḥ paṇyayoṣitaḥ

original: N19.3a/ pratirūpakarāś caiva maṅgaloddeśavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: pratirūpa karāḥ ca eva maṅgala uddeśa vṛttayaḥ

original: N19.3c/ ity evamādayo jñeyāḥ prakāśalokavañcakāḥ //
analyzed: iti evamādayaḥ jñeyāḥ prakāśa loka vañcakāḥ

original: N19.4a/ aprakāśāś ca vijñeyā bahirabhyantarāśritāḥ /
analyzed: aprakāśāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ bahis abhyantara āśritāḥ

original: N19.4c/ suptān pramattāṃś ca narā muṣṇanty ākramya caiva te //
analyzed: suptān pramattān ca narāḥ muṣṇanti ākramya ca eva te

original: N19.5a/ deśagrāmagṛhaghnāś ca pathighnā granthimocakāḥ /
analyzed: deśa grāma gṛha ghnāḥ ca pathi ghnāḥ granthimocakāḥ

original: N19.5c/ ity evamādayo jñeyā aprakāśāś ca taskarāḥ //
analyzed: iti evamādayaḥ jñeyāḥ aprakāśāḥ ca taskarāḥ

original: N19.6a/ tān viditvā sukuśalaiś cārais tatkarmakāribhiḥ /
analyzed: tān viditvā su kuśalaiḥ cāraiḥ tad karma kāribhiḥ

original: N19.6c/ anusṛtya gṛhītavyā gūḍhapraṇihitair naraiḥ //
analyzed: anusṛtya gṛhītavyāḥ gūḍha praṇihitaiḥ naraiḥ

original: N19.7a/ sabhāprapāpūpaśālāveśamadyānnavikrayāḥ /
analyzed: sabhā prapā apūpa śālā veśa madya anna vikrayāḥ

original: N19.7c/ catuṣpathāś caityavṛkṣāḥ samājāḥ prekṣaṇāni ca //
analyzed: catuṣpathāḥ caityavṛkṣāḥ samājāḥ prekṣaṇāni ca

original: N19.8a/ śūnyāgārāṇy araṇyāni devatāyatanāni ca /
analyzed: śūnya āgārāṇi araṇyāni devatāyatanāni ca

original: N19.8c/ cārair vineyāny etāni cauragrahaṇatatparaiḥ //
N19.9a/ tathaivānye praṇihitāḥ śraddheyāś citravādinaḥ /
analyzed: tathā eva anye praṇihitāḥ śraddheyāḥ citra vādinaḥ

original: N19.9c/ carā hy utsāhayeyus tāṃs taskarān pūrvataskarāḥ //
analyzed: carāḥ hi utsāhayeyuḥ tān taskarān pūrva taskarāḥ

original: N19.10a/ annapānasamādānaiḥ samājotsavadarśanaiḥ /
analyzed: anna pāna samādānaiḥ samāja utsava darśanaiḥ

original: N19.10c/ tathā cauryāpadeśaiś ca kuryus teṣāṃ samāgamam //
analyzed: tathā caurya apadeśaiḥ ca kuryuḥ teṣām samāgamam

original: N19.11a/ ye tatra nopasarpanti sṛtāḥ praṇihitā api /
analyzed: ye tatra na upasarpanti sṛtāḥ praṇihitāḥ api

original: N19.11c/ te 'abhisārya gṛhītavyāḥ saputrapaśubāndhavāḥ //
analyzed: te abhisārya gṛhītavyāḥ sa putra paśu bāndhavāḥ

original: N19.12a/ yāṃs tatra caurān gṛhṇīyāt tān vitāḍya viḍambya ca /
analyzed: yān tatra caurān gṛhṇīyāt tān vitāḍya viḍambya ca

original: N19.12c/ avaghuṣya ca sarvatra vadhyāś citravadhena te //
analyzed: avaghuṣya ca sarvatra vadhyāḥ citra vadhena te

original: N19.13a/ na tv ahoḍhānvitāś caurā rājñā vadhyā hy anāgamāḥ /
analyzed: na tu ahoḍha anvitāḥ caurāḥ rājñā vadhyāḥ hi anāgamāḥ

original: N19.13c/ sahoḍhān sopakaraṇān kṣipraṃ caurān praśāsayet //
analyzed: sahoḍhān sa upakaraṇān kṣipram caurān praśāsayet

original: N19.14a/ svadeśaghātino ye syus tathā panthāvarodhinaḥ /
analyzed: sva deśa ghātinaḥ ye syuḥ tathā panthā avarodhinaḥ

original: N19.14c/ teṣāṃ sarvasvam ādāya bhūyo nindāṃ prakalpayet //
analyzed: teṣām sarva svam ādāya bhūyas nindām prakalpayet

original: N19.15a/ ahoḍhān vimṛśec caurān gṛhītān pariśaṅkayā /
analyzed: ahoḍhān vimṛśet caurān gṛhītān pariśaṅkayā

original: N19.15c/ bhayopadhābhiś citrābhir brūyus tathā yathākṛtam //
analyzed: bhaya upadhābhiḥ citrābhiḥ brūyuḥ tathā yathā kṛtam

original: N19.16a/ deśaṃ kālaṃ diśaṃ jātiṃ nāma vā saṃpratiśrayam /
analyzed: deśam kālam diśam jātim nāma vā saṃpratiśrayam

original: N19.16c/ kṛtyaṃ karmakarā vā syuḥ praṣṭavyās te vinigrahe //
analyzed: kṛtyam karma karāḥ vā syuḥ praṣṭavyāḥ te vinigrahe

original: N19.17a/ varṇasvarākārabhedāt sasaṃdigdhanivedanāt /
analyzed: varṇa svara ākāra bhedāt sa saṃdigdha nivedanāt

original: N19.17c/ adeśakāladṛṣṭatvād vāsasyāpy aviśodhanāt //
analyzed: a deśa kāla dṛṣṭa tvāt vāsasya api aviśodhanāt

original: N19.18a/ asadvyayāt pūrvacauryād asatsaṃsargakāraṇāt /
analyzed: asat vyayāt pūrva cauryāt asat saṃsarga kāraṇāt

original: N19.18c/ leśair apy avagantavyā na hoḍhenaiva kevalam //
analyzed: leśaiḥ api avagantavyāḥ na hoḍhena eva kevalam

original: N19.19a/ dasyuvṛtte yadi nare śaṅkā syāt taskare 'api vā /
analyzed: dasyu vṛtte yadi nare śaṅkā syāt taskare api vā

original: N19.19c/ yadi spṛśyeta leśena kāryaḥ syāc chapathaḥ tataḥ //
analyzed: yadi spṛśyeta leśena kāryaḥ syāt śapathaḥ tatas

original: N19.20a/ caurāṇāṃ bhaktadā ye syus tathāgnyudakadāyakāḥ /
analyzed: caurāṇām bhakta dāḥ ye syuḥ tathā agni udaka dāyakāḥ

original: N19.20c/ āvāsadā deśikadās tathaivottaradāyakāḥ //
analyzed: āvāsa dāḥ deśika dāḥ tathā eva uttara dāyakāḥ

original: N19.21a/ kretāraś caiva bhāṇḍānāṃ pratigrāhiṇa eva ca /
analyzed: kretāraḥ ca eva bhāṇḍānām pratigrāhiṇaḥ eva ca

original: N19.21c/ samadaṇḍāḥ smṛtā hy ete ye ca pracchādayanti tān //
analyzed: sama daṇḍāḥ smṛtāḥ hi ete ye ca pracchādayanti tān

original: N19.22a/ rāṣṭreṣu rāṣṭrādhikṛtāḥ sāmantāś caiva coditāḥ /
analyzed: rāṣṭreṣu rāṣṭra adhikṛtāḥ sāmantāḥ ca eva coditāḥ

original: N19.22c/ abhyāghāteṣu madhyasthā yathā caurās tathaiva te //
analyzed: abhyāghāteṣu madhyasthāḥ yathā caurāḥ tathā eva te

original: N19.23a/ gocare yasya muṣyeta tena caurāḥ prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: gocare yasya muṣyeta tena caurāḥ prayatnataḥ

original: N19.23c/ mṛgyā dāpyo 'anyathā moṣaṃ padaṃ yadi na nirgatam //
analyzed: mṛgyāḥ dāpyaḥ anyathā moṣam padam yadi na nirgatam

original: N19.24a/ nirgate tu pade tasmin naṣṭe 'anyatra nipātite /
analyzed: nirgate tu pade tasmin naṣṭe anyatra nipātite

original: N19.24c/ sāmantān mārgapālāṃś ca dikpālāṃś caiva dāpayet //
analyzed: sāmantān mārga pālān ca dikpālān ca eva dāpayet

original: N19.25a/ gṛhe vai muṣite rājā cauragrāhāṃs tu dāpayet /
analyzed: gṛhe vai muṣite rājā caura grāhān tu dāpayet

original: N19.25c/ ārakṣakān rāṣṭrikāṃś ca yadi cauro na labhyate //
analyzed: ārakṣakān rāṣṭrikān ca yadi cauraḥ na labhyate

original: N19.26a/ yadi vā dāpyamānānāṃ tasmin moṣe tu saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi vā dāpyamānānām tasmin moṣe tu saṃśayaḥ

original: N19.26c/ muṣitaḥ śapathaṃ śāpyo moṣe vaiśodhyakāraṇāt //
analyzed: muṣitaḥ śapatham śāpyaḥ moṣe vaiśodhya kāraṇāt

original: N19.27a/ acaure dāpite moṣaṃ cauryavaiśodhyakāraṇāt /
analyzed: acaure dāpite moṣam caurya vaiśodhya kāraṇāt

original: N19.27c/ caure labdhe labheyus te dviguṇaṃ pratipāditāḥ //
analyzed: caure labdhe labheyuḥ te dviguṇam pratipāditāḥ

original: N19.28a/ caurahṛtaṃ prayatnena sarūpaṃ pratipādayet /
analyzed: caura hṛtam prayatnena sarūpam pratipādayet

original: N19.28c/ tadabhāve tu mūlyaṃ syād daṇḍaṃ dāpyaś ca tatsamam //
analyzed: tad abhāve tu mūlyam syāt daṇḍam dāpyaḥ ca tad samam

original: N19.29a/ kāṣṭhakāṇḍatṛṇādīnāṃ mṛnmayānāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kāṣṭha kāṇḍa tṛṇa ādīnām mṛd mayānām tathā eva ca

original: N19.29c/ veṇuvaiṇavabhāṇḍānāṃ vetrasnāyvasthicarmaṇām //
analyzed: veṇu vaiṇava bhāṇḍānām vetra snāyu asthi carmaṇām

original: N19.30a/ śākaharitamūlānāṃ haraṇe phalapuṣpayoḥ /
analyzed: śāka harita mūlānām haraṇe phala puṣpayoḥ

original: N19.30c/ gorasekṣuvikārāṇāṃ tathā lavaṇatailayoḥ //
analyzed: gorasa ikṣu vikārāṇām tathā lavaṇa tailayoḥ

original: N19.31a/ pakvānnānāṃ kṛtānnānāṃ madyānām āmiṣasya ca /
analyzed: pakva annānām kṛtānnānām madyānām āmiṣasya ca

original: N19.31c/ sarveṣām alpamūlyānāṃ mūlyāt pañcaguṇo damaḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām alpa mūlyānām mūlyāt pañcaguṇaḥ damaḥ

original: N19.32a/ tulādharimameyānāṃ gaṇimānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tulā dharima meyānām gaṇimānām ca sarvaśas

original: N19.32c/ ebhyas tūtkṛṣṭamūlyānāṃ mūlyād daśaguṇo damaḥ //
analyzed: ebhyaḥ tu utkṛṣṭa mūlyānām mūlyāt daśaguṇaḥ damaḥ

original: N19.33a/ dhānyaṃ daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyo harato 'abhyadhikaṃ vadhaḥ /
analyzed: dhānyam daśabhyaḥ kumbhebhyaḥ harataḥ abhyadhikam vadhaḥ

original: N19.33c/ nyūnaṃ tv ekādaśaguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dāpyo 'abravīn manuḥ //
analyzed: nyūnam tu ekādaśaguṇam daṇḍam dāpyaḥ abravīt manuḥ

original: N19.34a/ suvarṇarajatādīnām uttamānāṃ ca vāsasām /
analyzed: suvarṇa rajata ādīnām uttamānām ca vāsasām

original: N19.34c/ ratnānāṃ caiva mukhyānāṃ śatād abhyadhikaṃ vadhaḥ //
analyzed: ratnānām ca eva mukhyānām śatāt abhyadhikam vadhaḥ

original: N19.35a/ puruṣaṃ harataḥ pātyo daṇḍa uttamasāhasaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣam harataḥ pātyaḥ daṇḍaḥ uttamasāhasaḥ

original: N19.35c/ sarvasvaṃ strīṃ tu harataḥ kanyāṃ tu harato vadhaḥ //
analyzed: sarva svam strīm tu harataḥ kanyām tu harataḥ vadhaḥ

original: N19.36a/ mahāpaśūn stenayato daṇḍa uttamasāhasaḥ /
analyzed: mahāpaśūn stenayataḥ daṇḍaḥ uttamasāhasaḥ

original: N19.36c/ madhyamo madhyamapaśuṃ pūrvaḥ kṣudrapaśuṃ haran //
analyzed: madhyamaḥ madhyama paśum pūrvaḥ kṣudra paśum haran

original: N19.37a/ caturviṃśāvaraḥ pūrvaḥ paraḥ ṣaṇṇavatir bhavet /
analyzed: caturviṃśa avaraḥ pūrvaḥ paraḥ ṣaṇṇavatiḥ bhavet

original: N19.37c/ śatāni pañca tu paro madhyamo dviśatāvaraḥ //
analyzed: śatāni pañca tu paraḥ madhyamaḥ dvi śata avaraḥ

original: N19.38a/ sahasraṃ tūttamo jñeyaḥ paraḥ pañcaśatāvaraḥ /
analyzed: sahasram tu uttamaḥ jñeyaḥ paraḥ pañca śata avaraḥ

original: N19.38c/ trividhaḥ sāhaseṣv eva daṇḍaḥ proktaḥ svayaṃbhuvā //
analyzed: trividhaḥ sāhaseṣu eva daṇḍaḥ proktaḥ svayaṃbhuvā

original: N19.39a/ prathame granthibhedānām aṅgulyaṅguṣṭhayor vadhaḥ /
analyzed: prathame granthibhedānām aṅguli aṅguṣṭhayoḥ vadhaḥ

original: N19.39c/ dvitīye caiva taccheṣaṃ daṇḍaḥ pūrvaś ca sāhasaḥ //
analyzed: dvitīye ca eva tad śeṣam daṇḍaḥ pūrvaḥ ca sāhasaḥ

original: N19.40a/ goṣu brāhmaṇasaṃsthāsu sthūrāyāś chedanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: goṣu brāhmaṇa saṃsthāsu sthūrāyāḥ chedanam bhavet

original: N19.40c/ dāsīṃ tu harato nityam ardhapādavikartanam //
analyzed: dāsīm tu harataḥ nityam ardha pāda vikartanam

original: N19.41a/ yena yena viśeṣeṇa stenāṅgena viceṣṭate /
analyzed: yena yena viśeṣeṇa stena aṅgena viceṣṭate

original: N19.41c/ tat tad evāsya chettavyaṃ tan manor anuśāsanam //
analyzed: tat tat eva asya chettavyam tat manoḥ anuśāsanam

original: N19.42a/ garīyasi garīyāṃsam agarīyasi vā punaḥ /
analyzed: garīyasi garīyāṃsam agarīyasi vā punar

original: N19.42c/ stene nipātayed daṇḍaṃ na yathā prathame tathā //
analyzed: stene nipātayet daṇḍam na yathā prathame tathā

original: N19.43a/ daśa sthānāni daṇḍasya manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'abravīt /
analyzed: daśa sthānāni daṇḍasya manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ abravīt

original: N19.43c/ triṣu varṇeṣu yāni syur brāhmaṇo rakṣitaḥ sadā //
analyzed: triṣu varṇeṣu yāni syuḥ brāhmaṇaḥ rakṣitaḥ sadā

original: N19.44a/ upastham udaraṃ jihvā hastau pādau ca pañcamam /
analyzed: upastham udaram jihvā hastau pādau ca pañcamam

original: N19.44c/ cakṣur nāsā ca karṇau ca dhanaṃ dehas tathaiva ca //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ nāsā ca karṇau ca dhanam dehaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N19.45a/ aparādhaṃ parijñāya deśakālau ca tattvataḥ /
analyzed: aparādham parijñāya deśa kālau ca tattvataḥ

original: N19.45c/ sārānubandhāv ālokya daṇḍān etān prakalpayet //
analyzed: sāra anubandhau ālokya daṇḍān etān prakalpayet

original: N19.46a/ na mitrakāraṇād rājñā vipulād vā dhanāgamāt /
analyzed: na mitra kāraṇāt rājñā vipulāt vā dhana āgamāt

original: N19.46c/ utsraṣṭavyaḥ sāhasikas tyaktātmā manur abravīt //
analyzed: utsraṣṭavyaḥ sāhasikaḥ tyaktātmā manuḥ abravīt

original: N19.47a/ yāvān avadhyasya vadhe tāvān vadhyasya mokṣaṇe /
analyzed: yāvān avadhyasya vadhe tāvān vadhyasya mokṣaṇe

original: N19.47c/ bhavaty adharmo nṛpater dharmas tu viniyacchataḥ //
analyzed: bhavati adharmaḥ nṛpateḥ dharmaḥ tu viniyacchataḥ

original: N19.48a/ na jātu brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt sarvapāpeṣv api sthitam /
analyzed: na jātu brāhmaṇam hanyāt sarva pāpeṣu api sthitam

original: N19.48c/ nirvāsaṃ kārayet kāmam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ //
analyzed: nirvāsam kārayet kāmam iti dharmaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: N19.49a/ sarvasvaṃ vā hared rājā caturthaṃ vāvaśeṣayet /
analyzed: sarva svam vā haret rājā caturtham vā avaśeṣayet

original: N19.49c/ bhṛtyebhyo 'anusmaran dharmaṃ prājāpatyam iti sthitiḥ //
analyzed: bhṛtyebhyaḥ anusmaran dharmam prājāpatyam iti sthitiḥ

original: N19.50a/ brāhmaṇasyāparādhe tu catuḥsv aṅko vidhīyate /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya aparādhe tu catuḥsu aṅkaḥ vidhīyate

original: N19.50c/ gurutalpe surāpāne steye brāhmaṇahiṃsane //
analyzed: gurutalpe surā pāne steye brāhmaṇa hiṃsane

original: N19.51a/ gurutalpe bhagaḥ kāryaḥ surāpāne dhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: gurutalpe bhagaḥ kāryaḥ surā pāne dhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N19.51c/ steye tu śvapadaṃ kṛtvā śikhipittena kūṭayet //
analyzed: steye tu śvapadam kṛtvā śikhi pittena kūṭayet

original: N19.52a/ viśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryo lalāṭe bhrūṇaghātinaḥ /
analyzed: viśirāḥ puruṣaḥ kāryaḥ lalāṭe bhrūṇa ghātinaḥ

original: N19.52c/ asaṃbhāṣyaś ca kartavyas tan manor anuśāsanam //
analyzed: a saṃbhāṣyaḥ ca kartavyaḥ tat manoḥ anuśāsanam

original: N19.53a/ rājā stenena gantavyo muktakeśena dhāvatā /
analyzed: rājā stenena gantavyaḥ muktakeśena dhāvatā

original: N19.53c/ ācakṣāṇena tatsteyam evaṃ kartāsmi śādhi mām //
analyzed: ācakṣāṇena tat steyam evam kartāsmi śādhi mām

original: N19.54a/ anenā bhavati stenaḥ svakarmapratipādanāt /
analyzed: anenāḥ bhavati stenaḥ sva karma pratipādanāt

original: N19.54c/ rājānaṃ tat spṛśed ena utsṛjantaṃ sakilbiṣam //
analyzed: rājānam tat spṛśet enaḥ utsṛjantam sa kilbiṣam

original: N19.55a/ rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ /
analyzed: rājabhiḥ dhṛta daṇḍāḥ tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ

original: N19.55c/ nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā //
analyzed: nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtinaḥ yathā

original: N19.56a/ śāsanād vā vimokṣād vā steno mucyate kilbiṣāt /
analyzed: śāsanāt vā vimokṣāt vā stenaḥ mucyate kilbiṣāt

original: N19.56c/ aśāsanāt tu tad rājā stenasyāpnoti kilbiṣam //
analyzed: a śāsanāt tu tat rājā stenasya āpnoti kilbiṣam

original: N19.57a/ gurur ātmavatāṃ śāstā śāstā rājā durātmanām /
analyzed: guruḥ ātmavatām śāstā śāstā rājā durātmanām

original: N19.57c/ atha pracchannapāpānāṃ śāstā vaivasvato yamaḥ //
analyzed: atha pracchanna pāpānām śāstā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ

original: N19.58a/ aṣṭāpādyaṃ tu śūdrasya steye bhavati kilbiṣam /
analyzed: aṣṭāpādyam tu śūdrasya steye bhavati kilbiṣam

original: N19.58c/ dvir aṣṭāpādyaṃ vaiśyasya dvātriṃśat kṣatriyasya tu //
analyzed: dvis aṣṭāpādyam vaiśyasya dvātriṃśat kṣatriyasya tu

original: N19.59a/ brāhmaṇasya catuḥṣaṣṭīty evaṃ svāyaṃbhuvo 'abravīt /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya catuḥṣaṣṭi iti evam svāyaṃbhuvaḥ abravīt

original: N19.59c/ tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa vidvatsv abhyadhikaṃ bhavet //
analyzed: tatra api ca viśeṣeṇa vidvatsu abhyadhikam bhavet

original: N19.60a/ śārīraś cārthadaṇḍaś ca daṇḍas tu dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śārīraḥ ca artha daṇḍaḥ ca daṇḍaḥ tu dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N19.60c/ śārīrā daśadhā proktā arthadaṇḍās tv anekadhā //
analyzed: śārīrāḥ daśadhā proktāḥ artha daṇḍāḥ tu anekadhā

original: N19.61a/ kākaṇyādis tv arthadaṇḍaḥ sarvasvāntas tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kākaṇi ādiḥ tu artha daṇḍaḥ sarva sva antaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N19.61c/ śārīras tv avarodhādir jīvitāntas tathaiva ca //
analyzed: śārīraḥ tu avarodha ādiḥ jīvita antaḥ tathā eva ca

original: N19.62a/ kākaṇyādis tu yo daṇḍaḥ sa tu māṣāparaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: kākaṇi ādiḥ tu yaḥ daṇḍaḥ sa tu māṣa aparaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N19.62c/ māṣāvarādyo yaḥ proktaḥ kārṣāpaṇaparas tu saḥ //
N19.63a/ kārṣāpaṇāparādyas tu catuḥkārṣāpaṇaḥ paraḥ /
N19.63c/ dvyavaro 'aṣṭāparaś cānyas tryavaro dvādaśottaraḥ //
analyzed: dvi avaraḥ aṣṭa aparaḥ ca anyaḥ tri avaraḥ dvādaśa uttaraḥ

original: N19.64a/ kārṣāpaṇādyā ye proktāḥ sarve te syuś caturguṇāḥ /
analyzed: kārṣāpaṇa ādyāḥ ye proktāḥ sarve te syuḥ caturguṇāḥ

original: N19.64c/ evam anye tu vijñeyāḥ prāk ca te pūrvasāhasāt //
analyzed: evam anye tu vijñeyāḥ prāk ca te pūrva sāhasāt

original: N19.65a/ kārṣāpaṇo dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi raupyaḥ pravartate /
analyzed: kārṣāpaṇaḥ dakṣiṇasyām diśi raupyaḥ pravartate

original: N19.65c/ paṇair nibaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ ṣoḍaśaiva paṇāḥ sa tu //
analyzed: paṇaiḥ nibaddhaḥ pūrvasyām ṣoḍaśā eva paṇāḥ sa tu

original: N19.66a/ māṣo viṃśatibhāgas tu jñeyaḥ kārṣāpaṇasya tu /
analyzed: māṣaḥ viṃśati bhāgaḥ tu jñeyaḥ kārṣāpaṇasya tu

original: N19.66c/ kākaṇī tu caturbhāgo māṣasya ca paṇasya ca //
analyzed: kākaṇī tu catur bhāgaḥ māṣasya ca paṇasya ca

original: N19.67a/ pāñcanadyāḥ pradeśe tu saṃjñā yā vyāvahārikī /
analyzed: pāñcanadyāḥ pradeśe tu saṃjñā yā vyāvahārikī

original: N19.67c/ kārṣāpaṇapramāṇaṃ tu nibaddham iha vai tayā //
analyzed: kārṣāpaṇa pramāṇam tu nibaddham iha vai tayā

original: N19.68a/ kārṣāpaṇo 'aṇḍikā jñeyāś catasras tās tu dhānakaḥ /
analyzed: kārṣāpaṇaḥ aṇḍikāḥ jñeyāḥ catasraḥ tāḥ tu dhānakaḥ

original: N19.68c/ taddvādaśa suvarṇasya dīnāraś citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tat dvādaśa suvarṇasya dīnāraḥ citrakaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: N19.69a/ vārttāṃ trayīṃ cāpy atha daṇḍanītim /
analyzed: vārttām trayīm ca api atha daṇḍanītim

original: rājānuvartet saṃtatāpramattaḥ /
analyzed: rājā anuvartet saṃtata apramattaḥ

original: N19.69c/ hanyād upāyair nipuṇair gṛhītān /
analyzed: hanyāt upāyaiḥ nipuṇaiḥ gṛhītān

original: pure ca rāṣṭre nigṛhṇīyāt pāpān //
analyzed: pure ca rāṣṭre nigṛhṇīyāt pāpān

original: N20.1a/ yadā sākṣī na vidyate vivāde vadatāṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: yadā sākṣī na vidyate vivāde vadatām nṛṇām

original: N20.1c/ tadā divyaiḥ parīkṣeta śapathaiś ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ // 1
analyzed: tadā divyaiḥ parīkṣeta śapathaiḥ ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ

original: N20.2a/ satyaṃ vāhanaśastrāṇi gobījarajatāni ca /
analyzed: satyam vāhana śastrāṇi go bīja rajatāni ca

original: N20.2c/ devatāpitṛpādāś ca dattāni sukṛtāni ca // 2
analyzed: devatā pitṛ pādāḥ ca dattāni su kṛtāni ca

original: N20.3a/ mahāparādhe divyāni dāpayet tu mahīpatiḥ /
analyzed: mahā aparādhe divyāni dāpayet tu mahīpatiḥ

original: N20.3c/ alpeṣu ca naraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śapathaiḥ śāpayen naram // 3
analyzed: alpeṣu ca naraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śapathaiḥ śāpayet naram

original: N20.4a/ ete hi śapathāḥ proktāḥ sukarās svalpasaṃśaye /
analyzed: ete hi śapathāḥ proktāḥ sukarāḥ su alpa saṃśaye

original: N20.4c/ sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca vidhir divyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 4
analyzed: sāhaseṣu abhiśāpe ca vidhiḥ divyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ

original: N20.5a/ saṃdigdhe 'arthe 'abhiyuktānāṃ pracchanneṣu viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: saṃdigdhe arthe abhiyuktānām pracchanneṣu viśeṣataḥ

original: N20.5c/ divyaḥ pañcavidho jñeya ity āha bhagavān manuḥ // 5
analyzed: divyaḥ pañcavidhaḥ jñeyaḥ iti āha bhagavān manuḥ

original: N20.6a/ dhaṭo 'agnir udakaṃ caiva viṣaṃ kośaś ca pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: dhaṭaḥ agniḥ udakam ca eva viṣam kośaḥ ca pañcamaḥ

original: N20.6c/ uktāny etāni divyāni dūṣitānāṃ viśodhane // 6
analyzed: uktāni etāni divyāni dūṣitānām viśodhane

original: N20.7a/ saṃdigdheṣv abhiyuktānāṃ viśuddhyarthaṃ mahātmanā /
analyzed: saṃdigdheṣu abhiyuktānām viśuddhi artham mahātmanā

original: N20.7c/ nāradena punaḥ proktāḥ satyānṛtavibhāvanāḥ /
analyzed: nāradena punar proktāḥ satya anṛta vibhāvanāḥ

original: N20.7e/ vādino 'anumatenainaṃ kārayen nānyathā budhaḥ // 7
analyzed: vādinaḥ anumatena enam kārayet na anyathā budhaḥ

original: [dhaṭaḥ]
analyzed: dhaṭaḥ

original: N20.8a/ caturhastau tulāpādāv ucchrayeṇa prakīrtitau /
analyzed: catur hastau tulā pādau ucchrayeṇa prakīrtitau

original: N20.8c/ṣaḍḍhastaṃ tu tayor dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ parimāṇataḥ // 8
analyzed: tu tayoḥ dṛṣṭam pramāṇam parimāṇataḥ

original: N20.9a/ pādayor antaraṃ hastaṃ bhaved adhyardham eva ca /
analyzed: pādayoḥ antaram hastam bhavet adhyardham eva ca

original: N20.9c/ śikyadvayaṃ samāsajya dhaṭe karkaṭake dṛḍhe // 9
analyzed: śikya dvayam samāsajya dhaṭe karkaṭake dṛḍhe

original: N20.10a/ tulayitvā naraṃ pūrvaṃ cihnaṃ kuryād dhaṭasya tu /
analyzed: tulayitvā naram pūrvam cihnam kuryāt dhaṭasya tu

original: N20.10c/ kakṣāsthānena taṃ tulyam avatārya tato dhaṭāt // 10
